61 namespace Sandbox.Game.Entities
62 {
63  class MySyncGridThrustState
64  {
65  public Vector3B LastSendState;
66  public int SleepFrames = 0;
67 
68  public bool ShouldSend(Vector3B newThrust)
69  {
70  if (SleepFrames > 4 && LastSendState != newThrust)
71  {
72  SleepFrames = 0;
73  LastSendState = newThrust;
74  return true;
75  }
76  else
77  {
78  SleepFrames++;
79  return false;
80  }
81  }
82  }

125  static List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> m_recievedGrids = new List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid>();
126 
127  static MyCubeGrid()
128  {
129  for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i)
130  {
131  m_neighborOffsetIndices.Add((NeighborOffsetIndex)i);
132  m_neighborDistances.Add(0.0f);
133  m_neighborOffsets.Add(new Vector3I(0, 0, 0));
134  }
135 
136  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP] = new Vector3I(1, 0, 0);
137  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN] = new Vector3I(-1, 0, 0);
138  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YUP] = new Vector3I(0, 1, 0);
139  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YDOWN] = new Vector3I(0, -1, 0);
140  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.ZUP] = new Vector3I(0, 0, 1);
141  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(0, 0, -1);
142  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YUP] = new Vector3I(1, 1, 0);
143  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YDOWN] = new Vector3I(1, -1, 0);
144  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YUP] = new Vector3I(-1, 1, 0);
145  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YDOWN] = new Vector3I(-1, -1, 0);
146  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YUP_ZUP] = new Vector3I(0, 1, 1);
147  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YUP_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(0, 1, -1);
148  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YDOWN_ZUP] = new Vector3I(0, -1, 1);
149  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YDOWN_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(0, -1, -1);
150  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_ZUP] = new Vector3I(1, 0, 1);
151  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(1, 0, -1);
152  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_ZUP] = new Vector3I(-1, 0, 1);
153  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(-1, 0, -1);
154  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YUP_ZUP] = new Vector3I(1, 1, 1);
155  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YUP_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(1, 1, -1);
156  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YDOWN_ZUP] = new Vector3I(1, -1, 1);
157  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YDOWN_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(1, -1, -1);
158  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YUP_ZUP] = new Vector3I(-1, 1, 1);
159  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YUP_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(-1, 1, -1);
160  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YDOWN_ZUP] = new Vector3I(-1, -1, 1);
161  m_neighborOffsets[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YDOWN_ZDOWN] = new Vector3I(-1, -1, -1);
162 
163  GridCounter = 0;
164  }

243  private bool m_isStatic;
244  public bool IsStatic
245  {
246  get { return m_isStatic; }
247  private set
248  {
249  if (m_isStatic != value)
250  {
251  m_isStatic = value;
252  NotifyIsStaticChanged(m_isStatic);
253  }
254  }

361  public MyCubeSize GridSizeEnum
362  {
363  get { return m_gridSizeEnum; }
364  set
365  {
366  m_gridSizeEnum = value;
367  GridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(value);
368  GridSizeHalf = GridSize / 2;
369  GridSizeHalfVector = new Vector3(GridSizeHalf);
370  GridSizeR = 1 / GridSize;
371  }
372  }

378  public event Action<MySlimBlock> OnBlockAdded;

383 
384  internal void NotifyBlockAdded(MySlimBlock block)
385  {
386  if (OnBlockAdded != null)
387  OnBlockAdded(block);
388 
389  GridSystems.OnBlockAdded(block);
390  }
391 
392  internal void NotifyBlockRemoved(MySlimBlock block)
393  {
394  if (OnBlockRemoved != null)
395  OnBlockRemoved(block);
396 
397  if (MyVisualScriptLogicProvider.BlockDestroyed != null)
398  MyVisualScriptLogicProvider.BlockDestroyed(block.FatBlock != null ? block.FatBlock.Name : string.Empty, Name, block.BlockDefinition.Id.TypeId.ToString(), block.BlockDefinition.Id.SubtypeName);
399 
400  MyCubeGrids.NotifyBlockDestroyed(this, block);
401 
402  GridSystems.OnBlockRemoved(block);
403  }
404 
405  internal void NotifyBlockClosed(MySlimBlock block)
406  {
407  if (OnBlockClosed != null)
408  OnBlockClosed(block);
409  }
410 
411  internal void NotifyBlockIntegrityChanged(MySlimBlock block)
412  {
413  if (OnBlockIntegrityChanged != null)
414  OnBlockIntegrityChanged(block);
415 
416  GridSystems.OnBlockIntegrityChanged(block);
417  }
418 
419  //Called when ownership recalculation is actually done
420  public event Action<MyCubeGrid> OnBlockOwnershipChanged;
421  internal void NotifyBlockOwnershipChange(MyCubeGrid cubeGrid)
422  {
423  if (OnBlockOwnershipChanged != null)
424  OnBlockOwnershipChanged(cubeGrid);
425 
426  GridSystems.OnBlockOwnershipChanged(cubeGrid);
427  }

531 
537  public int GetFatBlockCount<T>() where T : MyCubeBlock
538  {
539  int count = 0;
540  foreach (var block in GetFatBlocks())
541  if (block is T)
542  count++;
543 
544  return count;
545  }
546 
547  public MyCubeGrid() :
548  this(MyCubeSize.Large)
549  {
550  GridScale = 1;
551  Render = new MyRenderComponentCubeGrid();
552  Render.NeedsDraw = true;
553 
554  PositionComp = new MyCubeGridPosition();
555 
556  Hierarchy.QueryAABBImpl = QueryAABB;
557  Hierarchy.QuerySphereImpl = QuerySphere;
558  Hierarchy.QueryLineImpl = QueryLine;
559 
560  Components.Add(new MyGridTargeting());
561 
562 #if !XB1 // !XB1_SYNC_NOREFLECTION
563  SyncType = SyncHelpers.Compose(this);
564 #else // XB1
565  SyncType = new SyncType(new List<SyncBase>());
566  m_handBrakeSync = SyncType.CreateAndAddProp<bool>();
567  m_isRespawnGrid = SyncType.CreateAndAddProp<bool>();
568  m_destructibleBlocks = SyncType.CreateAndAddProp<bool>();
569 #endif // XB1
570 
571  m_handBrakeSync.ValueChanged += (x)=> HandBrakeChanged();
572  }
573 
574  private MyCubeGrid(MyCubeSize gridSize)
575  {
576  GridScale = 1;
577  GridSizeEnum = gridSize;
578  GridSize = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(gridSize);
579  GridSizeHalf = GridSize / 2;
580  GridSizeHalfVector = new Vector3(GridSizeHalf);
581  GridSizeR = 1 / GridSize;
582  NeedsUpdate = MyEntityUpdateEnum.EACH_FRAME | MyEntityUpdateEnum.EACH_10TH_FRAME | MyEntityUpdateEnum.EACH_100TH_FRAME; //because of debug draw
583 
584  Skeleton = new MyGridSkeleton();
585 
586  GridCounter++;
587 
588  AddDebugRenderComponent(new MyDebugRenderComponentCubeGrid(this));
589 
590  if (MyPerGameSettings.Destruction)
591  {
592  OnPhysicsChanged += delegate(MyEntity entity)
593  {
594  MyPhysics.RemoveDestructions(entity);
595  };
596  }
597 
598  if (MyFakes.ASSERT_CHANGES_IN_SIMULATION)
599  {
600  OnPhysicsChanged += e => Debug.Assert(!MyPhysics.InsideSimulation, "Physics change inside simulation!");
601  OnGridSplit += (g1, g2) => Debug.Assert(!MyPhysics.InsideSimulation, "Physics change inside simulation!");
602  }
603  }
604 
605  private void CreateSystems()
606  {
607  ProfilerShort.Begin("CubeGrid.CreateSystems()");
608 
609  GridSystems = (MyCubeGridSystems)Activator.CreateInstance(m_gridSystemsType, this);
610 
611  ProfilerShort.End();
612  }
613 
614 
615  #region Overrides
616 
617  public override void Init(MyObjectBuilder_EntityBase objectBuilder)
618  {
619  InitInternal(objectBuilder, rebuildGrid: true);
620  }
621 
622  [Conditional("DEBUG")]
623  private void AssertNonPublicBlock(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock block)
624  {
625  MyCubeBlockDefinition definition;
626  var upgBlock = UpgradeCubeBlock(block, out definition);
627  var compound = upgBlock as MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock;
628  if (compound != null)
629  {
630  foreach (var b in compound.Blocks)
631  {
632  MyCubeBlockDefinition def;
633  Debug.Assert(!MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(b.GetId(), out def) || def.Public || def.IsGeneratedBlock, "Non-public block definition being added to world: " + def.Id);
634  }
635  }
636  else if (definition != null)
637  {
638  Debug.Assert(definition.Public, "Non-public block definition being added to world: " + definition.Id);
639  }
640  }
641 
642  [Conditional("DEBUG")]
643  private void AssertNonPublicBlocks(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid builder)
644  {
645  foreach (var block in builder.CubeBlocks)
646  {
647  AssertNonPublicBlock(block);
648  }
649  }
650 
651  private bool RemoveNonPublicBlock(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock block)
652  {
653  MyCubeBlockDefinition definition;
654  var upgBlock = UpgradeCubeBlock(block, out definition);
655  var compound = upgBlock as MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock;
656  if (compound != null)
657  {
658  MyCubeBlockDefinition def;
659  compound.Blocks = compound.Blocks.Where(s => !MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(s.GetId(), out def) || def.Public || def.IsGeneratedBlock).ToArray();
660  return compound.Blocks.Length == 0;
661  }
662  else if (definition != null && !definition.Public)
663  {
664  return true;
665  }
666  return false;
667  }
668 
669  private void RemoveNonPublicBlocks(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid builder)
670  {
671  builder.CubeBlocks.RemoveAll(s => RemoveNonPublicBlock(s));
672  }
673 
674  private void InitInternal(MyObjectBuilder_EntityBase objectBuilder, bool rebuildGrid)
675  {
676  var lst = new List<MyDefinitionId>();
677  SyncFlag = true;
678  // parody
679  var builder = (MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid)objectBuilder;
680  if (builder != null)
681  GridSizeEnum = builder.GridSizeEnum;
682 
683  GridScale = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSize(GridSizeEnum) / MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeSizeOriginal(GridSizeEnum);
684  base.Init(objectBuilder);
685 
686  Init(null, null, null, null, null);
687  m_destructibleBlocks.Value = builder.DestructibleBlocks;
688 
689  if (MyFakes.ASSERT_NON_PUBLIC_BLOCKS)
690  AssertNonPublicBlocks(builder);
691 
692  if (MyFakes.REMOVE_NON_PUBLIC_BLOCKS)
693  RemoveNonPublicBlocks(builder);
694 
695  Render.CreateAdditionalModelGenerators(builder != null ? builder.GridSizeEnum : MyCubeSize.Large);
696  m_hasAdditionalModelGenerators = AdditionalModelGenerators.Count > 0;
697 
698  CreateSystems();
699 
700  if (builder != null)
701  {
702  IsStatic = builder.IsStatic;
703  CreatePhysics = builder.CreatePhysics;
704  m_enableSmallToLargeConnections = builder.EnableSmallToLargeConnections;
705  GridSizeEnum = builder.GridSizeEnum;
706  Editable = builder.Editable;
707 
708  GridSystems.BeforeBlockDeserialization(builder);
709 
710  m_cubes.Clear();
711  m_cubeBlocks.Clear();
712  m_fatBlocks.Clear();
713 
714  m_tmpOccupiedCockpits.Clear();
715 
716  for (int i = 0; i<builder.CubeBlocks.Count; i++)
717  {
718  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock cubeBlock = builder.CubeBlocks[i];
719 
720  Debug.Assert(cubeBlock.IntegrityPercent > 0.0f, "Block is in inconsistent state in grid initialization");
721  var block = AddBlock(cubeBlock, false);
722  //Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block was not added");
723 
724  if (block != null)
725  {
726  if (block.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
727  {
728  foreach (var b in (block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock).GetBlocks())
729  if (!lst.Contains(b.BlockDefinition.Id))
730  lst.Add(b.BlockDefinition.Id);
731  }
732  else
733  if (!lst.Contains(block.BlockDefinition.Id))
734  lst.Add(block.BlockDefinition.Id);
735 
736  if (block.FatBlock is MyCockpit)
737  {
738  var cockpit = block.FatBlock as MyCockpit;
739  if (cockpit.Pilot != null)
740  m_tmpOccupiedCockpits.Add(cockpit);
741  }
742  }
743  }
744 
745  GridSystems.AfterBlockDeserialization();
746 
747  if (builder.Skeleton != null)
748  {
749  // After adding blocks!
750  Skeleton.Deserialize(builder.Skeleton, GridSize, GridSize);
751  }
752 
753  Render.RenderData.SetBasePositionHint(Min * GridSize - GridSize);
754  if (rebuildGrid)
755  RebuildGrid();
756 
757  ProfilerShort.Begin("Block groups");
758  foreach (var groupBuilder in builder.BlockGroups)
759  AddGroup(groupBuilder);
760  ProfilerShort.End();
761 
762  if (Physics != null)
763  {
764  Physics.LinearVelocity = builder.LinearVelocity;
765  Physics.AngularVelocity = builder.AngularVelocity;
766  if (!IsStatic)
767  Physics.Shape.BlocksConnectedToWorld.Clear();
768  if (MyPerGameSettings.InventoryMass)
769  m_inventoryMassDirty = true;
770  }
771 
772  XSymmetryPlane = builder.XMirroxPlane;
773  YSymmetryPlane = builder.YMirroxPlane;
774  ZSymmetryPlane = builder.ZMirroxPlane;
775  XSymmetryOdd = builder.XMirroxOdd;
776  YSymmetryOdd = builder.YMirroxOdd;
777  ZSymmetryOdd = builder.ZMirroxOdd;
778 
779  GridSystems.Init(builder);
780 
781  if (builder.DisplayName == null)
782  DisplayName = MakeCustomName();
783  else
784  DisplayName = builder.DisplayName;
785 
786  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_TERMINAL_PROPERTIES)
787  {
788  m_ownershipManager = new MyCubeGridOwnershipManager();
789  m_ownershipManager.Init(this);
790  }
791 
792  if (Hierarchy != null)
793  Hierarchy.OnChildRemoved += Hierarchy_OnChildRemoved;
794  }
795 
796  Render.CastShadows = true;
797  Render.NeedsResolveCastShadow = false;
798 
799  if (MyStructuralIntegrity.Enabled)
800  {
801  // Requires scene information (checking fixed blocks) so wait until scene is created.
802  NeedsUpdate |= MyEntityUpdateEnum.BEFORE_NEXT_FRAME;
803  }
804 
805  // This is deffered here so that the pilot takes control of the full grid
806  foreach (var cockpit in m_tmpOccupiedCockpits)
807  {
808  cockpit.GiveControlToPilot();
809  }
810  m_tmpOccupiedCockpits.Clear();
811  //UpdateDirty();
812 
813  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS)
814  {
815  PrepareMultiBlockInfos();
816  }
817 
818  IsRespawnGrid = builder.IsRespawnGrid;
819  m_playedTime = builder.playedTime;
820  GridGeneralDamageModifier = builder.GridGeneralDamageModifier;
821  LocalCoordSystem = builder.LocalCoordSys;
822  }
823 
824  void Hierarchy_OnChildRemoved(IMyEntity obj)
825  {
826  m_fatBlocks.Remove(obj as MyCubeBlock);
827  }
828 
829  private static MyCubeGrid CreateForSplit(MyCubeGrid originalGrid, long newEntityId)
830  {
831  var builder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject(typeof(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid)) as MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid;
832  if (builder == null)
833  {
834  Debug.Fail("CreateForSplit builder shouldn't be null! Original Grid info: " + originalGrid.ToString());
835  MyLog.Default.WriteLine("CreateForSplit builder shouldn't be null! Original Grid info: " + originalGrid.ToString());
836  return null;
837  }
838  builder.EntityId = newEntityId;
839  builder.GridSizeEnum = originalGrid.GridSizeEnum;
840  builder.IsStatic = originalGrid.IsStatic;
841  builder.PersistentFlags = originalGrid.Render.PersistentFlags;
842  builder.PositionAndOrientation = new MyPositionAndOrientation(originalGrid.WorldMatrix);
843 
844  // We have to call init manually to prevent the grid from being rebuilt with zero blocks, which would immediately mark it for close
845  var newGrid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilderNoinit(builder) as MyCubeGrid;
846 
847  if (newGrid == null) return null;
848 
849  newGrid.InitInternal(builder, rebuildGrid: false);
850  return newGrid;
851  }
852 
853  // RemoveSplit and CreateSplit should behave the same for the old grid. They only differ in the fact that
854  // CreateSplit creates a new grid from the removed blocks, whereas the first method only removes the blocks
855  // from the old grid (this is used for splits without physics - e.g. interior lights)
856 
857  public static void RemoveSplit(MyCubeGrid originalGrid, List<MySlimBlock> blocks, int offset, int count, bool sync = true)
858  {
859  ProfilerShort.Begin("RemoveBlockInternal");
860  for (int i = offset; i < offset + count; i++)
861  {
862  if (blocks.Count <= i)
863  {
864  continue;
865  }
866  var block = blocks[i];
867  if (block == null)
868  continue;
869 
870  if (block.FatBlock != null)
871  originalGrid.Hierarchy.RemoveChild(block.FatBlock);
872 
873  bool oldEnabled = originalGrid.EnableGenerators(false, true);
874  originalGrid.RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: true, markDirtyDisconnects: false);
875  originalGrid.EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
876 
877  originalGrid.Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
878  }
879  ProfilerShort.End();
880 
881  originalGrid.RemoveEmptyBlockGroups();
882 
883  if (sync == true)
884  {
885  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
886  if (!Sync.IsServer) return;
887 
888  originalGrid.AnnounceRemoveSplit(blocks);
889  return;
890  }
891  }
892 
893  public MyCubeGrid SplitByPlane(PlaneD plane)
894  {
895  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Clear();
896  MyCubeGrid grid = null;
897 
898  PlaneD localPlane = PlaneD.Transform(plane, PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
899  foreach (var block in GetBlocks())
900  {
901  BoundingBoxD box = new BoundingBoxD(block.Min * GridSize, block.Max * GridSize);
902  box.Inflate(GridSize/2);
903  if (box.Intersects(localPlane) == PlaneIntersectionType.Back)
904  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Add(block);
905  }
906 
907  if (m_tmpSlimBlocks.Count != 0)
908  {
909  grid = CreateSplit(this, m_tmpSlimBlocks);
910  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Clear();
911  }
912 
913  return grid;
914  }
915 
916  public static MyCubeGrid CreateSplit(MyCubeGrid originalGrid, List<MySlimBlock> blocks, bool sync = true, long newEntityId = 0)
917  {
918  ProfilerShort.Begin("Init grid");
919  var newGrid = MyCubeGrid.CreateForSplit(originalGrid, newEntityId);
920 
921  ProfilerShort.End();
922 
923  if (newGrid == null) return null;
924 
925  Vector3 oldCenterOfMass = originalGrid.Physics.CenterOfMassWorld;
926 
927  MyEntities.Add(newGrid);
928  MyCubeGrid.MoveBlocks(originalGrid, newGrid, blocks, 0, blocks.Count);
929  newGrid.RebuildGrid();
930  if (!newGrid.IsStatic)
931  {
932  newGrid.SetInventoryMassDirty();
933  newGrid.Physics.UpdateMass();
934  }
935 
936  if (originalGrid.IsStatic)
937  {
938  newGrid.TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.GridSplit;
939  //GR: Always testing dynamic for original grid (can be any of the 2 grids)
940  //if (!MySession.Static.EnableConvertToStation)
941  originalGrid.TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.GridSplit;
942  }
943 
944  newGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity = originalGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity;
945  newGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity = originalGrid.Physics.GetVelocityAtPoint(newGrid.Physics.CenterOfMassWorld);
946 
947  // CH: TODO: (Optimization) recalculate the original grid only when all splits are done. This will have to be synced by extra message
948  originalGrid.UpdatePhysicsShape();
949  if (!originalGrid.IsStatic)
950  {
951  originalGrid.SetInventoryMassDirty();
952  originalGrid.Physics.UpdateMass();
953  }
954  Vector3 velocityAtNewCOM = Vector3.Cross(originalGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity, originalGrid.Physics.CenterOfMassWorld - oldCenterOfMass);
955  originalGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity = originalGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity + velocityAtNewCOM;
956 
957  if (originalGrid.OnGridSplit != null)
958  {
959  originalGrid.OnGridSplit(originalGrid, newGrid);
960  }
961 
962  if (sync == true)
963  {
964  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
965  if (!Sync.IsServer) return newGrid;
966 
967  m_tmpBlockPositions.Clear();
968  foreach (var block in blocks)
969  {
970  m_tmpBlockPositions.Add(block.Position);
971  }
972  MyMultiplayer.RemoveForClientIfIncomplete(originalGrid);
973  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(originalGrid, x => x.CreateSplit_Implementation, m_tmpBlockPositions, newGrid.EntityId);
974  }
975 
976  return newGrid;
977  }
978 
979  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
980  public void CreateSplit_Implementation(List<Vector3I> blocks, long newEntityId)
981  {
982  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Clear();
983  foreach (var position in blocks)
984  {
985  var block = GetCubeBlock(position);
986  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block was null when trying to create a grid split. Desync?");
987  if (block == null)
988  {
989  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("Block was null when trying to create a grid split. Desync?");
990  continue;
991  }
992 
993  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Add(block);
994  }
995 
996  MyCubeGrid.CreateSplit(this, m_tmpBlockListReceive, sync: false, newEntityId: newEntityId);
997  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Clear();
998  }
999 
1003  public static void CreateSplits(MyCubeGrid originalGrid, List<MySlimBlock> splitBlocks, List<MyDisconnectHelper.Group> groups, bool sync = true)
1004  {
1005  if (originalGrid == null || originalGrid.Physics == null || groups == null || splitBlocks == null)
1006  {
1007  return;
1008  }
1009 
1010  Vector3 oldCenterOfMass = originalGrid.Physics.CenterOfMassWorld;
1011 
1012  try
1013  {
1014  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null)
1015  {
1016  ProfilerShort.Begin("BeforeGridSplit_SmallToLargeGridConnetivity");
1017  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.BeforeGridSplit_SmallToLargeGridConnectivity(originalGrid);
1018  ProfilerShort.End();
1019  }
1020 
1021  // Create new grids, move blocks
1022  ProfilerShort.Begin("Create grids and move");
1023  var array = groups.GetInternalArray();
1024  for (int i = 0; i < groups.Count; i++)
1025  {
1026  CreateSplitForGroup(originalGrid, splitBlocks, ref array[i]);
1027  }
1028  ProfilerShort.End();
1029 
1030  // Update old grid shape
1031  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update original grid shape");
1032  originalGrid.UpdatePhysicsShape();
1033  ProfilerShort.End();
1034 
1035  // Rebuild new grids
1036  foreach (var newGrid in originalGrid.m_tmpGrids)
1037  {
1038  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update new grid shape");
1039  newGrid.RebuildGrid();
1040  if (originalGrid.IsStatic)
1041  {
1042  if (!MySession.Static.Settings.StationVoxelSupport)
1043  {
1044  newGrid.TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.GridSplit;
1045  originalGrid.TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.GridSplit;
1046  }
1047  }
1048 
1049  newGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity = originalGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity;
1050  newGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity = originalGrid.Physics.GetVelocityAtPoint(newGrid.Physics.CenterOfMassWorld);
1051  ProfilerShort.End();
1052  }
1053 
1054  // Update old grid velocity
1055  Vector3 velocityAtNewCOM = Vector3.Cross(originalGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity, originalGrid.Physics.CenterOfMassWorld - oldCenterOfMass);
1056  originalGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity = originalGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity + velocityAtNewCOM;
1057 
1058  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null)
1059  {
1060  ProfilerShort.Begin("AfterGridSplit_SmallToLargeGridConnetivity");
1061  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AfterGridSplit_SmallToLargeGridConnectivity(originalGrid, originalGrid.m_tmpGrids);
1062  ProfilerShort.End();
1063  }
1064 
1065  var handler = originalGrid.OnGridSplit;
1066  if (handler != null)
1067  {
1068  ProfilerShort.Begin("Handle OnGridSplit");
1069  foreach (var newGrid in originalGrid.m_tmpGrids)
1070  {
1071  handler(originalGrid, newGrid);
1072  }
1073  ProfilerShort.End();
1074  }
1075 
1076  foreach (var newGrid in originalGrid.m_tmpGrids)
1077  {
1078  newGrid.GridSystems.UpdatePower();
1079  }
1080 
1081  if (sync)
1082  {
1083  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
1084  if (!Sync.IsServer) return;
1085 
1086  MyMultiplayer.RemoveForClientIfIncomplete(originalGrid);
1087  m_tmpBlockPositions.Clear();
1088  foreach (var block in splitBlocks)
1089  {
1090  m_tmpBlockPositions.Add(block.Position);
1091  }
1092 
1093  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(originalGrid, x => x.CreateSplits_Implementation, m_tmpBlockPositions, groups);
1094 
1095  foreach (var newGrid in originalGrid.m_tmpGrids)
1096  {
1097  newGrid.IsSplit = true;
1098  MyMultiplayer.ReplicateImmediatelly(MyExternalReplicable.FindByObject(newGrid), MyExternalReplicable.FindByObject(originalGrid));
1099  newGrid.IsSplit = false;
1100  }
1101  }
1102  }
1103  finally
1104  {
1105  originalGrid.m_tmpGrids.Clear();
1106  }
1107  }
1108 
1109  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
1110  public void CreateSplits_Implementation(List<Vector3I> blocks, List<MyDisconnectHelper.Group> groups)
1111  {
1112 
1113  // Its already to late. Server send info he wants this to be closed so there is no need to process.
1114  // Its not perfect solution, but due to the fact that close can come before split, there is no other choice for now.
1115  if (this.MarkedForClose)
1116  return;
1117 
1118  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Clear();
1119 
1120  // groups should start from index 0 and they should not have any holes in indexes
1121  Debug.Assert(groups[0].FirstBlockIndex == 0 && blocks.Count == groups[groups.Count - 1].FirstBlockIndex + groups[groups.Count - 1].BlockCount);
1122 
1123  for (int gr = 0; gr < groups.Count; gr++)
1124  {
1125  var group = groups[gr];
1126  int groupBlockCount = group.BlockCount;
1127  for (int i = group.FirstBlockIndex; i < group.FirstBlockIndex + group.BlockCount; i++)
1128  {
1129  var block = GetCubeBlock(blocks[i]);
1130  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block was null when trying to create a grid split. Desync?");
1131  if (block == null)
1132  {
1133  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("Block was null when trying to create a grid split. Desync?");
1134  // block is missing - some desync
1135  --groupBlockCount;
1136  if (groupBlockCount == 0)
1137  group.IsValid = false;
1138  }
1139  // Note null block can be added (to avoid changing of group's FirstBlockIndex and BlockCount when block is not found)!
1140  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Add(block);
1141  }
1142  groups[gr] = group;
1143  }
1144 
1145  Debug.Assert(blocks.Count == m_tmpBlockListReceive.Count);
1146 
1147  //foreach (var position in blocks)
1148  //{
1149  // var block = GetCubeBlock(position);
1150  // Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block was null when trying to create a grid split. Desync?");
1151  // if (block == null)
1152  // {
1153  // MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("Block was null when trying to create a grid split. Desync?");
1154  // continue;
1155  // }
1156  // m_tmpBlockListReceive.Add(block);
1157  //}
1158 
1159  MyCubeGrid.CreateSplits(this, m_tmpBlockListReceive, groups, false);
1160  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Clear();
1161  }
1162 
1163  private static void CreateSplitForGroup(MyCubeGrid originalGrid, List<MySlimBlock> splitBlocks, ref MyDisconnectHelper.Group group)
1164  {
1165  // In voxels test
1166  if (!originalGrid.IsStatic && Sync.IsServer && group.IsValid)
1167  {
1168  ProfilerShort.Begin("IsInVoxels");
1169  int inVoxels = 0;
1170  for (int bi = group.FirstBlockIndex; bi < group.FirstBlockIndex + group.BlockCount; bi++)
1171  {
1172  if (MyDisconnectHelper.IsDestroyedInVoxels(splitBlocks[bi]))
1173  {
1174  inVoxels++;
1175  if ((inVoxels / (float)group.BlockCount) > 0.4f) // 40% of blocks in voxels
1176  {
1177  group.IsValid = false;
1178  break;
1179  }
1180  }
1181  }
1182  ProfilerShort.End();
1183  }
1184 
1185  // Can have physics test
1186  group.IsValid = group.IsValid && CanHavePhysics(splitBlocks, group.FirstBlockIndex, group.BlockCount);
1187 
1188  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer || !(group.IsValid && group.EntityId == 0), "Invalid split entity id");
1189 
1190  if (group.BlockCount == 1 && splitBlocks.Count > group.FirstBlockIndex && splitBlocks[group.FirstBlockIndex] != null)
1191  {
1192  var firstBlock = splitBlocks[group.FirstBlockIndex];
1193  if (firstBlock.FatBlock is MyFracturedBlock)
1194  {
1195  group.IsValid = false;
1196  if (Sync.IsServer)
1197  MyDestructionHelper.CreateFracturePiece(firstBlock.FatBlock as MyFracturedBlock, true);
1198  }
1199  else if (firstBlock.FatBlock != null && firstBlock.FatBlock.Components.Has<MyFractureComponentBase>())
1200  {
1201  group.IsValid = false;
1202  if (Sync.IsServer)
1203  {
1204  var component = firstBlock.GetFractureComponent();
1205  if (component != null)
1206  MyDestructionHelper.CreateFracturePiece(component, true);
1207  }
1208  }
1209  else if (firstBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
1210  {
1211  var compound = firstBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
1212  bool allFractureComponent = true;
1213  foreach (var blockInCompound in compound.GetBlocks())
1214  {
1215  allFractureComponent &= blockInCompound.FatBlock.Components.Has<MyFractureComponentBase>();
1216  if (!allFractureComponent)
1217  break;
1218  }
1219 
1220  if (allFractureComponent)
1221  {
1222  group.IsValid = false;
1223  if (Sync.IsServer)
1224  {
1225  foreach (var blockInCompound in compound.GetBlocks())
1226  {
1227  var component = blockInCompound.GetFractureComponent();
1228  if (component != null)
1229  MyDestructionHelper.CreateFracturePiece(component, true);
1230  }
1231  }
1232  }
1233  }
1234  }
1235 
1236  if (group.IsValid)
1237  {
1238  ProfilerShort.Begin("Init grid");
1239  var newGrid = MyCubeGrid.CreateForSplit(originalGrid, group.EntityId);
1240  newGrid.DebugCreatedBy = MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked ? DebugCreatedBy.LocalSplit : DebugCreatedBy.ServerSplit;
1241  ProfilerShort.End();
1242 
1243  if (newGrid != null)
1244  {
1245  ProfilerShort.Begin("Move blocks");
1246  originalGrid.m_tmpGrids.Add(newGrid);
1247  MyEntities.Add(newGrid);
1248  MyCubeGrid.MoveBlocks(originalGrid, newGrid, splitBlocks, group.FirstBlockIndex, group.BlockCount);
1249  group.EntityId = newGrid.EntityId;
1250  ProfilerShort.End();
1251 
1252  if (newGrid.IsStatic && Sync.IsServer)
1253  {
1254  MatrixD worldMat = newGrid.WorldMatrix;
1255  bool result = MyCoordinateSystem.Static.IsLocalCoordSysExist(ref worldMat, newGrid.GridSize);
1256  if (newGrid.GridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Large)
1257  {
1258  if (result)
1259  {
1260  MyCoordinateSystem.Static.RegisterCubeGrid(newGrid);
1261  }
1262  else
1263  {
1264  MyCoordinateSystem.Static.CreateCoordSys(newGrid, MyCubeBuilder.CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.StaticGridAlignToCenter, true);
1265  }
1266  }
1267  }
1268 
1269  }
1270  else
1271  {
1272  Debug.Fail("Split grid not created for unknown reason");
1273  group.IsValid = false;
1274  }
1275  }
1276 
1277  if (!group.IsValid)
1278  {
1279  RemoveSplit(originalGrid, splitBlocks, group.FirstBlockIndex, group.BlockCount, false);
1280  }
1281 
1282  Debug.Assert(!(group.IsValid && group.EntityId == 0), "Entity id is 0, but grid is marked as valid");
1283  }
1284 
1285  private void AddGroup(MyObjectBuilder_BlockGroup groupBuilder)
1286  {
1287  if (groupBuilder.Blocks.Count == 0)
1288  return;
1289 
1290  MyBlockGroup group = new MyBlockGroup(this);
1291  group.Init(groupBuilder);
1292  BlockGroups.Add(group);
1293  }
1294 
1295  public override MyObjectBuilder_EntityBase GetObjectBuilder(bool copy = false)
1296  {
1297  MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid ob = (MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid)base.GetObjectBuilder(copy);
1298  GetObjectBuilderInternal(ob, copy);
1299  return ob;
1300  }
1301 
1302  private void GetObjectBuilderInternal(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid ob, bool copy)
1303  {
1304  ob.GridSizeEnum = GridSizeEnum;
1305  if (ob.Skeleton == null)
1306  ob.Skeleton = new List<BoneInfo>();
1307  ob.Skeleton.Clear();
1308  Skeleton.Serialize(ob.Skeleton, GridSize, this);
1309 
1310  ob.IsStatic = IsStatic;
1311  ob.Editable = Editable;
1312 
1313  ob.CubeBlocks.Clear();
1314  foreach (var block in m_cubeBlocks)
1315  {
1316  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock objectBuilder = null;
1317  if (copy)
1318  objectBuilder = (MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock)block.GetCopyObjectBuilder();
1319  else
1320  objectBuilder = (MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock)block.GetObjectBuilder();
1321  Debug.Assert(objectBuilder != null, "Could not get object builder for cube block");
1322  if (objectBuilder != null)
1323  ob.CubeBlocks.Add(objectBuilder);
1324  }
1325 
1326  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(ob.CubeBlocks.Count > 0);
1327 
1328  ob.PersistentFlags = this.Render.PersistentFlags;
1329 
1330  if (Physics != null)
1331  {
1332  ob.LinearVelocity = Physics.LinearVelocity;
1333  ob.AngularVelocity = Physics.AngularVelocity;
1334  }
1335  else
1336  {
1337  ob.LinearVelocity = Vector3.Zero;
1338  ob.AngularVelocity = Vector3.Zero;
1339  }
1340  ob.XMirroxPlane = XSymmetryPlane;
1341  ob.YMirroxPlane = YSymmetryPlane;
1342  ob.ZMirroxPlane = ZSymmetryPlane;
1343  ob.XMirroxOdd = XSymmetryOdd;
1344  ob.YMirroxOdd = YSymmetryOdd;
1345  ob.ZMirroxOdd = ZSymmetryOdd;
1346 
1347  if(copy)
1348  ob.Name = null;
1349 
1350  ob.BlockGroups.Clear();
1351  foreach (var group in BlockGroups)
1352  {
1353  ob.BlockGroups.Add(group.GetObjectBuilder());
1354  }
1355 
1356  ob.DisplayName = DisplayName;
1357  ob.DestructibleBlocks = DestructibleBlocks;
1358 
1359  ob.IsRespawnGrid = IsRespawnGrid;
1360  ob.playedTime = m_playedTime;
1361  ob.GridGeneralDamageModifier = GridGeneralDamageModifier;
1362  ob.LocalCoordSys = LocalCoordSystem;
1363 
1364  GridSystems.GetObjectBuilder(ob);
1365  }
1366 
1367  internal void HavokSystemIDChanged(int id)
1368  {
1369  if (OnHavokSystemIDChanged != null)
1370  OnHavokSystemIDChanged(id);
1371  }
1372 
1373  private void UpdatePhysicsShape()
1374  {
1375  Physics.UpdateShape();
1376  }
1377 
1378  private void UpdateGravity()
1379  {
1380  ProfilerShort.Begin("Gravity");
1381  if (IsStatic == false && Physics != null && Physics.Enabled && !Physics.IsWelded)
1382  {
1383  if (Physics.DisableGravity <= 0)
1384  {
1385  RecalculateGravity();
1386  }
1387  else
1388  Physics.DisableGravity--;
1389  }
1390  ProfilerShort.End();
1391  }
1392 
1393  public override void UpdateOnceBeforeFrame()
1394  {
1395  if (MyStructuralIntegrity.Enabled)
1396  {
1397  CreateStructuralIntegrity();
1398  }
1399  base.UpdateOnceBeforeFrame();
1400 
1401  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_GRID_SYSTEM_UPDATE || MyFakes.ENABLE_GRID_SYSTEM_ONCE_BEFORE_FRAME_UPDATE)
1402  {
1403  GridSystems.UpdateOnceBeforeFrame();
1404  }
1405 
1406  ActivatePhysics();
1407  }
1408 
1409  public void CreateStructuralIntegrity()
1410  {
1411  if (m_gridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Large)
1412  {
1413  StructuralIntegrity = new MyStructuralIntegrity(this);
1414  }
1415  }
1416 
1417  public void CloseStructuralIntegrity()
1418  {
1419  if (StructuralIntegrity != null)
1420  {
1421  StructuralIntegrity.Close();
1422  StructuralIntegrity = null;
1423  }
1424  }
1425 
1426  public override void UpdateBeforeSimulation()
1427  {
1428  MySimpleProfiler.Begin("Grid");
1429  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_GRID_SYSTEM_UPDATE)
1430  {
1431  ProfilerShort.Begin("Grid systems");
1432  GridSystems.UpdateBeforeSimulation();
1433  ProfilerShort.End();
1434  }
1435 
1436  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update generators");
1437  if (m_hasAdditionalModelGenerators)
1438  {
1439  // Generators must be updated before grid splits.
1440  foreach (var generator in AdditionalModelGenerators)
1441  generator.UpdateBeforeSimulation();
1442  }
1443 
1444  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Lazy updates");
1445  DoLazyUpdates();
1446 
1447 
1448  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Base update");
1449  base.UpdateBeforeSimulation();
1450 
1451 
1452  if (Physics != null)
1453  {
1454  UpdatePhysicsShape();
1455  }
1456 
1457  //MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawAxis(PositionComp.WorldMatrix, 500, false);
1458  //MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawText3D(PositionComp.WorldMatrix.Translation, (PositionComp.WorldMatrix.Translation - MySector.MainCamera.Position).Length().ToString(), Color.White, 0.7f, false);
1459 
1460 
1461  ProfilerShort.End();
1462  MySimpleProfiler.End("Grid");
1463  }
1464 
1465  protected static float GetLineWidthForGizmo(IMyGizmoDrawableObject block, BoundingBox box)
1466  {
1467  //we don't want to gizmo line be smaller in distance, so we need to adjust line width according to distance from camera
1468  float minDistance = m_gizmoMaxDistanceFromCamera;
1469 
1470  foreach (var corner in box.Corners)
1471  {
1472  minDistance = (float)Math.Min(minDistance, Math.Abs(World.MySector.MainCamera.GetDistanceFromPoint(Vector3.Transform(block.GetPositionInGrid() + corner, block.GetWorldMatrix()))));
1473  }
1474  Vector3 FieldSize = box.Max - box.Min;
1475  //draw transparent box adjusts witdh based on box size, we don't want this, so we need to inverse this operation
1476  float minFieldSize = MathHelper.Max(1, MathHelper.Min(MathHelper.Min(FieldSize.X, FieldSize.Y), FieldSize.Z));
1477  return (minDistance * m_gizmoDrawLineScale) / minFieldSize;
1478  }
1479 
1480  public bool IsGizmoDrawingEnabled()
1481  {
1482  return ShowSenzorGizmos || ShowGravityGizmos || ShowAntennaGizmos;
1483  }
1484 
1485  public override void PrepareForDraw()
1486  {
1487  ProfilerShort.Begin("Base");
1488  base.PrepareForDraw();
1489  ProfilerShort.End();
1490  if (m_dirtyRegion.IsDirty)
1491  {
1492  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update dirty");
1493  // Never update more often than every 10th frame. Otherwise gatling guns can force update every frame causing performance issues. Tweak if necessary
1494  if (m_updateDirtyCounter <= 0)
1495  {
1496  UpdateDirty();
1497  m_updateDirtyCounter = 10;
1498  }
1499  ProfilerShort.End();
1500  }
1501  if (m_updateDirtyCounter > 0)
1502  {
1503  m_updateDirtyCounter--;
1504  }
1505 
1506  ProfilerShort.Begin("Grid systems - PrepareForDraw");
1507  GridSystems.PrepareForDraw();
1508  ProfilerShort.End();
1509 
1510  //gravity and senzor gizmos needs to be drawn even when object / parent grid is not visible
1511  ProfilerShort.Begin("Gizmo");
1512  if (IsGizmoDrawingEnabled())
1513  {
1514  foreach (var block in m_cubeBlocks)
1515  {
1516  if ((block.FatBlock is IMyGizmoDrawableObject))
1517  {
1518  DrawObjectGizmo(block);
1519  }
1520  }
1521  }
1522  ProfilerShort.End();
1523  }
1524 
1525  private static void DrawObjectGizmo(MySlimBlock block)
1526  {
1527  IMyGizmoDrawableObject drawObject = block.FatBlock as IMyGizmoDrawableObject;
1528  if (drawObject.CanBeDrawed())
1529  {
1530  Color gizmoColor = drawObject.GetGizmoColor();
1531  MatrixD worldMatrix = drawObject.GetWorldMatrix();
1532 
1533  BoundingBox? gizmoBoundingBox = drawObject.GetBoundingBox();
1534 
1535  if (null != gizmoBoundingBox)
1536  {
1537  float gizmoLineWidth = GetLineWidthForGizmo(drawObject, gizmoBoundingBox.Value);
1538  BoundingBoxD box = (BoundingBoxD)gizmoBoundingBox.Value;
1539  MySimpleObjectDraw.DrawTransparentBox(ref worldMatrix, ref box, ref gizmoColor, MySimpleObjectRasterizer.SolidAndWireframe, 1, gizmoLineWidth);
1540  }
1541  else
1542  {
1543  float radius = drawObject.GetRadius();
1544  float distanceToObject = (float)MySector.MainCamera.GetDistanceFromPoint(worldMatrix.Translation);
1545  float gizmoDistanceToCamera = (float)(radius - MySector.MainCamera.GetDistanceFromPoint(worldMatrix.Translation));
1546  float thickness = m_gizmoDrawLineScale * Math.Min(m_gizmoMaxDistanceFromCamera, Math.Abs(gizmoDistanceToCamera));
1547  int projectionId = -1;
1548  MySimpleObjectDraw.DrawTransparentSphere(ref worldMatrix, radius, ref gizmoColor, MySimpleObjectRasterizer.SolidAndWireframe, 20, null, null, thickness, projectionId);
1549 
1550  if (drawObject.EnableLongDrawDistance() && MyFakes.ENABLE_LONG_DISTANCE_GIZMO_DRAWING)
1551  {
1552  MyBillboardViewProjection viewProjection;
1553  viewProjection.CameraPosition = MySector.MainCamera.Position;
1554  viewProjection.View = MySector.MainCamera.ViewMatrix;
1555  viewProjection.ViewAtZero = default(Matrix);
1556  viewProjection.Viewport = MySector.MainCamera.Viewport;
1557  viewProjection.DepthRead = true;
1558 
1559 
1560  float aspectRatio = viewProjection.Viewport.Width / viewProjection.Viewport.Height;
1561  viewProjection.Projection = Matrix.CreatePerspectiveFieldOfView(MySector.MainCamera.FieldOfView, aspectRatio, 1, 100);
1562  viewProjection.Projection.M33 = -1;
1563  viewProjection.Projection.M34 = -1;
1564  viewProjection.Projection.M43 = 0;
1565  viewProjection.Projection.M44 = 0;
1566 
1567  projectionId = 10;
1568  VRageRender.MyRenderProxy.AddBillboardViewProjection(projectionId, viewProjection);
1569 
1570  MySimpleObjectDraw.DrawTransparentSphere(ref worldMatrix, radius, ref gizmoColor, MySimpleObjectRasterizer.SolidAndWireframe, 20, null, null, thickness, projectionId);
1571  }
1572  }
1573  }
1574  }
1575 
1576  public override void UpdateBeforeSimulation10()
1577  {
1578  MySimpleProfiler.Begin("Grid");
1579  base.UpdateBeforeSimulation10();
1580 
1581  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_GRID_SYSTEM_UPDATE)
1582  {
1583  GridSystems.UpdateBeforeSimulation10();
1584  }
1585  MySimpleProfiler.End("Grid");
1586  }
1587 
1588  public override void UpdateBeforeSimulation100()
1589  {
1590  MySimpleProfiler.Begin("Grid");
1591  base.UpdateBeforeSimulation100();
1592 
1593  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_GRID_SYSTEM_UPDATE)
1594  {
1595  GridSystems.UpdateBeforeSimulation100();
1596  }
1597  MySimpleProfiler.End("Grid");
1598  }
1599 
1600  bool m_inventoryMassDirty;
1601  internal void SetInventoryMassDirty()
1602  {
1603  m_inventoryMassDirty = true;
1604  }
1605 
1606  public int GetCurrentMass(MyCharacter pilot = null)
1607  {
1608  int baseMass;
1609  return GetCurrentMass(out baseMass, pilot);
1610  }
1611 
1612  public int GetCurrentMass(out int baseMass, MyCharacter pilot = null)
1613  {
1614  baseMass = 0;
1615  int currentMass = 0;
1616  var physicalGroup = MyCubeGridGroups.Static.Physical.GetGroup(this);
1617  if (physicalGroup != null)
1618  {
1619  foreach (var node in physicalGroup.Nodes)
1620  {
1621  var cubeGrid = node.NodeData;
1622  if (cubeGrid == null || cubeGrid.Physics == null || cubeGrid.Physics.Shape == null)
1623  continue;
1624 
1625  var massProperties = cubeGrid.Physics.Shape.MassProperties;
1626  var baseMassProperties = cubeGrid.Physics.Shape.BaseMassProperties;
1627  if (IsStatic || !massProperties.HasValue || !baseMassProperties.HasValue)
1628  continue;
1629 
1630  float gridTotalMass = massProperties.Value.Mass;
1631  float gridBaseMass = baseMassProperties.Value.Mass;
1632  float inventoryMass = gridTotalMass - gridBaseMass;
1633  baseMass += (int)gridBaseMass;
1634  currentMass += (int)(gridBaseMass + inventoryMass * MySession.Static.Settings.InventorySizeMultiplier - (pilot != null ? pilot.BaseMass : 0.0f));
1635  }
1636  }
1637  return currentMass;
1638  }
1639 
1640  public override void UpdateAfterSimulation100()
1641  {
1642  MySimpleProfiler.Begin("Grid");
1643  base.UpdateAfterSimulation100();
1644  //trash removal outside world doesnt work in update before simulation becaouse m_worldPositionChanged is set during simulation and unset
1645  //in update after so it was allways false in update before
1646  UpdateGravity();
1647 
1648  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_BOUNDINGBOX_SHRINKING && m_boundsDirty)
1649  {
1650  var elapsedTime = MySandboxGame.TotalTimeInMilliseconds - m_lastUpdatedDirtyBounds;
1651  if (elapsedTime > 30000)
1652  {
1653  ProfilerShort.Begin("Recalculate bounds lazily");
1654  RecalcBounds();
1655  m_boundsDirty = false;
1656  m_lastUpdatedDirtyBounds = MySandboxGame.TotalTimeInMilliseconds;
1657  if (GridSystems.GasSystem != null)
1658  GridSystems.GasSystem.OnCubeGridShrinked();
1659  ProfilerShort.End();
1660  }
1661  }
1662 
1663  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_GRID_SYSTEM_UPDATE)
1664  {
1665  ProfilerShort.Begin("GridSystems");
1666  GridSystems.UpdateAfterSimulation100();
1667  ProfilerShort.End();
1668  }
1669 
1670  MySimpleProfiler.End("Grid");
1671  }
1672 
1673  public override void UpdateAfterSimulation()
1674  {
1675  MySimpleProfiler.Begin("Grid");
1676  base.UpdateAfterSimulation();
1677 
1678  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update Shape");
1679  //welding mass props debug
1680  //if(MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.Entity.GetTopMostParent() == this)
1681  //{
1682  // MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawText2D(new Vector2(300, 300), Physics.RigidBody.InverseInertiaTensor.Scale.ToString(), Color.White, 0.75f);
1683  // MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawText2D(new Vector2(300, 330), Physics.RigidBody.InertiaTensor.Scale.ToString(), Color.White, 0.75f);
1684  // MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawText2D(new Vector2(300, 360), Physics.RigidBody.Mass.ToString(), Color.White, 0.75f);
1685  // var pos = new Vector2(300, 380);
1686  // MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawText2D(pos, Physics.WeldInfo.MassElement.Properties.InertiaTensor.Scale.ToString(), Color.White, 0.75f);
1687  // pos.Y += 20;
1688  // foreach(var child in Physics.WeldInfo.Children)
1689  // {
1690  // MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawText2D(pos, child.WeldInfo.MassElement.Properties.InertiaTensor.Scale.ToString(), Color.White, 0.75f);
1691  // pos.Y += 20;
1692  // }
1693  //}
1694 
1695  if (m_hasAdditionalModelGenerators)
1696  {
1697  foreach (var generator in AdditionalModelGenerators)
1698  generator.UpdateAfterSimulation();
1699  }
1700 
1701  SendRemovedBlocks();
1702  SendRemovedBlocksWithIds();
1703 
1704  if (!CanHavePhysics())
1705  {
1706  m_worldPositionChanged = false;
1707  if (Sync.IsServer)
1708  Close();
1709  ProfilerShort.End();
1710  MySimpleProfiler.End("Grid");
1711  return;
1712  }
1713 
1714  if (Sync.IsServer)
1715  {
1716  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_FRACTURE_COMPONENT)
1717  {
1718  if (Physics != null)
1719  {
1720  if (Physics.GetFractureBlockComponents().Count > 0)
1721  {
1722  try
1723  {
1724  foreach (var info in Physics.GetFractureBlockComponents())
1725  CreateFractureBlockComponent(info);
1726  }
1727  finally
1728  {
1729  Physics.ClearFractureBlockComponents();
1730  }
1731  }
1732 
1733  Physics.CheckLastDestroyedBlockFracturePieces();
1734  }
1735  }
1736  else
1737  {
1738  if (Physics != null && Physics.GetFracturedBlocks().Count > 0)
1739  {
1740  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(false);
1741  foreach (var info in Physics.GetFracturedBlocks())
1742  {
1743  CreateFracturedBlock(info);
1744  }
1745  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled);
1746  }
1747  }
1748  }
1749 
1750  StepStructuralIntegrity();
1751 
1752  if (TestDynamic != MyTestDynamicReason.NoReason)
1753  {
1754  if (!MyCubeGrid.ShouldBeStatic(this, TestDynamic) && IsStatic)
1755  {
1756  ConvertToDynamic();
1757  }
1758  TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.NoReason;
1759  }
1760 
1761  DoLazyUpdates();
1762 
1763  if (Physics != null && Physics.Enabled)
1764  {
1765  if (!Physics.IsWelded)
1766  {
1767  Physics.RigidBody.Gravity = m_gravity;
1768  }
1769 
1770  if (m_inventoryMassDirty)
1771  {
1772  m_inventoryMassDirty = false;
1773  Physics.Shape.UpdateMassFromInventories(m_cubeBlocks, Physics); // TODO: MK: Store inventory blocks in cubegrid and only check those
1774  }
1775 
1776  if (Physics.RigidBody2 != null)
1777  {
1778  /*
1779  //No need, we use ApplyHardKeyFrame utility
1780  if (Physics.RigidBody2.LinearVelocity != Physics.RigidBody.LinearVelocity)
1781  Physics.RigidBody2.LinearVelocity = Physics.RigidBody.LinearVelocity;
1782 
1783  if (Physics.RigidBody2.AngularVelocity != Physics.RigidBody.AngularVelocity)
1784  Physics.RigidBody2.AngularVelocity = Physics.RigidBody.AngularVelocity;
1785  */
1786 
1787  if (Physics.RigidBody2.CenterOfMassLocal != Physics.RigidBody.CenterOfMassLocal)
1788  Physics.RigidBody2.CenterOfMassLocal = Physics.RigidBody.CenterOfMassLocal;
1789  }
1790  }
1791 
1792  m_worldPositionChanged = false;
1793  ProfilerShort.End();
1794  MySimpleProfiler.End("Grid");
1795  }
1796 
1797  private void CreateFractureBlockComponent(MyFractureComponentBase.Info info)
1798  {
1799  if (info.Entity.MarkedForClose)
1800  return;
1801 
1802  Debug.Assert(!info.Entity.Components.Has<MyFractureComponentBase>());
1803 
1804  MyFractureComponentCubeBlock fractureComponent = new MyFractureComponentCubeBlock();
1805  info.Entity.Components.Add<MyFractureComponentBase>(fractureComponent);
1806  fractureComponent.SetShape(info.Shape, info.Compound);
1807 
1808  if (Sync.IsServer)
1809  {
1810  MyCubeBlock cubeBlock = info.Entity as MyCubeBlock;
1811  if (cubeBlock != null)
1812  {
1813  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.RemoveBlockSmallToLargeConnection(cubeBlock.SlimBlock);
1814 
1815  var existingSlimBlock = cubeBlock.CubeGrid.GetCubeBlock(cubeBlock.Position);
1816  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = existingSlimBlock != null ? existingSlimBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock : null;
1817  if (compoundBlock != null)
1818  {
1819  ushort? compoundId = compoundBlock.GetBlockId(cubeBlock.SlimBlock);
1820  if (compoundId != null)
1821  {
1822  var builder = (MyObjectBuilder_FractureComponentBase)fractureComponent.Serialize();
1823  MySyncDestructions.CreateFractureComponent(cubeBlock.CubeGrid.EntityId, cubeBlock.Position, compoundId.Value, builder);
1824  }
1825  }
1826  else
1827  {
1828  var builder = (MyObjectBuilder_FractureComponentBase)fractureComponent.Serialize();
1829  MySyncDestructions.CreateFractureComponent(cubeBlock.CubeGrid.EntityId, cubeBlock.Position, 0xFFFF, builder);
1830  }
1831 
1832  cubeBlock.SlimBlock.ApplyDestructionDamage(fractureComponent.GetIntegrityRatioFromFracturedPieceCounts());
1833  }
1834  }
1835  }
1836 
1837  private void StepStructuralIntegrity()
1838  {
1839  if (!MyStructuralIntegrity.Enabled || Physics == null || Physics.HavokWorld == null)
1840  {
1841  return;
1842  }
1843  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.StructuralIntegrity.Update");
1844 
1845  if (StructuralIntegrity == null)
1846  CreateStructuralIntegrity();
1847 
1848  if (StructuralIntegrity != null)
1849  {
1850  StructuralIntegrity.Update(VRage.Game.MyEngineConstants.UPDATE_STEP_SIZE_IN_SECONDS);
1851  }
1852 
1853  ProfilerShort.End();
1854  }
1855 
1856  public void ResetStructuralIntegrity()
1857  {
1858  if (StructuralIntegrity != null)
1859  {
1860  StructuralIntegrity = null;
1861  }
1862  }
1863 
1864  internal void RemoveGroup(MyBlockGroup group)
1865  {
1866  BlockGroups.Remove(group);
1867 
1868  GridSystems.RemoveGroup(group);
1869  }
1870 
1871  internal void RemoveGroupByName(string name)
1872  {
1873  int index = BlockGroups.FindIndex(g => g.Name.CompareTo(name) == 0);
1874  if (index == -1)
1875  return;
1876 
1877  MyBlockGroup group = BlockGroups[index];
1878  BlockGroups.RemoveAt(index);
1879  GridSystems.RemoveGroup(group);
1880  }
1881 
1882  internal void AddGroup(MyBlockGroup group)
1883  {
1884  foreach (var g in BlockGroups)
1885  if (g.Name.CompareTo(group.Name) == 0)
1886  {
1887  BlockGroups.Remove(g);
1888  if (group.CubeGrid != this)
1889  group.Blocks.AddList(g.Blocks);
1890  break;
1891  }
1892  group.CubeGrid = this;
1893  BlockGroups.Add(group);
1894 
1895  GridSystems.AddGroup(group);
1896  }
1897 
1898  internal void OnAddedToGroup(MyGridLogicalGroupData group)
1899  {
1900  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.OnAddedToGroup");
1901 
1902  GridSystems.OnAddedToGroup(group);
1903 
1904  if (AddedToLogicalGroup != null)
1905  AddedToLogicalGroup(group);
1906 
1907  ProfilerShort.End();
1908  }
1909 
1910  internal void OnRemovedFromGroup(MyGridLogicalGroupData group)
1911  {
1912  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGride.OnRemovedFromGroup");
1913 
1914  GridSystems.OnRemovedFromGroup(group);
1915 
1916  if (RemovedFromLogicalGroup != null)
1917  RemovedFromLogicalGroup();
1918 
1919  ProfilerShort.End();
1920  }
1921 
1922  internal void OnAddedToGroup(MyGridPhysicalGroupData groupData)
1923  {
1924  GridSystems.OnAddedToGroup(groupData);
1925  }
1926 
1927  internal void OnRemovedFromGroup(MyGridPhysicalGroupData group)
1928  {
1929  GridSystems.OnRemovedFromGroup(group);
1930  }
1931 
1935  private void TryReduceGroupControl()
1936  {
1937  var controller = Sync.Players.GetEntityController(this);
1938  if (controller != null && controller.ControlledEntity is MyCockpit)
1939  {
1940  var cockpit = controller.ControlledEntity as MyCockpit;
1941  if (cockpit.CubeGrid == this)
1942  {
1943  var logicalGroups = MyCubeGridGroups.Static.Logical;
1944  var group = logicalGroups.GetGroup(this);
1945  if (group != null) // CH:TODO: During exitting to the main menu, the group can be null according to some crash logs. Find out why
1946  foreach (var node in group.Nodes)
1947  {
1948  if (node.NodeData == this) continue;
1949 
1950  // CH: This is to catch a nullref (unrelated to the previous comment)
1951  if (MySession.Static == null) MyLog.Default.WriteLine("MySession.Static was null");
1952  else if (MySession.Static.SyncLayer == null) MyLog.Default.WriteLine("MySession.Static.SyncLayer was null");
1953  else if (Sync.Clients == null) MyLog.Default.WriteLine("Sync.Clients was null");
1954 
1955  Sync.Players.TryReduceControl(cockpit, node.NodeData);
1956  }
1957  }
1958  }
1959  }
1960 
1961  public override void OnAddedToScene(object source)
1962  {
1963  // On clients grids can be replicated only by replication
1964  //if (!Sync.IsServer)
1965  //{
1966  //Debug.Assert(DebugCreatedBy == DebugCreatedBy.FromServer || DebugCreatedBy == DebugCreatedBy.Clipboard || DebugCreatedBy == DebugCreatedBy.ServerSplit, "Creating grid locally on client, invalid in MP!");
1967  //}
1968 
1969  base.OnAddedToScene(source);
1970  MyCubeGridGroups.Static.AddNode(GridLinkTypeEnum.Logical, this);
1971  MyCubeGridGroups.Static.AddNode(GridLinkTypeEnum.Physical, this);
1972  RecalculateGravity();
1973  }
1974 
1975  public override void OnRemovedFromScene(object source)
1976  {
1977  base.OnRemovedFromScene(source);
1978  MyCubeGridGroups.Static.RemoveNode(GridLinkTypeEnum.Physical, this);
1979  MyCubeGridGroups.Static.RemoveNode(GridLinkTypeEnum.Logical, this);
1980  }
1981 
1982  protected override void BeforeDelete()
1983  {
1984  SendRemovedBlocks();
1985  SendRemovedBlocksWithIds();
1986 
1987  m_cubes.Clear();
1988  m_targetingList.Clear();
1989  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_NEW_SOUNDS && MySession.Static.Settings.RealisticSound && MyFakes.ENABLE_NEW_SOUNDS_QUICK_UPDATE)
1990  MyEntity3DSoundEmitter.UpdateEntityEmitters(true, false, false);
1991 
1992  // This is here because of groups, not better way to do it
1993  // also network sync is disabled for terminal systems and groups are unlinked here
1994  MyEntities.Remove(this);
1995  UnregisterBlocksBeforeClose();
1996 
1997  Render.CloseModelGenerators();
1998 
1999  base.BeforeDelete();
2000 
2001  GridCounter--;
2002  }
2003 
2004  private void UnregisterBlocks(IEnumerable<MySlimBlock> cubeBlocks)
2005  {
2006  foreach (var block in cubeBlocks)
2007  {
2008  if (block.FatBlock != null)
2009  {
2010  GridSystems.UnregisterFromSystems(block.FatBlock);
2011  }
2012  }
2013  }
2014 
2015  private void UnregisterBlocksBeforeClose()
2016  {
2017  GridSystems.BeforeGridClose();
2018 
2019  UnregisterBlocks(m_cubeBlocks);
2020 
2021  GridSystems.AfterGridClose();
2022  }
2023 
2024  public override bool GetIntersectionWithLine(ref LineD line, out MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? tri, IntersectionFlags flags = IntersectionFlags.ALL_TRIANGLES)
2025  {
2026  bool ret = GetIntersectionWithLine(ref line, ref m_hitInfoTmp, flags);
2027  tri = m_hitInfoTmp.Triangle;
2028  return ret;
2029  }
2030 
2031  public bool GetIntersectionWithLine(ref LineD line, ref MyCubeGridHitInfo info, IntersectionFlags flags = IntersectionFlags.ALL_TRIANGLES)
2032  {
2033  if (info == null)
2034  info = new MyCubeGridHitInfo();
2035 
2036  info.Reset();
2037 
2038  RayCastCells(line.From, line.To, m_cacheRayCastCells);
2039  if (m_cacheRayCastCells.Count == 0)
2040  return false;
2041 
2042  foreach (Vector3I hit in m_cacheRayCastCells)
2043  {
2044  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(hit))
2045  {
2046  var cube = m_cubes[hit];
2047  MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? tri;
2048  int cubePartIndex;
2049  GetBlockIntersection(cube, ref line, flags, out tri, out cubePartIndex);
2050 
2051  if (tri.HasValue)
2052  {
2053  info.Position = cube.CubeBlock.Position;
2054  info.Triangle = tri.Value;
2055  info.CubePartIndex = cubePartIndex;
2056  return true;
2057  }
2058  }
2059  }
2060 
2061  return false;
2062  }
2063 
2064  internal bool GetIntersectionWithLine(ref LineD line, out MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? t, out MySlimBlock slimBlock, IntersectionFlags flags = IntersectionFlags.ALL_TRIANGLES)
2065  {
2066  t = null;
2067  slimBlock = null;
2068 
2069  RayCastCells(line.From, line.To, m_cacheRayCastCells);
2070  if (m_cacheRayCastCells.Count == 0)
2071  return false;
2072 
2073  foreach (Vector3I hit in m_cacheRayCastCells)
2074  {
2075  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(hit))
2076  {
2077  var cube = m_cubes[hit];
2078  int cubePartIndex;
2079  GetBlockIntersection(cube, ref line, flags, out t, out cubePartIndex);
2080 
2081  if (t.HasValue)
2082  {
2083  slimBlock = cube.CubeBlock;
2084  break;
2085  }
2086  }
2087  }
2088 
2089  if (slimBlock != null)
2090  {
2091  if (slimBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
2092  {
2093  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = slimBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
2094  ListReader<MySlimBlock> slimBlocksInCompound = compoundBlock.GetBlocks();
2095  double distanceSquaredInCompound = double.MaxValue;
2096  MySlimBlock slimBlockInCompound = null;
2097 
2098  for (int i = 0; i < slimBlocksInCompound.Count; ++i)
2099  {
2100  MySlimBlock cmpSlimBlock = slimBlocksInCompound.ItemAt(i);
2101  VRage.Game.Models.MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? intersectionTriResult;
2102  if (cmpSlimBlock.FatBlock.GetIntersectionWithLine(ref line, out intersectionTriResult) && intersectionTriResult != null)
2103  {
2104  Vector3D startToIntersection = intersectionTriResult.Value.IntersectionPointInWorldSpace - line.From;
2105  double instrDistanceSq = startToIntersection.LengthSquared();
2106  if (instrDistanceSq < distanceSquaredInCompound)
2107  {
2108  distanceSquaredInCompound = instrDistanceSq;
2109  slimBlockInCompound = cmpSlimBlock;
2110  }
2111  }
2112  }
2113 
2114  slimBlock = slimBlockInCompound;
2115  }
2116  }
2117 
2118  return t.HasValue;
2119  }
2120 
2121  public override bool GetIntersectionWithSphere(ref BoundingSphereD sphere)
2122  {
2123  ProfilerShort.Begin("CubeGrid.GetIntersectionWithSphere()");
2124  try
2125  {
2126  BoundingBoxD box = new BoundingBoxD(sphere.Center - new Vector3D(sphere.Radius), sphere.Center + new Vector3D(sphere.Radius));
2127 
2128  var invee = MatrixD.Invert(WorldMatrix);
2129  box = box.TransformFast(ref invee);
2130  Vector3 min = box.Min;
2131  Vector3 max = box.Max;
2132 
2133  Vector3I start = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(min.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Z * GridSizeR));
2134  Vector3I end = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(max.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Z * GridSizeR));
2135 
2136  Vector3I startIt = Vector3I.Min(start, end);
2137  Vector3I endIt = Vector3I.Max(start, end);
2138 
2139  for (int i = startIt.X; i <= endIt.X; i++)
2140  {
2141  for (int j = startIt.Y; j <= endIt.Y; j++)
2142  {
2143  for (int k = startIt.Z; k <= endIt.Z; k++)
2144  {
2145  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(new Vector3I(i, j, k)))
2146  {
2147  var cube = m_cubes[new Vector3I(i, j, k)];
2148 
2149  if (cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock == null || cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Model == null)
2150  {
2151  if (cube.CubeBlock.BlockDefinition.CubeDefinition.CubeTopology == MyCubeTopology.Box)
2152  return true;
2153 
2154  foreach (var part in cube.Parts)
2155  {
2156  MatrixD worldMatrix = part.InstanceData.LocalMatrix * WorldMatrix;
2157 
2158  MatrixD inv = Matrix.Invert(worldMatrix);
2159 
2160  Vector3D transformedPos = Vector3D.Transform(sphere.Center, inv);
2161  BoundingSphereD bs = new BoundingSphereD(transformedPos, sphere.Radius);
2162 
2163  foreach (var triangleIndices in part.Model.Triangles)
2164  {
2165  MyTriangle_Vertices triangle = new MyTriangle_Vertices();
2166 
2167  triangle.Vertex0 = part.Model.GetVertex(triangleIndices.I0);
2168  triangle.Vertex1 = part.Model.GetVertex(triangleIndices.I1);
2169  triangle.Vertex2 = part.Model.GetVertex(triangleIndices.I2);
2170 
2171  MyPlane plane = new MyPlane(ref triangle);
2172 
2173  if (MyUtils.GetSphereTriangleIntersection(ref bs, ref plane, ref triangle).HasValue)
2174  {
2175  return true;
2176  }
2177  }
2178  }
2179 
2180  //Cannot return because more cubes can be in the line..
2181  // return false;
2182  }
2183  else
2184  {
2185  MatrixD worldMatrix = cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.WorldMatrix;
2186 
2187  MatrixD inv = Matrix.Invert(worldMatrix);
2188 
2189  Vector3D transformedPos = Vector3D.Transform(sphere.Center, inv);
2190  BoundingSphereD bs = new BoundingSphere(transformedPos, (float)sphere.Radius);
2191 
2192  bool intersected = cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Model.GetTrianglePruningStructure().GetIntersectionWithSphere(cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock, ref sphere);
2193  if (intersected)
2194  return intersected;
2195  }
2196 
2197  //Cannot return because more cubes can be in the line..
2198  // return true;
2199  }
2200  }
2201  }
2202  }
2203 
2204  return false;
2205  }
2206  finally
2207  {
2208  ProfilerShort.End();
2209  }
2210  }
2211 
2212  public override string ToString()
2213  {
2214  var stat = IsStatic ? "S" : "D";
2215  var size = GridSizeEnum.ToString();
2216 
2217  return "Grid_" + stat + "_" + size + "_" + m_cubeBlocks.Count + " {" + EntityId.ToString("X8") + "}";
2218  }
2219 
2220  #endregion
2221  public bool IsTrash()
2222  {
2223  var keepReason = MyTrashRemoval.GetTrashState(this, MyTrashRemoval.PreviewSettings);
2224  return keepReason == MyTrashRemovalFlags.None;
2225  }
2226 
2227  public Vector3I WorldToGridInteger(Vector3D coords)
2228  {
2229  Vector3D localCoords = Vector3D.Transform(coords, PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
2230  localCoords *= GridSizeR;
2231  return Vector3I.Round(localCoords);
2232  }
2233 
2234  public Vector3D WorldToGridScaledLocal(Vector3D coords)
2235  {
2236  Vector3D localCoords = Vector3D.Transform(coords, PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
2237  localCoords *= GridSizeR;
2238  return localCoords;
2239  }
2240 
2241  public static Vector3D GridIntegerToWorld(float gridSize, Vector3I gridCoords, MatrixD worldMatrix)
2242  {
2243  Vector3D retval = (Vector3D)(Vector3)gridCoords;
2244  retval *= gridSize;
2245  return Vector3D.Transform(retval, worldMatrix);
2246  }
2247 
2248  public Vector3D GridIntegerToWorld(Vector3I gridCoords)
2249  {
2250  return GridIntegerToWorld(GridSize, gridCoords, WorldMatrix);
2251  }
2252 
2253  public Vector3D GridIntegerToWorld(Vector3D gridCoords)
2254  {
2255  Vector3D retval = gridCoords;
2256  retval *= GridSize;
2257  return Vector3D.Transform(retval, WorldMatrix);
2258  }
2259 
2260  public Vector3I LocalToGridInteger(Vector3 localCoords)
2261  {
2262  localCoords *= GridSizeR;
2263  return Vector3I.Round(localCoords);
2264  }
2265 
2266  public bool CanAddCubes(Vector3I min, Vector3I max)
2267  {
2268  Vector3I current = min;
2269  for (var it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref min, ref max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out current))
2270  {
2271  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(current))
2272  return false;
2273  }
2274  return true;
2275  }
2276 
2277  public bool CanAddCubes(Vector3I min, Vector3I max, MyBlockOrientation? orientation, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition)
2278  {
2279  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS && definition != null)
2280  {
2281  Vector3I current = min;
2282  for (var it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref min, ref max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out current))
2283  {
2284  if (!CanAddCube(current, orientation, definition))
2285  return false;
2286  }
2287  return true;
2288  }
2289 
2290  return CanAddCubes(min, max);
2291  }
2292 
2293  public bool CanAddCube(Vector3I pos, MyBlockOrientation? orientation, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition, bool ignoreSame = false)
2294  {
2295  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS && definition != null)
2296  {
2297  if (!CubeExists(pos))
2298  return true;
2299 
2300  MySlimBlock block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
2301  if (block != null)
2302  {
2303  var cmpBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
2304  if (cmpBlock != null)
2305  return cmpBlock.CanAddBlock(definition, orientation, ignoreSame: ignoreSame);
2306  }
2307 
2308  return false;
2309  }
2310  else
2311  {
2312  return !CubeExists(pos);
2313  }
2314  }
2315 
2316  public void ClearSymmetries()
2317  {
2318  XSymmetryPlane = null;
2319  YSymmetryPlane = null;
2320  ZSymmetryPlane = null;
2321  }
2322 
2323  public bool IsTouchingAnyNeighbor(Vector3I min, Vector3I max)
2324  {
2325  {
2326  var minMinusX = min; minMinusX.X -= 1;
2327  var maxMinusX = max; maxMinusX.X = minMinusX.X;
2328  if (!CanAddCubes(minMinusX, maxMinusX))
2329  return true;
2330  }
2331  {
2332  var minMinusY = min; minMinusY.Y -= 1;
2333  var maxMinusY = max; maxMinusY.Y = minMinusY.Y;
2334  if (!CanAddCubes(minMinusY, maxMinusY))
2335  return true;
2336  }
2337  {
2338  var minMinusZ = min; minMinusZ.Z -= 1;
2339  var maxMinusZ = max; maxMinusZ.Z = minMinusZ.Z;
2340  if (!CanAddCubes(minMinusZ, maxMinusZ))
2341  return true;
2342  }
2343 
2344  {
2345  var maxPlusX = max; maxPlusX.X += 1;
2346  var minPlusX = min; minPlusX.X = maxPlusX.X;
2347  if (!CanAddCubes(minPlusX, maxPlusX))
2348  return true;
2349  }
2350  {
2351  var maxPlusY = max; maxPlusY.Y += 1;
2352  var minPlusY = min; minPlusY.Y = maxPlusY.Y;
2353  if (!CanAddCubes(minPlusY, maxPlusY))
2354  return true;
2355  }
2356  {
2357  var maxPlusZ = max; maxPlusZ.Z += 1;
2358  var minPlusZ = min; minPlusZ.Z = maxPlusZ.Z;
2359  if (!CanAddCubes(minPlusZ, maxPlusZ))
2360  return true;
2361  }
2362 
2363  return false;
2364  }
2365 
2366  public bool CanPlaceBlock(Vector3I min, Vector3I max, MyBlockOrientation orientation, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition, int? ignoreMultiblockId = null, bool ignoreFracturedPieces = false)
2367  {
2368  var gridSettings = MyCubeBuilder.CubeBuilderDefinition.BuildingSettings.GetGridPlacementSettings(GridSizeEnum, this.IsStatic);
2369  return CanPlaceBlock(min, max, orientation, definition, ref gridSettings, ignoreMultiblockId: ignoreMultiblockId, ignoreFracturedPieces: ignoreFracturedPieces);
2370  }
2371 
2372  public bool CanPlaceBlock(Vector3I min, Vector3I max, MyBlockOrientation orientation, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition, ref MyGridPlacementSettings gridSettings,
2373  int? ignoreMultiblockId = null, bool ignoreFracturedPieces = false)
2374  {
2375  ProfilerShort.Begin("CanAddCubes");
2376  if (!CanAddCubes(min, max, orientation, definition))
2377  {
2378  ProfilerShort.End();
2379  return false;
2380  }
2381 
2382  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCKS && MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_CONSTRUCTION)
2383  {
2384  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("CanAddOtherBlockInMultiBlock");
2385  if (!CanAddOtherBlockInMultiBlock(min, max, orientation, definition, ignoreMultiblockId))
2386  {
2387  ProfilerShort.End();
2388  return false;
2389  }
2390  }
2391 
2392  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("TestPlacementAreaCube");
2393  bool canPlaceBlock = TestPlacementAreaCube(this, ref gridSettings, min, max, orientation, definition, ignoredEntity: this, ignoreFracturedPieces: ignoreFracturedPieces);
2394  ProfilerShort.End();
2395  return canPlaceBlock;
2396  }
2397 
2401  private bool IsWithinWorldLimits(long ownerID, int blocksToBuild, string name)
2402  {
2403  if (!MySession.Static.EnableBlockLimits) return true;
2404 
2405  var identity = MySession.Static.Players.TryGetIdentity(ownerID);
2406  bool withinLimits = true;
2407  withinLimits &= MySession.Static.MaxGridSize == 0 || BlocksCount + blocksToBuild <= MySession.Static.MaxGridSize;
2408  if (MySession.Static.MaxBlocksPerPlayer != 0 && identity != null) {
2409  withinLimits &= identity.BlocksBuilt + blocksToBuild <= MySession.Static.MaxBlocksPerPlayer + identity.BlockLimitModifier;
2410  }
2411  short typeLimit = MySession.Static.GetBlockTypeLimit(name);
2412  int typeBuilt;
2413  if (identity != null && typeLimit > 0)
2414  {
2415  withinLimits &= (identity.BlockTypeBuilt.TryGetValue(name, out typeBuilt) ? typeBuilt : 0) + blocksToBuild <= typeLimit;
2416  }
2417  return withinLimits;
2418  }
2419 
2420  public void SetCubeDirty(Vector3I pos)
2421  {
2422  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(pos);
2423  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
2424  if (block != null)
2425  {
2426  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
2427  }
2428  }
2429 
2430  public void SetBlockDirty(MySlimBlock cubeBlock)
2431  {
2432  Vector3I cube = cubeBlock.Min;
2433  for (var it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref cubeBlock.Min, ref cubeBlock.Max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out cube))
2434  {
2435  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(cube);
2436  }
2437  }
2438 
2439  public void DebugDrawRange(Vector3I min, Vector3I max)
2440  {
2441  Vector3I currentMin = min;
2442  for (var it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref min, ref max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out currentMin))
2443  {
2444  var currentMax = currentMin + 1;
2445 
2446  var obb = new MyOrientedBoundingBoxD(
2447  currentMin * GridSize,
2448  GridSizeHalfVector,
2449  Quaternion.Identity);
2450  obb.Transform(WorldMatrix);
2451  VRageRender.MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawOBB(obb, Color.White, 0.5f, true, false);
2452  }
2453  }
2454 
2455  public void DebugDrawPositions(List<Vector3I> positions)
2456  {
2457  foreach (var currentMin in positions)
2458  {
2459  var currentMax = currentMin + 1;
2460 
2461  var obb = new MyOrientedBoundingBoxD(
2462  currentMin * GridSize,
2463  GridSizeHalfVector,
2464  Quaternion.Identity);
2465  obb.Transform(WorldMatrix);
2466  VRageRender.MyRenderProxy.DebugDrawOBB(obb, Color.White.ToVector3(), 0.5f, true, false);
2467  }
2468  }
2469 
2470  private MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock UpgradeCubeBlock(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock block, out MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition)
2471  {
2472  var defId = block.GetId();
2473 
2474  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS)
2475  {
2476  if (block is MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock)
2477  {
2478  MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock compoundBock = block as MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock;
2479  blockDefinition = MyCompoundCubeBlock.GetCompoundCubeBlockDefinition();
2480  if (blockDefinition == null)
2481  return null;
2482  // Check if compound template was removed from definition (then create block without compound shell).
2483  if (compoundBock.Blocks.Length == 1)
2484  {
2485  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock innerBlock = compoundBock.Blocks[0];
2486  MyCubeBlockDefinition innerBlockDefinition;
2487  if (MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(innerBlock.GetId(), out innerBlockDefinition))
2488  {
2489  if (!MyCompoundCubeBlock.IsCompoundEnabled(innerBlockDefinition))
2490  {
2491  blockDefinition = innerBlockDefinition;
2492  return innerBlock;
2493  }
2494  }
2495  }
2496 
2497  return block;
2498  }
2499  else
2500  {
2501  // Check added compound to definition (means that compound must be created and block set inside)
2502  if (MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(defId, out blockDefinition))
2503  {
2504  if (MyCompoundCubeBlock.IsCompoundEnabled(blockDefinition))
2505  {
2506  MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock compoundCBBuilder = MyCompoundCubeBlock.CreateBuilder(block);
2507  MyCubeBlockDefinition compoundBlockDefinition = MyCompoundCubeBlock.GetCompoundCubeBlockDefinition();
2508  if (compoundBlockDefinition != null)
2509  {
2510  blockDefinition = compoundBlockDefinition;
2511  return compoundCBBuilder;
2512  }
2513  }
2514  }
2515  }
2516  }
2517 
2518  // Upgrading manually as ChangeType causes stack overflow in protobuf-net.
2519  if (block is MyObjectBuilder_Ladder)
2520  {
2521  var passage = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject<MyObjectBuilder_Passage>(block.SubtypeName);
2522 
2523  passage.BlockOrientation = block.BlockOrientation;
2524  passage.BuildPercent = block.BuildPercent;
2525  passage.EntityId = block.EntityId;
2526  passage.IntegrityPercent = block.IntegrityPercent;
2527  passage.Min = block.Min;
2528 
2529  blockDefinition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(new MyDefinitionId(typeof(MyObjectBuilder_Passage), block.SubtypeId));
2530  block = passage;
2531  return block;
2532  }
2533 
2534  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock newBlock = block;
2535 
2536  //defId = new MyDefinitionId(defId.TypeId, "LargeBlockArmorSlope");
2537 
2538  string[] variants = new string[] { "Red", "Yellow", "Blue", "Green", "Black", "White", "Gray" };
2539  Vector3[] colors = new Vector3[] { MyRenderComponentBase.OldRedToHSV, MyRenderComponentBase.OldYellowToHSV, MyRenderComponentBase.OldBlueToHSV, MyRenderComponentBase.OldGreenToHSV, MyRenderComponentBase.OldBlackToHSV, MyRenderComponentBase.OldWhiteToHSV, MyRenderComponentBase.OldGrayToHSV };
2540 
2541  // Upgrade object builders which were block and now are specific
2542  if (!MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(defId, out blockDefinition))
2543  {
2544  newBlock = FindDefinitionUpgrade(block, out blockDefinition);
2545  if (newBlock == null)
2546  {
2547  // Try convert old variants
2548  for (int i = 0; i < variants.Length; i++)
2549  {
2550  if (defId.SubtypeName.EndsWith(variants[i], StringComparison.InvariantCultureIgnoreCase))
2551  {
2552  string shortName = defId.SubtypeName.Substring(0, defId.SubtypeName.Length - variants[i].Length);
2553  var newDefId = new MyDefinitionId(defId.TypeId, shortName);
2554  if (MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(newDefId, out blockDefinition))
2555  {
2556  newBlock = block;
2557  newBlock.ColorMaskHSV = colors[i];
2558  newBlock.SubtypeName = shortName;
2559  return newBlock;
2560  }
2561  }
2562  }
2563  }
2564 
2565  if (newBlock == null)
2566  {
2567  return null;
2568  }
2569  }
2570 
2571  return newBlock;
2572  }
2573 
2574  private MySlimBlock AddBlock(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock objectBuilder, bool testMerge)
2575  {
2576  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.AddBlock(...)");
2577 
2578  try
2579  {
2580  if (Skeleton == null)
2581  Skeleton = new MyGridSkeleton();
2582 
2583  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition;
2584  ProfilerShort.Begin("UpgradeCubeBlock");
2585  objectBuilder = UpgradeCubeBlock(objectBuilder, out blockDefinition);
2586  ProfilerShort.End();
2587 
2588  if (objectBuilder == null)
2589  {
2590  return null;
2591  }
2592 
2593  if (MyFakes.THROW_LOADING_ERRORS)
2594  {
2595  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddCubeBlock 1");
2596  MySlimBlock block = AddCubeBlock(objectBuilder, testMerge, blockDefinition);
2597  ProfilerShort.End();
2598  return block;
2599  }
2600  else
2601  {
2602  try
2603  {
2604  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddCubeBlock 2");
2605  MySlimBlock block = AddCubeBlock(objectBuilder, testMerge, blockDefinition);
2606  ProfilerShort.End();
2607  return block;
2608  }
2609  catch (Exception e)
2610  {
2611  MyLog.Default.WriteLine("ERROR while adding cube " + blockDefinition.DisplayNameText.ToString() + ": " + e.ToString());
2612  return null;
2613  }
2614  }
2615  }
2616  finally
2617  {
2618  ProfilerShort.End();
2619  }
2620  }
2621 
2622  private MySlimBlock AddCubeBlock(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock objectBuilder, bool testMerge, MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition)
2623  {
2624  //Debug.Assert(false, "AddCubeBlock");
2625  ProfilerShort.Begin("CanAddCubes");
2626 
2627  Vector3I min = objectBuilder.Min, max;
2628  MySlimBlock.ComputeMax(blockDefinition, objectBuilder.BlockOrientation, ref min, out max);
2629  if (!CanAddCubes(min, max))
2630  {
2631  ProfilerShort.End();
2632  return null;
2633  }
2634 
2635  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("CreateCubeBlock");
2636  var objectBlock = MyCubeBlockFactory.CreateCubeBlock(objectBuilder);
2637  MySlimBlock cubeBlock = objectBlock as MySlimBlock;
2638  if (cubeBlock == null)
2639  cubeBlock = new MySlimBlock();
2640 
2641  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Init");
2642  cubeBlock.Init(objectBuilder, this, objectBlock as MyCubeBlock);
2643 
2644  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("MyCompoundCubeBlock");
2645  if (cubeBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
2646  {
2647  if ((cubeBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock).GetBlocksCount() == 0)
2648  {
2649  ProfilerShort.End();
2650  return null;
2651  }
2652  }
2653 
2654  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("HookMultiplayer");
2655  cubeBlock.FatBlock.HookMultiplayer();
2656 
2657  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("AddNeighbours");
2658  cubeBlock.AddNeighbours();
2659 
2660  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("BoundsInclude");
2661  BoundsInclude(cubeBlock);
2662 
2663  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Fatblock");
2664  if (cubeBlock.FatBlock != null)
2665  {
2666  ProfilerShort.Begin("Hierarchy.AddChild");
2667  Hierarchy.AddChild(cubeBlock.FatBlock);
2668 
2669  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("GridSystems.RegisterInSystems");
2670  GridSystems.RegisterInSystems(cubeBlock.FatBlock);
2671 
2672  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("NeedsDrawFromParent");
2673  if (cubeBlock.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDrawFromParent)
2674  {
2675  m_blocksForDraw.Add(cubeBlock.FatBlock);
2676  cubeBlock.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDraw = false; //blocks shouldnt be drawn on their own at all?
2677  }
2678 
2679  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Misc");
2680  MyObjectBuilderType blockType = cubeBlock.BlockDefinition.Id.TypeId;
2681  if (blockType != typeof(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock))
2682  {
2683  if (!BlocksCounters.ContainsKey(blockType))
2684  BlocksCounters.Add(blockType, 0);
2685  BlocksCounters[blockType]++;
2686  }
2687  ProfilerShort.End();
2688  }
2689 
2690  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Add");
2691  m_cubeBlocks.Add(cubeBlock);
2692  if (cubeBlock.FatBlock != null)
2693  m_fatBlocks.Add(cubeBlock.FatBlock);
2694 
2695  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Misc 1");
2696  MyBlockOrientation blockOrientation = objectBuilder.BlockOrientation;
2697  Matrix rotationMatrix;
2698  blockOrientation.GetMatrix(out rotationMatrix);
2699 
2700  //Add cubes
2701  Vector3I rotatedBlockSize;
2702  MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetRotatedBlockSize(blockDefinition, ref rotationMatrix, out rotatedBlockSize);
2703 
2704  //integer local center of the cube
2705  Vector3I center = blockDefinition.Center;
2706 
2707  //integer rotated/world center of the cube
2708  Vector3I rotatedCenter;
2709  Vector3I.TransformNormal(ref center, ref rotationMatrix, out rotatedCenter);
2710 
2711  bool blockAddSuccessfull = true;
2712  Vector3I temp = cubeBlock.Min;
2713  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("AddCube");
2714  for (var it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref cubeBlock.Min, ref cubeBlock.Max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out temp))
2715  {
2716  blockAddSuccessfull &= AddCube(cubeBlock, ref temp, rotationMatrix, blockDefinition);
2717  }
2718 
2719  Debug.Assert(blockAddSuccessfull, "Cannot add cube block!");
2720 
2721  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Physics.AddBlock");
2722  if (Physics != null)
2723  {
2724  Physics.AddBlock(cubeBlock);
2725  }
2726 
2727  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Update Skeleton");
2728  float boneErrorSquared = MyGridSkeleton.GetMaxBoneError(GridSize);
2729  boneErrorSquared *= boneErrorSquared;
2730 
2731  Vector3I boneMax = (cubeBlock.Min + Vector3I.One) * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity;
2732  Vector3I bonePos = cubeBlock.Min * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity;
2733  for (var it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref bonePos, ref boneMax); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out bonePos))
2734  {
2735  Vector3 boneOffset = Skeleton.GetDefinitionOffsetWithNeighbours(cubeBlock.Min, bonePos, this);
2736 
2737  if (boneOffset.LengthSquared() < boneErrorSquared)
2738  {
2739  Skeleton.Bones.Remove(bonePos);
2740  }
2741  else
2742  {
2743  Skeleton.Bones[bonePos] = boneOffset;
2744  }
2745  }
2746 
2747  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("Make skeleton dirty");
2748  if (cubeBlock.BlockDefinition.Skeleton != null && cubeBlock.BlockDefinition.Skeleton.Count > 0)
2749  {
2750  if (Physics != null)
2751  {
2752  for (int i = -1; i <= 1; i++)
2753  for (int j = -1; j <= 1; j++)
2754  for (int k = -1; k <= 1; k++)
2755  SetCubeDirty(new Vector3I(i, j, k) + cubeBlock.Min);
2756  }
2757  }
2758 
2759  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS)
2760  {
2761  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS");
2762  AddMultiBlockInfo(cubeBlock);
2763  }
2764 
2765  if (testMerge)
2766  {
2767  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("testMerge");
2768  MyCubeGrid mergedGrid = DetectMerge(cubeBlock, null);
2769  if (mergedGrid != null && mergedGrid != this)
2770  {
2771  //RK is this really necessary? This should always return the same block (because merged grid uses the same slimblock).
2772  cubeBlock = mergedGrid.GetCubeBlock(cubeBlock.Position);
2773  // Refresh block generators with currently set block.
2774  mergedGrid.AdditionalModelGenerators.ForEach(g => g.BlockAddedToMergedGrid(cubeBlock));
2775  }
2776  else
2777  {
2778  NotifyBlockAdded(cubeBlock);
2779  }
2780  }
2781  else
2782  {
2783  NotifyBlockAdded(cubeBlock);
2784  }
2785  ProfilerShort.End();
2786  cubeBlock.AddAuthorship();
2787  if (cubeBlock.FatBlock is MyReactor)
2788  NumberOfReactors++;
2789  return cubeBlock;
2790  }
2791 
2792  public void EnqueueDestructionDeformationBlock(Vector3I position)
2793  {
