2794  if (Sync.IsServer)
2795  {
2796  m_destructionDeformationQueue.Add(position);
2797  }
2798  }
2799 
2800  public void EnqueueDestroyedBlock(Vector3I position)
2801  {
2802  if (Sync.IsServer)
2803  {
2804  m_destroyBlockQueue.Add(position);
2805  }
2806  }
2807 
2808  public void EnqueueRemovedBlock(Vector3I position, bool generatorsEnabled)
2809  {
2810  if (Sync.IsServer)
2811  {
2812  if (generatorsEnabled)
2813  m_removeBlockQueueWithGenerators.Add(position);
2814  else
2815  m_removeBlockQueueWithoutGenerators.Add(position);
2816  }
2817  }
2818 
2819  public void SendRemovedBlocks()
2820  {
2821  if (m_removeBlockQueueWithGenerators.Count > 0 || m_destroyBlockQueue.Count > 0 || m_destructionDeformationQueue.Count > 0 || m_removeBlockQueueWithoutGenerators.Count > 0)
2822  {
2823  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RemovedBlocks, m_removeBlockQueueWithGenerators, m_destroyBlockQueue, m_destructionDeformationQueue, m_removeBlockQueueWithoutGenerators);
2824 
2825  m_removeBlockQueueWithGenerators.Clear();
2826  m_removeBlockQueueWithoutGenerators.Clear();
2827  m_destroyBlockQueue.Clear();
2828  m_destructionDeformationQueue.Clear();
2829  }
2830  }
2831 
2832  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
2833  void RemovedBlocks(List<Vector3I> locationsWithGenerator, List<Vector3I> destroyLocations, List<Vector3I> DestructionDeformationLocation, List<Vector3I> LocationsWithoutGenerator)
2834  {
2835  if (destroyLocations.Count > 0)
2836  {
2837  BlocksDestroyed(destroyLocations);
2838  }
2839  if (locationsWithGenerator.Count > 0)
2840  {
2841  BlocksRemovedWithGenerator(locationsWithGenerator);
2842  }
2843  if (LocationsWithoutGenerator.Count > 0)
2844  {
2845  BlocksRemovedWithoutGenerator(LocationsWithoutGenerator);
2846  }
2847  if (DestructionDeformationLocation.Count > 0)
2848  {
2849  BlocksDeformed(DestructionDeformationLocation);
2850  }
2851  }
2852 
2856  public void EnqueueRemovedBlockWithId(Vector3I position, ushort? compoundId, bool generatorsEnabled)
2857  {
2858  if (Sync.IsServer)
2859  {
2860  var blockPositionId = new MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId() { Position = position, CompoundId = compoundId ?? 0xFFFFFFFF };
2861  if (generatorsEnabled)
2862  m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Add(blockPositionId);
2863  else
2864  m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Add(blockPositionId);
2865  }
2866  }
2867 
2868 
2869 
2870  public void EnqueueDestroyedBlockWithId(Vector3I position, ushort? compoundId, bool generatorEnabled)
2871  {
2872  if (Sync.IsServer)
2873  {
2874  if (generatorEnabled)
2875  m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Add(new MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId() { Position = position, CompoundId = compoundId ?? 0xFFFFFFFF });
2876  else
2877  m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Add(new MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId() { Position = position, CompoundId = compoundId ?? 0xFFFFFFFF });
2878  }
2879  }
2880 
2881  public void SendRemovedBlocksWithIds()
2882  {
2883  if (m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Count > 0 || m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Count > 0 || m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Count > 0
2884  || m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Count > 0)
2885  {
2886  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RemovedBlocksWithIds, m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators, m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators,
2887  m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators, m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators);
2888 
2889  m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Clear();
2890  m_removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Clear();
2891  m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Clear();
2892  m_destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Clear();
2893  }
2894  }
2895 
2896  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
2897  void RemovedBlocksWithIds(List<BlockPositionId> removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators, List<BlockPositionId> destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators, List<BlockPositionId> destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators, List<BlockPositionId> removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators)
2898  {
2899  if (destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Count > 0)
2900  {
2901  BlocksWithIdDestroyedWithGenerator(destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators);
2902  }
2903  if (destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Count > 0)
2904  {
2905  BlocksWithIdDestroyedWithoutGenerator(destroyBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators);
2906  }
2907  if (removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators.Count > 0)
2908  {
2909  BlocksWithIdRemovedWithGenerator(removeBlockWithIdQueueWithGenerators);
2910  }
2911  if (removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators.Count > 0)
2912  {
2913  BlocksWithIdRemovedWithoutGenerator(removeBlockWithIdQueueWithoutGenerators);
2914  }
2915  }
2916 
2920  [Event, Reliable, Server, Broadcast]
2921  public void RemoveBlocksBuiltByID(long identityID)
2922  {
2923  foreach (var block in FindBlocksBuiltByID(identityID))
2924  {
2925  RemoveBlock(block);
2926  }
2927  }
2928 
2932  [Event, Reliable, Server, Broadcast]
2933  public void TransferBlocksBuiltByID(long oldOwner, long newOwner)
2934  {
2935  foreach (var block in FindBlocksBuiltByID(oldOwner))
2936  {
2937  block.TransferAuthorship(newOwner);
2938  }
2939  if (OnAuthorshipChanged != null)
2940  OnAuthorshipChanged(this);
2941  }
2942 
2946  [Event, Reliable, Server]
2947  public void SendTransferRequestMessage(long oldOwner, long newOwner, ulong newOwnerSteamId)
2948  {
2949  if (MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked)
2950  {
2951  ReceiveTransferRequestMessage(oldOwner, newOwner);
2952  }
2953  else
2954  {
2955  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.ReceiveTransferRequestMessage, oldOwner, newOwner, targetEndpoint: new EndpointId(newOwnerSteamId));
2956  }
2957  }
2958 
2959  [Event, Client]
2960  private void ReceiveTransferRequestMessage(long oldOwner, long newOwner)
2961  {
2962  var identity = MySession.Static.Players.TryGetIdentity(oldOwner);
2963  var messageBox = Sandbox.Graphics.GUI.MyGuiSandbox.CreateMessageBox(
2964  styleEnum: Graphics.GUI.MyMessageBoxStyleEnum.Info,
2965  buttonType: Sandbox.Graphics.GUI.MyMessageBoxButtonsType.YES_NO,
2966  messageText: new StringBuilder().AppendFormat(MyTexts.GetString(MyCommonTexts.MessageBoxTextConfirmAcceptTransferGrid), new object[] { identity.DisplayName, identity.BlocksBuiltByGrid[this].ToString(), DisplayName }),
2967  messageCaption: MyTexts.Get(MyCommonTexts.MessageBoxCaptionPleaseConfirm),
2968  canHideOthers: false,
2969  callback: (result) =>
2970  {
2971  if (result == Sandbox.Graphics.GUI.MyGuiScreenMessageBox.ResultEnum.YES)
2972  {
2973  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.TransferBlocksBuiltByID, oldOwner, newOwner);
2974  }
2975  });
2976  Sandbox.Graphics.GUI.MyGuiSandbox.AddScreen(messageBox);
2977  }
2978 
2982  private HashSet<MySlimBlock> FindBlocksBuiltByID(long identityID)
2983  {
2984  var builtBlocks = new HashSet<MySlimBlock>();
2985  foreach (var block in m_cubeBlocks)
2986  {
2987  if (block.BuiltBy == identityID)
2988  builtBlocks.Add(block);
2989  }
2990  return builtBlocks;
2991  }
2992 
2996  public bool IsTransferBlocksBuiltByIDPossible(long oldOwner, long newOwner)
2997  {
2998  var oldIdentity = MySession.Static.Players.TryGetIdentity(oldOwner);
2999  var newIdentity = MySession.Static.Players.TryGetIdentity(newOwner);
3000 
3001  if (oldIdentity == null || newIdentity == null)
3002  return false;
3003 
3004  int blocksNum;
3005  if (!oldIdentity.BlocksBuiltByGrid.TryGetValue(this, out blocksNum))
3006  return false;
3007 
3008  if (blocksNum > MySession.Static.MaxBlocksPerPlayer + newIdentity.BlockLimitModifier)
3009  return false;
3010 
3011  Dictionary<string, short> builtBlocksByType = new Dictionary<string, short>(MySession.Static.BlockTypeLimits);
3012  foreach (var block in FindBlocksBuiltByID(oldOwner))
3013  {
3014  if (builtBlocksByType.ContainsKey(block.BlockDefinition.BlockPairName))
3015  {
3016  builtBlocksByType[block.BlockDefinition.BlockPairName]--;
3017  if (builtBlocksByType[block.BlockDefinition.BlockPairName] < 0)
3018  return false;
3019  }
3020  }
3021  return true;
3022  }
3023 
3024  public MySlimBlock BuildGeneratedBlock(MyBlockLocation location, Vector3 colorMaskHsv)
3025  {
3026  MyDefinitionId blockDefinitionId = location.BlockDefinition;
3027  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(blockDefinitionId);
3028  Quaternion orientation;
3029  location.Orientation.GetQuaternion(out orientation);
3030  return BuildBlock(blockDefinition, colorMaskHsv, location.Min, orientation, location.Owner, location.EntityId, null);
3031  }
3032 
3033  [Event, Reliable, Server]
3034  public void BuildBlockRequest(uint colorMaskHsv, MyBlockLocation location, [DynamicObjectBuilder] MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock blockObjectBuilder, long builderEntityId, bool instantBuild, long ownerId)
3035  {
3036  MyEntity builder = null;
3037  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(builderEntityId, out builder);
3038 
3039  bool isAdmin = (MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value));
3040  if (builder == null && isAdmin == false && MySession.Static.CreativeMode == false)
3041  {
3042  return;
3043  }
3044 
3045  using (MyMultiplayer.PauseReplication())
3046  {
3047  MyCubeGrid.MyBlockLocation? builtBlock = null;
3048 
3049  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition;
3050  MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(location.BlockDefinition, out blockDefinition);
3051  MyBlockOrientation ori = location.Orientation;
3052 
3053  Quaternion orientation;
3054  location.Orientation.GetQuaternion(out orientation);
3055 
3056  var mountPoints = blockDefinition.GetBuildProgressModelMountPoints(MyComponentStack.NewBlockIntegrity);
3057 
3058  int? ignoreMultiBlockId = blockObjectBuilder != null && blockObjectBuilder.MultiBlockId != 0 ? (int?)blockObjectBuilder.MultiBlockId : null;
3059  var center = location.CenterPos;
3060 
3061  if (CanPlaceBlock(location.Min, location.Max, ori, blockDefinition, ignoreMultiblockId: ignoreMultiBlockId)
3062  && MyCubeGrid.CheckConnectivity(this, blockDefinition, mountPoints, ref orientation, ref center))
3063  {
3064  BuildBlockSuccess(ColorExtensions.UnpackHSVFromUint(colorMaskHsv), location, blockObjectBuilder, ref builtBlock, builder, isAdmin && instantBuild, ownerId);
3065 
3066  if (builtBlock.HasValue)
3067  {
3068  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BuildBlockSucess, colorMaskHsv, location, blockObjectBuilder, builderEntityId, isAdmin && instantBuild, ownerId);
3069  AfterBuildBlockSuccess(builtBlock.Value);
3070  }
3071  }
3072  }
3073  }
3074 
3075  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
3076  public void BuildBlockSucess(uint colorMaskHsv, MyBlockLocation location, [DynamicObjectBuilder] MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock blockObjectBuilder, long builderEntityId, bool instantBuild, long ownerId)
3077  {
3078  MyEntity builder = null;
3079  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(builderEntityId, out builder);
3080 
3081  MyCubeGrid.MyBlockLocation? builtBlock = null;
3082 
3083  BuildBlockSuccess(ColorExtensions.UnpackHSVFromUint(colorMaskHsv), location, blockObjectBuilder, ref builtBlock, builder, instantBuild, ownerId);
3084 
3085  if (builtBlock.HasValue)
3086  {
3087  AfterBuildBlockSuccess(builtBlock.Value);
3088  }
3089  else
3090  {
3091  }
3092  }
3093 
3097  public void BuildBlocks(ref MyBlockBuildArea area, long builderEntityId, long ownerId)
3098  {
3099  if (!IsWithinWorldLimits(ownerId, area.BuildAreaSize.X * area.BuildAreaSize.Y * area.BuildAreaSize.Z, MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(area.DefinitionId).BlockPairName))
3100  {
3101  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudUnable);
3102  MyHud.Notifications.Add(MyNotificationSingletons.ShipOverLimits);
3103  return;
3104  }
3105  bool isAdmin = MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId);
3106  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BuildBlocksAreaRequest, area, builderEntityId, isAdmin, ownerId);
3107  }
3108 
3112  public void BuildBlocks(Vector3 colorMaskHsv, HashSet<MyBlockLocation> locations, long builderEntityId, long ownerId)
3113  {
3114  string name = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(locations.First().BlockDefinition).BlockPairName;
3115  if (!IsWithinWorldLimits(ownerId, locations.Count, name))
3116  {
3117  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudUnable);
3118  MyHud.Notifications.Add(MyNotificationSingletons.ShipOverLimits);
3119  return;
3120  }
3121  bool isAdmin = MySession.Static.CreativeToolsEnabled(Sync.MyId);
3122  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BuildBlocksRequest, colorMaskHsv.PackHSVToUint(), locations, builderEntityId, isAdmin, ownerId);
3123  }
3124 
3125  [Event, Reliable, Server]
3126  void BuildBlocksRequest(uint colorMaskHsv, HashSet<MyBlockLocation> locations, long builderEntityId, bool instantBuild, long ownerId)
3127  {
3128  if (!MySession.Static.CreativeMode && !MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked && !MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value))
3129  {
3130  instantBuild = false;
3131  }
3132  m_tmpBuildList.Clear();
3133  Debug.Assert(m_tmpBuildList != locations, "The build block message was received via loopback using the temporary build list. This causes erasing ot the message.");
3134 
3135  MyEntity builder = null;
3136  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(builderEntityId, out builder);
3137 
3138  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBlocksPlacementMaterials(locations, this);
3139  bool isAdmin = MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value);
3140 
3141  if (builder == null && isAdmin == false && MySession.Static.CreativeMode == false && MyFinalBuildConstants.IS_OFFICIAL)
3142  {
3143  return;
3144  }
3145 
3146  if (!MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(builder) && isAdmin == false)
3147  {
3148  return;
3149  }
3150 
3151  string name = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(locations.First().BlockDefinition).BlockPairName;
3152  if (!IsWithinWorldLimits(ownerId, locations.Count, name))
3153  {
3154  return;
3155  }
3156 
3157  using (MyMultiplayer.PauseReplication())
3158  {
3159 
3160  Vector3 unpackedColorMask = ColorExtensions.UnpackHSVFromUint(colorMaskHsv);
3161  BuildBlocksSuccess(unpackedColorMask, locations, m_tmpBuildList, builder, isAdmin && instantBuild, ownerId);
3162 
3163  if (m_tmpBuildList.Count > 0)
3164  {
3165  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BuildBlocksClient, colorMaskHsv, m_tmpBuildList, builderEntityId, isAdmin && instantBuild, ownerId);
3166  }
3167 
3168  }
3169 
3170  AfterBuildBlocksSuccess(m_tmpBuildList);
3171  }
3172 
3173  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
3174  public void BuildBlocksClient(uint colorMaskHsv, HashSet<MyBlockLocation> locations, long builderEntityId, bool instantBuilt, long ownerId)
3175  {
3176  m_tmpBuildList.Clear();
3177  Debug.Assert(m_tmpBuildList != locations, "The build block message was received via loopback using the temporary build list. This causes erasing ot the message.");
3178  MyEntity builder = null;
3179  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(builderEntityId, out builder);
3180  BuildBlocksSuccess(ColorExtensions.UnpackHSVFromUint(colorMaskHsv), locations, m_tmpBuildList, builder, instantBuilt, ownerId);
3181  AfterBuildBlocksSuccess(m_tmpBuildList);
3182  }
3183 
3184  [Event, Reliable, Server]
3185  private void BuildBlocksAreaRequest(MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea area, long builderEntityId, bool instantBuild, long ownerId)
3186  {
3187  if (!MySession.Static.CreativeMode && !MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked && !MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value))
3188  {
3189  instantBuild = false;
3190  }
3191  try
3192  {
3193  bool isAdmin = MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value);
3194 
3195  if (ownerId == 0 && isAdmin == false && MySession.Static.CreativeMode == false && MyFinalBuildConstants.IS_OFFICIAL)
3196  {
3197  return;
3198  }
3199 
3200  if (!IsWithinWorldLimits(ownerId, area.BuildAreaSize.X * area.BuildAreaSize.Y * area.BuildAreaSize.Z, MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(area.DefinitionId).BlockPairName))
3201  {
3202  return;
3203  }
3204 
3205  var definition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(area.DefinitionId) as MyCubeBlockDefinition;
3206  if (definition == null)
3207  {
3208  Debug.Fail("Block definition not found");
3209  return;
3210  }
3211 
3212  int amount = area.BuildAreaSize.X * area.BuildAreaSize.Y * area.BuildAreaSize.Z;
3213  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBlockAmountPlacementMaterials(definition, amount);
3214  MyEntity builder = null;
3215  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(builderEntityId, out builder);
3216  if (!MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(builder, true) && isAdmin == false)
3217  {
3218  return;
3219  }
3220 
3221  long owner = isAdmin && instantBuild ? 0 : ownerId;
3222 
3223  GetValidBuildOffsets(ref area, m_tmpBuildOffsets, m_tmpBuildFailList);
3224  MyCubeGrid.CheckAreaConnectivity(this, ref area, m_tmpBuildOffsets, m_tmpBuildFailList);
3225 
3226  int entityIdSeed = MyRandom.Instance.CreateRandomSeed();
3227 
3228  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BuildBlocksAreaClient, area, entityIdSeed, m_tmpBuildFailList, builderEntityId, isAdmin, owner);
3229 
3230  BuildBlocksArea(ref area, m_tmpBuildOffsets, builderEntityId, isAdmin, owner, entityIdSeed);
3231  }
3232  finally
3233  {
3234  m_tmpBuildOffsets.Clear();
3235  m_tmpBuildFailList.Clear();
3236  }
3237  }
3238 
3239  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
3240  private void BuildBlocksAreaClient(MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea area, int entityIdSeed, HashSet<Vector3UByte> failList, long builderEntityId, bool isAdmin, long ownerId)
3241  {
3242  try
3243  {
3244  GetAllBuildOffsetsExcept(ref area, failList, m_tmpBuildOffsets);
3245  BuildBlocksArea(ref area, m_tmpBuildOffsets, builderEntityId, isAdmin, ownerId, entityIdSeed);
3246  }
3247  finally
3248  {
3249  m_tmpBuildOffsets.Clear();
3250  }
3251  }
3252 
3253  private void BuildBlocksArea(ref MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea area, List<Vector3UByte> validOffsets, long builderEntityId, bool isAdmin, long ownerId, int entityIdSeed)
3254  {
3255  var definition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(area.DefinitionId) as MyCubeBlockDefinition;
3256  if (definition == null)
3257  {
3258  Debug.Fail("Block definition not found");
3259  return;
3260  }
3261  ProfilerShort.Begin("BuildBlocksArea");
3262 
3263  Quaternion orientation = Base6Directions.GetOrientation(area.OrientationForward, area.OrientationUp);
3264  Vector3I stepDir = area.StepDelta;
3265 
3266  MyEntity builderEntity = null;
3267  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(builderEntityId, out builderEntity);
3268 
3269  try
3270  {
3271  bool successSound = false;
3272  // This must be here to maintain determinism, on server this goes through hashset which changes order
3273  validOffsets.Sort(Vector3UByte.Comparer);
3274  using (MyRandom.Instance.PushSeed(entityIdSeed))
3275  {
3276  foreach (var offset in validOffsets)
3277  {
3278  Vector3I center = area.PosInGrid + offset * stepDir;
3279  var block = BuildBlock(definition, ColorExtensions.UnpackHSVFromUint(area.ColorMaskHSV), center + area.BlockMin, orientation, ownerId, MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId(), builderEntity, null, false, false, isAdmin);
3280  if (block != null)
3281  {
3282  successSound = true;
3283  m_tmpBuildSuccessBlocks.Add(block);
3284  if (ownerId == MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId)
3285  MySession.Static.TotalBlocksCreated++;
3286  }
3287  }
3288  }
3289 
3290  var worldBB = BoundingBoxD.CreateInvalid();
3291  foreach (var b in m_tmpBuildSuccessBlocks)
3292  {
3293  BoundingBoxD blockWorldAAABB;
3294  b.GetWorldBoundingBox(out blockWorldAAABB);
3295  worldBB.Include(blockWorldAAABB);
3296 
3297  if (b.FatBlock == null)
3298  continue;
3299  ProfilerShort.Begin("OnBuildSuccess");
3300  b.FatBlock.OnBuildSuccess(ownerId);
3301  ProfilerShort.End();
3302 
3303  }
3304  if (m_tmpBuildSuccessBlocks.Count > 0)
3305  {
3306  if (IsStatic && Sync.IsServer)
3307  {
3308  var entities = MyEntities.GetEntitiesInAABB(ref worldBB);
3309  foreach (var b in m_tmpBuildSuccessBlocks)
3310  DetectMerge(b, null, entities);
3311  entities.Clear();
3312  }
3313  m_tmpBuildSuccessBlocks[0].PlayConstructionSound(MyIntegrityChangeEnum.ConstructionBegin);
3314  UpdateGridAABB();
3315  }
3316  if (MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId == ownerId)
3317  if (successSound)
3318  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudPlaceBlock);
3319  else
3320  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudUnable);
3321  }
3322  finally
3323  {
3324  m_tmpBuildSuccessBlocks.Clear();
3325  ProfilerShort.End();
3326  }
3327  }
3328 
3329  private void GetAllBuildOffsetsExcept(ref MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea area, HashSet<Vector3UByte> exceptList, List<Vector3UByte> resultOffsets)
3330  {
3331  Vector3UByte offset;
3332  for (offset.X = 0; offset.X < area.BuildAreaSize.X; offset.X++)
3333  {
3334  for (offset.Y = 0; offset.Y < area.BuildAreaSize.Y; offset.Y++)
3335  {
3336  for (offset.Z = 0; offset.Z < area.BuildAreaSize.Z; offset.Z++)
3337  {
3338  if (!exceptList.Contains(offset))
3339  {
3340  resultOffsets.Add(offset);
3341  }
3342  }
3343  }
3344  }
3345  }
3346 
3347  private void GetValidBuildOffsets(ref MyCubeGrid.MyBlockBuildArea area, List<Vector3UByte> resultOffsets, HashSet<Vector3UByte> resultFailList)
3348  {
3349  Vector3I stepDir = area.StepDelta;
3350  MyBlockOrientation ori = new MyBlockOrientation(area.OrientationForward, area.OrientationUp);
3351  var blockDefinition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(area.DefinitionId);
3352 
3353  Vector3UByte offset;
3354  for (offset.X = 0; offset.X < area.BuildAreaSize.X; offset.X++)
3355  {
3356  for (offset.Y = 0; offset.Y < area.BuildAreaSize.Y; offset.Y++)
3357  {
3358  for (offset.Z = 0; offset.Z < area.BuildAreaSize.Z; offset.Z++)
3359  {
3360  Vector3I pos = area.PosInGrid + offset * stepDir;
3361 
3362  if (CanPlaceBlock(pos + area.BlockMin, pos + area.BlockMax, ori, blockDefinition))
3363  {
3364  resultOffsets.Add(offset);
3365  }
3366  else
3367  {
3368  resultFailList.Add(offset);
3369  }
3370  }
3371  }
3372  }
3373  }
3374 
3375  private void BuildBlocksSuccess(Vector3 colorMaskHsv, HashSet<MyBlockLocation> locations, HashSet<MyBlockLocation> resultBlocks, MyEntity builder, bool instantBuilt, long ownerId)
3376  {
3377  bool cubeProcessed = true;
3378 
3379  while (locations.Count > 0 && cubeProcessed)
3380  {
3381  cubeProcessed = false;
3382 
3383  foreach (MyBlockLocation location in locations)
3384  {
3385  Quaternion orientation;
3386  location.Orientation.GetQuaternion(out orientation);
3387  var center = location.CenterPos;
3388 
3389  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition;
3390  MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(location.BlockDefinition, out blockDefinition);
3391 
3392  if (blockDefinition == null)
3393  {
3394  Debug.Fail("Invalid block definition");
3395  return;
3396  }
3397 
3398  var mountPoints = blockDefinition.GetBuildProgressModelMountPoints(MyComponentStack.NewBlockIntegrity);
3399  // If we are on the server, we perform various checks. Clients on the other hand just build the blocks
3400  // TODO: Refactor
3401  if (!Sync.IsServer || CanPlaceWithConnectivity(location, ref orientation, ref center, blockDefinition, mountPoints))
3402  {
3403  var block = BuildBlock(blockDefinition, colorMaskHsv, location.Min, orientation, location.Owner, location.EntityId, builder, testMerge: false, buildAsAdmin: instantBuilt);
3404 
3405  if (block != null)
3406  {
3407  ChangeBlockOwner(instantBuilt, block, ownerId);
3408  var resultLocation = location;
3409  resultBlocks.Add(resultLocation);
3410  }
3411  cubeProcessed = true;
3412  locations.Remove(location);
3413  break;
3414  }
3415  }
3416  }
3417  }
3418 
3419  private bool CanPlaceWithConnectivity(MyBlockLocation location, ref Quaternion orientation, ref Vector3I center, MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition, MyCubeBlockDefinition.MountPoint[] mountPoints)
3420  {
3421  return CanPlaceBlock(location.Min, location.Max, location.Orientation, blockDefinition)
3422  && MyCubeGrid.CheckConnectivity(this, blockDefinition, mountPoints, ref orientation, ref center);
3423  }
3424 
3425  private void BuildBlockSuccess(Vector3 colorMaskHsv, MyBlockLocation location, MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock objectBuilder, ref MyBlockLocation? resultBlock, MyEntity builder, bool instantBuilt, long ownerId)
3426  {
3427  Quaternion orientation;
3428  location.Orientation.GetQuaternion(out orientation);
3429 
3430  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition;
3431  MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(location.BlockDefinition, out blockDefinition);
3432 
3433  if (blockDefinition == null)
3434  {
3435  Debug.Fail("Invalid block definition");
3436  return;
3437  }
3438 
3439  var block = BuildBlock(blockDefinition, colorMaskHsv, location.Min, orientation, location.Owner, location.EntityId, instantBuilt ? null: builder, objectBuilder);
3440 
3441  if (block != null)
3442  {
3443  ChangeBlockOwner(instantBuilt, block, ownerId);
3444  resultBlock = location;
3445  block.PlayConstructionSound(MyIntegrityChangeEnum.ConstructionBegin);
3446  }
3447  else
3448  {
3449  resultBlock = null;
3450  }
3451  }
3452 
3453  private static void ChangeBlockOwner(bool instantBuilt, MySlimBlock block, long ownerId)
3454  {
3455  if (block.FatBlock != null)
3456  {
3457  block.FatBlock.ChangeOwner(ownerId, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum.Faction);
3458  }
3459  }
3460 
3461  private void AfterBuildBlocksSuccess(HashSet<MyCubeGrid.MyBlockLocation> builtBlocks)
3462  {
3463  foreach (var location in builtBlocks)
3464  {
3465  AfterBuildBlockSuccess(location);
3466 
3467  MySlimBlock block = this.GetCubeBlock(location.CenterPos);
3468  // Detect merge after blocks are built.
3469  MyCubeGrid mergedGrid = DetectMerge(block, null);
3470  }
3471 
3472  }
3473 
3474  private void AfterBuildBlockSuccess(MyBlockLocation builtBlock)
3475  {
3476  var block = GetCubeBlock(builtBlock.CenterPos);
3477  if (block != null && block.FatBlock != null)
3478  {
3479  block.FatBlock.OnBuildSuccess(builtBlock.Owner);
3480  }
3481  }
3482 
3483  public void RazeBlocks(ref Vector3I pos, ref Vector3UByte size)
3484  {
3485  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RazeBlocksAreaRequest, pos, size);
3486  }
3487 
3488  [Event, Reliable, Server]
3489  void RazeBlocksAreaRequest(Vector3I pos, Vector3UByte size)
3490  {
3491  if (!MySession.Static.CreativeMode && !MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked && !MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value))
3492  {
3493  MyEventContext.ValidationFailed();
3494  return;
3495  }
3496  try
3497  {
3498  Vector3UByte offset;
3499  for (offset.X = 0; offset.X <= size.X; offset.X++)
3500  for (offset.Y = 0; offset.Y <= size.Y; offset.Y++)
3501  for (offset.Z = 0; offset.Z <= size.Z; offset.Z++)
3502  {
3503  var loc = pos + (Vector3I)offset;
3504  MySlimBlock slimBlock = GetCubeBlock(loc);
3505  if (slimBlock == null || (slimBlock.FatBlock != null && slimBlock.FatBlock.IsSubBlock))
3506  m_tmpBuildFailList.Add(offset);
3507  }
3508 
3509  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RazeBlocksAreaSuccess, pos, size, m_tmpBuildFailList);
3510  RazeBlocksAreaSuccess(pos, size, m_tmpBuildFailList);
3511  }
3512  finally
3513  {
3514  m_tmpBuildFailList.Clear();
3515  }
3516  }
3517 
3518  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
3519  void RazeBlocksAreaSuccess(Vector3I pos, Vector3UByte size, HashSet<Vector3UByte> resultFailList)
3520  {
3521  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
3522  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
3523 
3524  Vector3UByte offset;
3525 
3526  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCKS)
3527  {
3528  Debug.Assert(m_tmpSlimBlocks.Count == 0);
3529 
3530  for (offset.X = 0; offset.X <= size.X; offset.X++)
3531  for (offset.Y = 0; offset.Y <= size.Y; offset.Y++)
3532  for (offset.Z = 0; offset.Z <= size.Z; offset.Z++)
3533  {
3534  if (!resultFailList.Contains(offset))
3535  {
3536  var loc = pos + (Vector3I)offset;
3537 
3538  var block = GetCubeBlock(loc);
3539  if (block != null)
3540  {
3541  MyCompoundCubeBlock compound = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
3542  if (compound != null)
3543  {
3544  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Clear();
3545  m_tmpSlimBlocks.AddRange(compound.GetBlocks());
3546 
3547  foreach (var blockInCompound in m_tmpSlimBlocks)
3548  {
3549  if (blockInCompound.IsMultiBlockPart)
3550  {
3551  m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock.Clear();
3552 
3553  GetBlocksInMultiBlock(blockInCompound.MultiBlockId, m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock);
3554  RemoveMultiBlocks(ref min, ref max, m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock);
3555 
3556  m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock.Clear();
3557  }
3558  else
3559  {
3560  ushort? compoundId = compound.GetBlockId(blockInCompound);
3561  if (compoundId != null)
3562  RemoveBlockInCompound(blockInCompound.Position, compoundId.Value, ref min, ref max);
3563  }
3564  }
3565 
3566  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Clear();
3567  }
3568  else
3569  {
3570  if (block.IsMultiBlockPart)
3571  {
3572  m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock.Clear();
3573 
3574  GetBlocksInMultiBlock(block.MultiBlockId, m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock);
3575  RemoveMultiBlocks(ref min, ref max, m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock);
3576 
3577  m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock.Clear();
3578  }
3579  else
3580  {
3581  MyFracturedBlock fracturedBlock = block.FatBlock as MyFracturedBlock;
3582  if (fracturedBlock != null && fracturedBlock.MultiBlocks != null && fracturedBlock.MultiBlocks.Count > 0)
3583  {
3584  foreach (var mbpart in fracturedBlock.MultiBlocks)
3585  {
3586  if (mbpart != null)
3587  {
3588  m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock.Clear();
3589 
3590  MyMultiBlockDefinition mbDef = MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetMultiBlockDefinition(mbpart.MultiBlockDefinition);
3591  Debug.Assert(mbDef != null);
3592  if (mbDef != null)
3593  {
3594  GetBlocksInMultiBlock(mbpart.MultiBlockId, m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock);
3595  RemoveMultiBlocks(ref min, ref max, m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock);
3596  }
3597 
3598  m_tmpBlocksInMultiBlock.Clear();
3599  }
3600  }
3601  }
3602  else
3603  {
3604  min = Vector3I.Min(min, block.Min);
3605  max = Vector3I.Max(max, block.Max);
3606 
3607  RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(block);
3608  }
3609  }
3610  }
3611  }
3612  }
3613  }
3614  }
3615  else
3616  {
3617  for (offset.X = 0; offset.X <= size.X; offset.X++)
3618  for (offset.Y = 0; offset.Y <= size.Y; offset.Y++)
3619  for (offset.Z = 0; offset.Z <= size.Z; offset.Z++)
3620  {
3621  if (!resultFailList.Contains(offset))
3622  {
3623  var loc = pos + (Vector3I)offset;
3624 
3625  var block = GetCubeBlock(loc);
3626  if (block != null)
3627  {
3628  min = Vector3I.Min(min, block.Min);
3629  max = Vector3I.Max(max, block.Max);
3630 
3631  RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(block);
3632  }
3633  }
3634  }
3635  }
3636 
3637  if (Physics != null)
3638  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
3639  }
3640 
3641  private void RemoveMultiBlocks(ref Vector3I min, ref Vector3I max, HashSet<Tuple<MySlimBlock, ushort?>> tmpBlocksInMultiBlock)
3642  {
3643  foreach (var blockInMultiBlock in tmpBlocksInMultiBlock)
3644  {
3645  if (blockInMultiBlock.Item2 != null)
3646  {
3647  RemoveBlockInCompound(blockInMultiBlock.Item1.Position, blockInMultiBlock.Item2.Value, ref min, ref max);
3648  }
3649  else
3650  {
3651  min = Vector3I.Min(min, blockInMultiBlock.Item1.Min);
3652  max = Vector3I.Max(max, blockInMultiBlock.Item1.Max);
3653 
3654  RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(blockInMultiBlock.Item1);
3655  }
3656  }
3657  }
3658 
3659  public void RazeBlock(Vector3I position)
3660  {
3661  m_tmpPositionListSend.Clear();
3662  m_tmpPositionListSend.Add(position);
3663  RazeBlocks(m_tmpPositionListSend);
3664  }
3665 
3669  public void RazeBlocks(List<Vector3I> locations)
3670  {
3671  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RazeBlocksRequest, locations);
3672  }
3673 
3674  [Event, Reliable, Server]
3675  public void RazeBlocksRequest(List<Vector3I> locations)
3676  {
3677  m_tmpPositionListReceive.Clear();
3678  Debug.Assert(m_tmpPositionListReceive != locations, "The raze block message was received via loopback using the same list. This causes erasing of the message.");
3679 
3680  RazeBlocksSuccess(locations, m_tmpPositionListReceive);
3681 
3682  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RazeBlocksClient, m_tmpPositionListReceive);
3683  }
3684 
3685  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
3686  public void RazeBlocksClient(List<Vector3I> locations)
3687  {
3688  m_tmpPositionListReceive.Clear();
3689  Debug.Assert(m_tmpPositionListReceive != locations, "The raze block message was received via loopback using the same list. This causes erasing of the message.");
3690 
3691  RazeBlocksSuccess(locations, m_tmpPositionListReceive);
3692  }
3693 
3694  private void RazeBlocksSuccess(List<Vector3I> locations, List<Vector3I> removedBlocks)
3695  {
3696  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
3697  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
3698 
3699  foreach (var loc in locations)
3700  {
3701  var block = GetCubeBlock(loc);
3702  if (block != null)
3703  {
3704  removedBlocks.Add(loc);
3705 
3706  min = Vector3I.Min(min, block.Min);
3707  max = Vector3I.Max(max, block.Max);
3708 
3709  RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(block);
3710  }
3711  }
3712 
3713  if (Physics != null)
3714  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
3715 
3716  }
3717 
3718  public void RazeGeneratedBlocks(List<Vector3I> locations)
3719  {
3720  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
3721  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
3722 
3723  foreach (var loc in locations)
3724  {
3725  var block = GetCubeBlock(loc);
3726  if (block != null)
3727  {
3728  min = Vector3I.Min(min, block.Min);
3729  max = Vector3I.Max(max, block.Max);
3730 
3731  RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(block);
3732  }
3733  }
3734 
3735  if (Physics != null)
3736  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
3737  }
3738 
3739  private void RazeBlockInCompoundBlockSuccess(List<LocationIdentity> locationsAndIds, List<Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>> removedBlocks)
3740  {
3741  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
3742  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
3743 
3744  foreach (var identity in locationsAndIds)
3745  {
3746  RemoveBlockInCompound(identity.Location, identity.Id, ref min, ref max, removedBlocks);
3747  }
3748 
3749  m_dirtyRegion.AddCubeRegion(min, max);
3750 
3751  if (Physics != null)
3752  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
3753  }
3754 
3755  private void RemoveBlockInCompound(Vector3I position, ushort compoundBlockId, ref Vector3I min, ref Vector3I max, List<Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>> removedBlocks = null)
3756  {
3757  var block = GetCubeBlock(position);
3758  if (block != null && block.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
3759  {
3760  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
3761  RemoveBlockInCompoundInternal(position, compoundBlockId, ref min, ref max, removedBlocks, block, compoundBlock);
3762  }
3763  }
3764 
3765  public void RazeGeneratedBlocksInCompoundBlock(List<Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>> locationsAndIds)
3766  {
3767  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
3768  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
3769 
3770  foreach (var tuple in locationsAndIds)
3771  {
3772  var block = GetCubeBlock(tuple.Item1);
3773  if (block != null && block.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
3774  {
3775  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
3776  RemoveBlockInCompoundInternal(tuple.Item1, tuple.Item2, ref min, ref max, null, block, compoundBlock);
3777  }
3778  }
3779 
3780  m_dirtyRegion.AddCubeRegion(min, max);
3781  if (Physics != null)
3782  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
3783  }
3784 
3785  private void RemoveBlockInCompoundInternal(Vector3I position, ushort compoundBlockId, ref Vector3I min, ref Vector3I max, List<Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>> removedBlocks, MySlimBlock block, MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock)
3786  {
3787  // Remove block in compound block
3788  MySlimBlock blockToRemove = compoundBlock.GetBlock(compoundBlockId);
3789  if (blockToRemove != null)
3790  {
3791  if (compoundBlock.Remove(blockToRemove))
3792  {
3793  if (removedBlocks != null)
3794  removedBlocks.Add(new Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>(position, compoundBlockId));
3795 
3796  min = Vector3I.Min(min, block.Min);
3797  max = Vector3I.Max(max, block.Max);
3798 
3799  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections)
3800  {
3801  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.RemoveBlockSmallToLargeConnection(blockToRemove);
3802  }
3803 
3804  NotifyBlockRemoved(blockToRemove);
3805  }
3806  }
3807 
3808  // Remove compound if empty
3809  if (compoundBlock.GetBlocksCount() == 0)
3810  {
3811  RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(block);
3812  }
3813  }
3814 
3815  public void RazeGeneratedBlocks(List<MySlimBlock> generatedBlocks)
3816  {
3817  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.RazeGeneratedBlocks");
3818  m_tmpRazeList.Clear();
3819  m_tmpLocations.Clear();
3820 
3821  foreach (var generatedBlock in generatedBlocks)
3822  {
3823  Debug.Assert(generatedBlock.BlockDefinition.IsGeneratedBlock);
3824  var parentBlock = GetCubeBlock(generatedBlock.Position);
3825 
3826  if (parentBlock != null)
3827  {
3828  if (parentBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
3829  {
3830  MyCompoundCubeBlock cb = parentBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
3831  ushort? blockId = cb.GetBlockId(generatedBlock);
3832  Debug.Assert(blockId != null);
3833  if (blockId != null)
3834  m_tmpRazeList.Add(new Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>(generatedBlock.Position, blockId.Value));
3835  }
3836  else
3837  {
3838  m_tmpLocations.Add(generatedBlock.Position);
3839  }
3840  }
3841  }
3842 
3843  if (m_tmpLocations.Count > 0)
3844  RazeGeneratedBlocks(m_tmpLocations);
3845 
3846  if (m_tmpRazeList.Count > 0)
3847  RazeGeneratedBlocksInCompoundBlock(m_tmpRazeList);
3848 
3849  m_tmpRazeList.Clear();
3850  m_tmpLocations.Clear();
3851  ProfilerShort.End();
3852  }
3853 
3861  public void ColorBlocks(Vector3I min, Vector3I max, Vector3 newHSV, bool playSound)
3862  {
3863  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.ColorBlocks");
3864  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.ColorBlockRequest, min, max, newHSV, playSound);
3865  ProfilerShort.End();
3866  }
3867 
3868  public void ColorGrid(Vector3 newHSV, bool playSound)
3869  {
3870  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.ColorBlocks");
3871  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.ColorGridFriendlyRequest, newHSV, playSound);
3872  ProfilerShort.End();
3873  }
3874 
3875  [Event, Reliable, Server, Broadcast]
3876  private void ColorGridFriendlyRequest(Vector3 newHSV,bool playSound)
3877  {
3878  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.ColorBlockRequest");
3879  bool sound = false;
3880  foreach (var block in CubeBlocks)
3881  {
3882  sound |= ChangeColor(block, newHSV);
3883  }
3884  if (playSound && sound)
3885  {
3886  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudColorBlock);
3887  }
3888  ProfilerShort.End();
3889  }
3890 
3891  [Event, Reliable, Server, Broadcast]
3892  private void ColorBlockRequest(Vector3I min, Vector3I max, Vector3 newHSV, bool playSound)
3893  {
3894  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.ColorBlockRequest");
3895  Vector3I temp;
3896  bool sound = false;
3897  for (temp.X = min.X; temp.X <= max.X; temp.X++)
3898  for (temp.Y = min.Y; temp.Y <= max.Y; temp.Y++)
3899  for (temp.Z = min.Z; temp.Z <= max.Z; temp.Z++)
3900  {
3901  var block = GetCubeBlock(temp);
3902  if (block != null)
3903  {
3904  sound |= ChangeColor(block, newHSV);
3905  }
3906  }
3907 
3908  if (playSound && sound && Vector3D.Distance(MySector.MainCamera.Position, Vector3D.Transform(min * GridSize, WorldMatrix)) < 200)
3909  {
3910  MyGuiAudio.PlaySound(MyGuiSounds.HudColorBlock);
3911  }
3912 
3913  ProfilerShort.End();
3914  }
3915 
3919  private MySlimBlock BuildBlock(MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDefinition, Vector3 colorMaskHsv, Vector3I min, Quaternion orientation, long owner, long entityId, MyEntity builderEntity, MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock blockObjectBuilder = null, bool updateVolume = true, bool testMerge = true, bool buildAsAdmin = false)
3920  {
3921  ProfilerShort.Begin("BuildBlock");
3922 
3923  MyBlockOrientation blockOrientation = new MyBlockOrientation(ref orientation);
3924  if (blockObjectBuilder == null)
3925  {
3926  blockObjectBuilder = MyCubeGrid.CreateBlockObjectBuilder(blockDefinition, min, blockOrientation, entityId, owner, fullyBuilt: builderEntity == null || !MySession.Static.SurvivalMode || buildAsAdmin);
3927  blockObjectBuilder.ColorMaskHSV = colorMaskHsv;
3928  }
3929  else
3930  {
3931  blockObjectBuilder.Min = min;
3932  blockObjectBuilder.Orientation = orientation;
3933  }
3934  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.BeforeCreateBlock(blockDefinition, builderEntity, blockObjectBuilder, buildAsAdmin: buildAsAdmin);
3935 
3936  MySlimBlock block = null;
3937 
3938  if (Sync.IsServer)
3939  {
3940  Vector3I position = MySlimBlock.ComputePositionInGrid(new MatrixI(blockOrientation), blockDefinition, min);
3941  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBlockPlacementMaterials(blockDefinition, position, blockObjectBuilder.BlockOrientation, this);
3942  }
3943 
3944  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS && MyCompoundCubeBlock.IsCompoundEnabled(blockDefinition))
3945  {
3946  MySlimBlock existingSlimBlock = GetCubeBlock(min);
3947  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = existingSlimBlock != null ? existingSlimBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock : null;
3948 
3949  if (compoundBlock != null)
3950  {
3951  if (compoundBlock.CanAddBlock(blockDefinition, new MyBlockOrientation(ref orientation)))
3952  {
3953  // Existing compound block in position
3954  var objectBlock = MyCubeBlockFactory.CreateCubeBlock(blockObjectBuilder);
3955  block = objectBlock as MySlimBlock;
3956  if (block == null)
3957  block = new MySlimBlock();
3958 
3959  block.Init(blockObjectBuilder, this, objectBlock as MyCubeBlock);
3960  block.FatBlock.HookMultiplayer();
3961 
3962  ushort id;
3963  if (compoundBlock.Add(block, out id))
3964  {
3965  BoundsInclude(block);
3966 
3967  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(min);
3968 
3969  if (Physics != null)
3970  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(existingSlimBlock);
3971 
3972  NotifyBlockAdded(block);
3973  }
3974  }
3975  }
3976  else
3977  {
3978  // Create new compound block in position
3979  MyObjectBuilder_CompoundCubeBlock compoundCBBuilder = MyCompoundCubeBlock.CreateBuilder(blockObjectBuilder);
3980  block = AddBlock(compoundCBBuilder, testMerge);
3981  }
3982  }
3983  else
3984  {
3985  block = AddBlock(blockObjectBuilder, testMerge);
3986  }
3987 
3988  if (block != null)
3989  {
3990  // We have to use block.CubeGrid instead of this because adding the block could have caused a grid merge
3991  block.CubeGrid.BoundsInclude(block);
3992  if (updateVolume)
3993  block.CubeGrid.UpdateGridAABB();
3994 
3995  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections)
3996  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AddBlockSmallToLargeConnection(block);
3997 
3998  if (Sync.IsServer)
3999  {
4000  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.AfterSuccessfulBuild(builderEntity, buildAsAdmin);
4001  }
4002 
4003  MyCubeGrids.NotifyBlockBuilt(this, block);
4004  }
4005 
4006  ProfilerShort.End();
4007  return block;
4008  }
4009 
4010  internal bool AddExplosion(Vector3 pos, MyExplosionTypeEnum type, float radius, bool createParticles, bool createDebris)
4011  {
4012  // We don't want explosion on same cube too soon
4013  if (!m_explosions.AddInstance(TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(700), pos, GridSize * 2))
4014  return false;
4015 
4016  MyExplosionFlags flags = MyExplosionFlags.AFFECT_VOXELS;
4017 
4018  if (createParticles)
4019  {
4020  flags |= MyExplosionFlags.CREATE_PARTICLE_EFFECT;
4021  }
4022 
4023  if (createDebris)
4024  {
4025  flags |= MyExplosionFlags.CREATE_DEBRIS | MyExplosionFlags.CREATE_DECALS;
4026  }
4027 
4028  var explosionSphere = new BoundingSphere(pos, radius);
4029  MyExplosionInfo explosionInfo = new MyExplosionInfo()
4030  {
4031  PlayerDamage = 0,
4032  Damage = 1,
4033  ExplosionSphere = explosionSphere,
4034  ExcludedEntity = type == MyExplosionTypeEnum.GRID_DESTRUCTION ? this : null,
4035  ExplosionFlags = flags,
4036  ExplosionType = type,
4037  LifespanMiliseconds = MyExplosionsConstants.EXPLOSION_LIFESPAN,
4038  ParticleScale = Math.Max(GridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Large ? 1 : 0.4f, Math.Min(radius / 4, 6)),
4039  VoxelCutoutScale = 1.0f,
4040  PlaySound = false,
4041  CheckIntersections = false,
4042  VoxelExplosionCenter = explosionSphere.Center,
4043  Velocity = Physics.RigidBody.LinearVelocity,
4044  ObjectsRemoveDelayInMiliseconds = MyRandom.Instance.Next(250),
4045  };
4046  MyExplosions.AddExplosion(ref explosionInfo);
4047 
4048  return true;
4049  }
4050 
4051  public void ResetBlockSkeleton(MySlimBlock block, bool updateSync = false)
4052  {
4053  MultiplyBlockSkeleton(block, 0.0f, updateSync);
4054  }
4055 
4056  public void MultiplyBlockSkeleton(MySlimBlock block, float factor, bool updateSync = false)
4057  {
4058  Debug.Assert(Skeleton != null, "Skeleton null in MultiplyBlockSkeleton!");
4059  Debug.Assert(Physics != null, "Physics null in MultiplyBlockSkeleton!");
4060  if (Skeleton == null)
4061  {
4062  MyLog.Default.WriteLine("Skeleton null in MultiplyBlockSkeleton!" + this);
4063  }
4064  if (Physics == null)
4065  {
4066  MyLog.Default.WriteLine("Physics null in MultiplyBlockSkeleton!" + this);
4067  }
4068 
4069  if (block == null || Skeleton == null || Physics == null)
4070  return;
4071 
4072  var min = block.Min * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity;
4073  var max = block.Max * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity + MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity;
4074 
4075  bool bonesChanged = false;
4076 
4077  Vector3I pos;
4078  for (pos.Z = min.Z; pos.Z <= max.Z; pos.Z++)
4079  {
4080  for (pos.Y = min.Y; pos.Y <= max.Y; pos.Y++)
4081  {
4082  for (pos.X = min.X; pos.X <= max.X; pos.X++)
4083  {
4084  bonesChanged |= Skeleton.MultiplyBone(ref pos, factor, ref block.Min, this);
4085  }
4086  }
4087  }
4088 
4089  if (bonesChanged)
4090  {
4091  if (Sync.IsServer && updateSync)
4092  {
4093  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnBonesMultiplied, block.Position, factor);
4094  }
4095 
4096  min = block.Min - Vector3I.One;
4097  max = block.Max + Vector3I.One;
4098  for (pos.Z = min.Z; pos.Z <= max.Z; pos.Z++)
4099  {
4100  for (pos.Y = min.Y; pos.Y <= max.Y; pos.Y++)
4101  {
4102  for (pos.X = min.X; pos.X <= max.X; pos.X++)
4103  {
4104  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(pos);
4105  }
4106  }
4107  }
4108  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
4109  }
4110  }
4111 
4112  public void AddDirtyBone(Vector3I gridPosition, Vector3I boneOffset)
4113  {
4114  Skeleton.Wrap(ref gridPosition, ref boneOffset);
4115 
4116  var cubeOffset = boneOffset - new Vector3I(1, 1, 1);
4117  Vector3I min = Vector3I.Min(cubeOffset, new Vector3I(0, 0, 0));
4118  Vector3I max = Vector3I.Max(cubeOffset, new Vector3I(0, 0, 0));
4119 
4120  Vector3I temp = min;
4121  for (Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref min, ref max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out temp))
4122  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(gridPosition + temp);
4123  }
4124 
4125  public MySlimBlock GetCubeBlock(Vector3I pos)
4126  {
4127  MyCube result;
4128  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out result))
4129  {
4130  Debug.Assert(result.CubeBlock.FatBlock == null || !result.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Closed);
4131  return result.CubeBlock;
4132  }
4133 
4134  return null;
4135  }
4136 
4137  public MySlimBlock GetCubeBlock(Vector3I pos, ushort? compoundId)
4138  {
4139  if (compoundId == null)
4140  return GetCubeBlock(pos);
4141 
4142  MyCube result;
4143  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out result))
4144  {
4145  Debug.Assert(result.CubeBlock.FatBlock != null && !result.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Closed);
4146 
4147  MyCompoundCubeBlock compound = result.CubeBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4148  if (compound != null)
4149  {
4150  return compound.GetBlock(compoundId.Value);
4151  }
4152  }
4153 
4154  return null;
4155  }
4156 
4157  public T GetFirstBlockOfType<T>()
4158  where T : MyCubeBlock
4159  {
4160  foreach (var cube in m_cubeBlocks)
4161  {
4162  if (cube.FatBlock != null && (cube.FatBlock is T))
4163  return (cube.FatBlock as T);
4164  }
4165 
4166  return null;
4167  }
4168 
4172  public void FixTargetCube(out Vector3I cube, Vector3 fractionalGridPosition)
4173  {
4174  cube = Vector3I.Round(fractionalGridPosition);
4175  fractionalGridPosition += new Vector3(0.5f);
4176  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(cube)) return;
4177 
4178  // Calculate distances to all 26 neighbors of the cube
4179  Vector3 dDown = fractionalGridPosition - cube;
4180  Vector3 dUp = new Vector3(1.0f) - dDown;
4181  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN] = dDown.X;
4182  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP] = dUp.X;
4183  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YDOWN] = dDown.Y;
4184  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YUP] = dUp.Y;
4185  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.ZDOWN] = dDown.Z;
4186  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.ZUP] = dUp.Z;
4187  Vector3 dDown2 = dDown * dDown;
4188  Vector3 dUp2 = dUp * dUp;
4189  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YDOWN] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dDown2.X + dDown2.Y);
4190  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YUP] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dDown2.X + dUp2.Y);
4191  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YDOWN] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dUp2.X + dDown2.Y);
4192  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YUP] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dUp2.X + dUp2.Y);
4193  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dDown2.X + dDown2.Z);
4194  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_ZUP] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dDown2.X + dUp2.Z);
4195  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dUp2.X + dDown2.Z);
4196  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_ZUP] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dUp2.X + dUp2.Z);
4197  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YDOWN_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dDown2.Y + dDown2.Z);
4198  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YDOWN_ZUP] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dDown2.Y + dUp2.Z);
4199  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YUP_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dUp2.Y + dDown2.Z);
4200  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.YUP_ZUP] = (float)Math.Sqrt(dUp2.Y + dUp2.Z);
4201  Vector3 dDown3 = dDown2 * dDown;
4202  Vector3 dUp3 = dUp2 * dUp;
4203  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YDOWN_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Pow(dDown3.X + dDown3.Y + dDown3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4204  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YDOWN_ZUP] = (float)Math.Pow(dDown3.X + dDown3.Y + dUp3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4205  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YUP_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Pow(dDown3.X + dUp3.Y + dDown3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4206  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XDOWN_YUP_ZUP] = (float)Math.Pow(dDown3.X + dUp3.Y + dUp3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4207  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YDOWN_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Pow(dUp3.X + dDown3.Y + dDown3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4208  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YDOWN_ZUP] = (float)Math.Pow(dUp3.X + dDown3.Y + dUp3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4209  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YUP_ZDOWN] = (float)Math.Pow(dUp3.X + dUp3.Y + dDown3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4210  m_neighborDistances[(int)NeighborOffsetIndex.XUP_YUP_ZUP] = (float)Math.Pow(dUp3.X + dUp3.Y + dUp3.Z, 1.0 / 3.0);
4211 
4212  // Bubble sort the face neighbors by distance
4213  for (int i = 0; i < 25; ++i)
4214  {
4215  for (int j = 0; j < 25 - i; ++j)
4216  {
4217  float distFirst = m_neighborDistances[(int)m_neighborOffsetIndices[j]];
4218  float distSecond = m_neighborDistances[(int)m_neighborOffsetIndices[j + 1]];
4219  if (distFirst > distSecond)
4220  {
4221  NeighborOffsetIndex swap = m_neighborOffsetIndices[j];
4222  m_neighborOffsetIndices[j] = m_neighborOffsetIndices[j + 1];
4223  m_neighborOffsetIndices[j + 1] = swap;
4224  }
4225  }
4226  }
4227 
4228  // Find the first existing neighbor by distance
4229  Vector3I offset = new Vector3I();
4230  for (int i = 0; i < m_neighborOffsets.Count; ++i)
4231  {
4232  offset = m_neighborOffsets[(int)m_neighborOffsetIndices[i]];
4233  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(cube + offset))
4234  {
4235  cube = cube + offset;
4236  //break;
4237  return;
4238  }
4239  }
4240  }
4241 
4242  public HashSet<MySlimBlock> GetBlocks()
4243  {
4244  return m_cubeBlocks;
4245  }
4246 
4247  public ListReader<MyCubeBlock> GetFatBlocks()
4248  {
4249  return m_fatBlocks;
4250  }
4251 
4252  public MyFatBlockReader<T> GetFatBlocks<T>()
4253  where T : MyCubeBlock
4254  {
4255  return new MyFatBlockReader<T>(this);
4256  }
4257 
4261  public bool CanHavePhysics()
4262  {
4263  if (m_canHavePhysics)
4264  {
4265  //TODO Temporary performance improvement - HasPhysics should be cached somehow
4266  if (MyPerGameSettings.Game == GameEnum.SE_GAME || MyPerGameSettings.Game == GameEnum.VRS_GAME)
4267  {
4268  foreach (var block in m_cubeBlocks)
4269  {
4270  if (block.HasPhysics)
4271  return true;
4272  }
4273 
4274  m_canHavePhysics = false;
4275  }
4276  else
4277  {
4278  m_canHavePhysics = m_cubeBlocks.Count > 0;
4279  }
4280  }
4281  return m_canHavePhysics;
4282  }
4283 
4287  public static bool CanHavePhysics(List<MySlimBlock> blocks, int offset, int count)
4288  {
4289  if (offset < 0)
4290  {
4291  Debug.Fail(String.Format("Negative offset in CanHavePhysics - {0}", offset));
4292  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine(String.Format("Negative offset in CanHavePhysics - {0}", offset));
4293  // zxc throw here exception or not?
4294  return false;
4295  }
4296  for (int i = offset; i < offset + count; i++)
4297  {
4298  if (i >= blocks.Count)
4299  {
4300  break;
4301  }
4302  var block = blocks[i];
4303  if (block != null && block.HasPhysics)
4304  return true;
4305  }
4306  return false;
4307  }
4308 
4309  private void RebuildGrid()
4310  {
4311  // No physical cubes (closed in UpdateAfterSimulation)
4312  if (!CanHavePhysics())
4313  {
4314  return;
4315  }
4316 
4317  ProfilerShort.Begin("Rebuild grid");
4318 
4319  ProfilerShort.Begin("Recalc bounds");
4320  RecalcBounds();
4321  ProfilerShort.End();
4322 
4323  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove redundant parts");
4324  RemoveRedundantParts();
4325  ProfilerShort.End();
4326 
4327  ProfilerShort.Begin("Close grid physics");
4328  if (this.Physics != null)
4329  {
4330  this.Physics.Close();
4331  this.Physics = null;
4332  }
4333  ProfilerShort.End();
4334 
4335  ProfilerShort.Begin("Create grid physics");
4336  if (CreatePhysics)
4337  {
4338  Physics = new MyGridPhysics(this);
4339  RaisePhysicsChanged();
4340 
4341  if (!Sync.IsServer && MyPerGameSettings.GridRBFlagOnClients == RigidBodyFlag.RBF_KINEMATIC)
4342  Physics.RigidBody.UpdateMotionType(HkMotionType.Keyframed);
4343  }
4344  ProfilerShort.End();
4345 
4346  ProfilerShort.End();
4347  }
4348 
4349  [Event,Reliable,Broadcast]
4350  public void ConvertToDynamic()
4351  {
4352  Debug.Assert(IsStatic);
4353  if (!IsStatic || Physics == null || BlocksCount == 0) return;
4354 
4355  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections)
4356  {
4357  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.GridConvertedToDynamic(this);
4358  }
4359 
4360  IsStatic = false;
4361  MyCubeGridGroups.Static.UpdateDynamicState(this);
4362  SetInventoryMassDirty();
4363  Physics.ConvertToDynamic(GridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Large);
4364  RaisePhysicsChanged();
4365  Physics.RigidBody.AddGravity();
4366  RecalculateGravity();
4367  }
4368 
4369  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
4370  public void ConvertToStatic()
4371  {
4372 
4373  if (Physics.AngularVelocity.LengthSquared() > 0.01 * 0.01 || Physics.LinearVelocity.LengthSquared() > 0.01 * 0.01)
4374  return;
4375 
4376  IsStatic = true;
4377  Physics.ConvertToStatic();
4378  RaisePhysicsChanged();
4379  }
4380 
4381  public void DoDamage(float damage, MyHitInfo hitInfo, Vector3? localPos = null, long attackerId = 0)
4382  {
4383  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
4384 
4385  if (Sync.IsServer == false)
4386  {
4387  return;
4388  }
4389 
4390  Vector3I cubePos;
4391  if (localPos.HasValue)
4392  FixTargetCube(out cubePos, localPos.Value * GridSizeR);
4393  else
4394  FixTargetCube(out cubePos, Vector3D.Transform(hitInfo.Position, PositionComp.WorldMatrixInvScaled) * GridSizeR);
4395 
4396  var cube = GetCubeBlock(cubePos);
4397  //Debug.Assert(cube != null, "Cannot find block for damage!");
4398  if (cube != null)
4399  {
4400  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_FRACTURE_COMPONENT)
4401  {
4402  ushort? compoundId = null;
4403  MyCompoundCubeBlock compound = cube.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4404  if (compound != null)
4405  {
4406  compoundId = Physics.GetContactCompoundId(cube.Position, hitInfo.Position);
4407  if (compoundId == null)
4408  return;
4409 
4410  var blockInCompound = compound.GetBlock(compoundId.Value);
4411  if (blockInCompound != null)
4412  cube = blockInCompound;
4413  else
4414  return;
4415  }
4416  }
4417 
4418  ApplyDestructionDeformation(cube, damage, hitInfo, attackerId);
4419  }
4420  }
4421 
4422  public void ApplyDestructionDeformation(MySlimBlock block, float damage = 1f, MyHitInfo? hitInfo = null, long attackerId = 0)
4423  {
4424  if (MyPerGameSettings.Destruction)
4425  {
4426  Debug.Assert(hitInfo.HasValue, "Destruction needs additional info");
4427  (block as IMyDestroyableObject).DoDamage(damage, MyDamageType.Unknown, true, hitInfo, attackerId);
4428  }
4429  else
4430  {
4431  Debug.Assert(Sandbox.Game.Multiplayer.Sync.IsServer, "ApplyDestructionDeformation is supposed to be only server method");
4432  EnqueueDestructionDeformationBlock(block.Position);
4433  ApplyDestructionDeformationInternal(block, true, damage, attackerId);
4434  }
4435  }
4436 
4437  private float ApplyDestructionDeformationInternal(MySlimBlock block, bool sync, float damage = 1f, long attackerId = 0)
4438  {
4439  if (!BlocksDestructionEnabled)
4440  return 0;
4441 
4442  // Allow mods to stop deformation
4443  if (block.UseDamageSystem)
4444  {
4445  MyDamageInformation damageInfo = new MyDamageInformation(true, 1f, MyDamageType.Deformation, attackerId);
4446  MyDamageSystem.Static.RaiseBeforeDamageApplied(block, ref damageInfo);
4447 
4448  if (damageInfo.Amount == 0f)
4449  return 0;
4450  }
4451  m_totalBoneDisplacement = 0.0f;
4452 
4453  // TODO: Optimization. Cache bone changes (moves) and apply them only at the end
4454  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update corner bones");
4455  Vector3I minCube = Vector3I.MaxValue;
4456  Vector3I maxCube = Vector3I.MinValue;
4457  bool changed = false;
4458  for (int x = -1; x <= 1; x += 2)
4459  {
4460  for (int z = -1; z <= 1; z += 2)
4461  {
4462  changed = changed | MoveCornerBones(block.Min, new Vector3I(x, 0, z), ref minCube, ref maxCube);
4463  changed = changed | MoveCornerBones(block.Min, new Vector3I(x, z, 0), ref minCube, ref maxCube);
4464  changed = changed | MoveCornerBones(block.Min, new Vector3I(0, x, z), ref minCube, ref maxCube);
4465  }
4466  }
4467  if (changed)
4468  {
4469  m_dirtyRegion.AddCubeRegion(minCube, maxCube);
4470  }
4471  ProfilerShort.End();
4472 
4473  m_deformationRng.SetSeed(block.Position.GetHashCode());
4474 
4475  float angleDeviation = MathHelper.PiOver4 / 2;
4476 
4477  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update thin bones");
4478  float maxLinearDeviation = GridSizeHalf;
4479  var cubePos = block.Min;
4480  Vector3I min, max;
4481  for (int i = 0; i < 3; i++) // Three axes
4482  {
4483  min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
4484  max = Vector3I.MinValue;
4485 
4486  changed = false;
4487  changed |= ApplyTable(cubePos, MyCubeGridDeformationTables.ThinUpper[i], ref min, ref max, m_deformationRng, maxLinearDeviation, angleDeviation);
4488  changed |= ApplyTable(cubePos, MyCubeGridDeformationTables.ThinLower[i], ref min, ref max, m_deformationRng, maxLinearDeviation, angleDeviation);
4489 
4490  if (changed)
4491  {
4492  // One more bone to make sure to hit incident cubes
4493  min -= Vector3I.One;
4494  max += Vector3I.One;
4495  minCube = cubePos;
4496  maxCube = cubePos;
4497  Skeleton.Wrap(ref minCube, ref min);
4498  Skeleton.Wrap(ref maxCube, ref max);
4499  m_dirtyRegion.AddCubeRegion(minCube, maxCube);
4500  }
4501  }
4502  ProfilerShort.End();
4503 
4504  if (sync)
4505  {
4506  float damageAmount = m_totalBoneDisplacement * GridSize * 10.0f * damage;
4507 
4508  MyDamageInformation damageInfo = new MyDamageInformation(false, damageAmount, MyDamageType.Deformation, attackerId);
4509  if (block.UseDamageSystem)
4510  MyDamageSystem.Static.RaiseBeforeDamageApplied(block, ref damageInfo);
4511 
4512  if (damageAmount > 0f)
4513  (block as IMyDestroyableObject).DoDamage(damageInfo.Amount, MyDamageType.Deformation, true, attackerId: attackerId);
4514  }
4515  return m_totalBoneDisplacement;
4516  }
4517 
4522  public void RemoveDestroyedBlock(MySlimBlock block, long attackerId = 0)
4523  {
4524  if (!Sync.IsServer)
4525  return;
4526 
4527  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_FRACTURE_COMPONENT)
4528  {
4529  bool enableGenerators = attackerId != 0;
4530  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(enableGenerators);
4531 
4532  var existingBlock = GetCubeBlock(block.Position);
4533  Debug.Assert(existingBlock != null);
4534  if (existingBlock == null)
4535  return;
4536 
4537  if (existingBlock == block)
4538  {
4539  EnqueueDestroyedBlockWithId(block.Position, null, enableGenerators);
4540  RemoveDestroyedBlockInternal(block);
4541  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4542  }
4543  else
4544  {
4545  var compound = existingBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4546  if (compound != null)
4547  {
4548  var compoundId = compound.GetBlockId(block);
4549  if (compoundId != null)
4550  {
4551  EnqueueDestroyedBlockWithId(block.Position, compoundId, enableGenerators);
4552  RemoveDestroyedBlockInternal(block);
4553  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4554  }
4555  }
4556  }
4557 
4558  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled);
4559 
4560  // Change fractures in block into pieces
4561  var fractureComponent = block.GetFractureComponent();
4562  if (fractureComponent != null)
4563  {
4564  MyDestructionHelper.CreateFracturePiece(fractureComponent, true);
4565  }
4566  }
4567  else
4568  {
4569  EnqueueDestroyedBlock(block.Position);
4570  RemoveDestroyedBlockInternal(block);
4571  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4572  }
4573  }
4574 
4575  private void RemoveDestroyedBlockInternal(MySlimBlock block)
4576  {
4577  ApplyDestructionDeformationInternal(block, false);
4578  (block as IMyDestroyableObject).OnDestroy();
4579 
4580  var existingBlock = GetCubeBlock(block.Position);
4581  if (existingBlock == block)
4582  {
4583  RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: true);
4584  }
4585  else if (existingBlock != null)
4586  {
4587  var compound = existingBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4588  if (compound != null)
4589  {
4590  var compoundId = compound.GetBlockId(block);
4591  if (compoundId != null)
4592  {
4593  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue, max = Vector3I.MinValue;
4594  RemoveBlockInCompound(block.Position, compoundId.Value, ref min, ref max);
4595  }
4596  }
4597  }
4598  }
4599 
4600  private bool ApplyTable(Vector3I cubePos, MyCubeGridDeformationTables.DeformationTable table, ref Vector3I dirtyMin, ref Vector3I dirtyMax, MyRandom random, float maxLinearDeviation, float angleDeviation)
4601  {
4602  ProfilerShort.Begin("ApplyTable");
4603  if (!m_cubes.ContainsKey(cubePos + table.Normal))
4604  {
4605  Vector3I boneOffset;
4606  Vector3 clamp;
4607 
4608  float gridSizeTenth = GridSize / 10;
4609 
4610  m_tmpBoneSet.Clear();
4611  ProfilerShort.Begin("GetExistingBones");
4612  GetExistingBones(cubePos * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity + table.MinOffset, cubePos * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity + table.MaxOffset, m_tmpBoneSet);
4613 
4614  ProfilerShort.BeginNextBlock("table.OffsetTable");
4615  foreach (var offset in table.OffsetTable)
4616  {
4617  if (m_tmpBoneSet.ContainsKey(cubePos * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity + offset.Key))
4618  {
4619  boneOffset = offset.Key;
4620  clamp = new Vector3(GridSizeHalf - random.NextFloat(0, gridSizeTenth));
4621  Vector3 moveDirection = random.NextDeviatingVector(offset.Value, angleDeviation) * random.NextFloat(1, maxLinearDeviation);
4622  float length = moveDirection.Length();
4623  MoveBone(ref cubePos, ref boneOffset, ref moveDirection, ref length, ref clamp);
4624  }
4625  }
4626  ProfilerShort.End();
4627  dirtyMin = Vector3I.Min(dirtyMin, table.MinOffset);
4628  dirtyMax = Vector3I.Max(dirtyMax, table.MaxOffset);
4629  ProfilerShort.End();
4630  return true;
4631  }
4632  ProfilerShort.End();
4633  return false;
4634  }
4635 
4636 
4637  private void BlocksRemovedWithGenerator(List<Vector3I> blocksToRemove)
4638  {
4639  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(true, true);
4640 
4641  BlocksRemoved(blocksToRemove);
4642 
4643  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
4644  }
4645 
4646  private void BlocksRemovedWithoutGenerator(List<Vector3I> blocksToRemove)
4647  {
4648  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(false, true);
4649 
4650  BlocksRemoved(blocksToRemove);
4651 
4652  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
4653  }
4654 
4655  void BlocksWithIdRemovedWithGenerator(List<MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId> blocksToRemove)
4656  {
4657  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(true, true);
4658 
4659  BlocksWithIdRemoved(blocksToRemove);
4660 
4661  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
4662  }
4663 
4664  void BlocksWithIdRemovedWithoutGenerator(List<MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId> blocksToRemove)
4665  {
4666  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(false, true);
4667 
4668  BlocksWithIdRemoved(blocksToRemove);
4669 
4670  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
4671  }
4672 
4676  private void BlocksRemoved(List<Vector3I> blocksToRemove)
4677  {
4678  foreach (var pos in blocksToRemove)
4679  {
4680  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
4681  if (block != null)
4682  {
4683  RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: true);
4684  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4685  }
4686  }
4687  }
4688 
4689  private void BlocksWithIdRemoved(List<MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId> blocksToRemove)
4690  {
4691  foreach (var posAndId in blocksToRemove)
4692  {
4693  if (posAndId.CompoundId > ushort.MaxValue)
4694  {
4695  var block = GetCubeBlock(posAndId.Position);
4696  if (block != null)
4697  {
4698  RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: true);
4699  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4700  }
4701  }
4702  else
4703  {
4704  Vector3I min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
4705  Vector3I max = Vector3I.MinValue;
4706 
4707  RemoveBlockInCompound(posAndId.Position, (ushort)posAndId.CompoundId, ref min, ref max);
4708  if (min != Vector3I.MaxValue)
4709  Physics.AddDirtyArea(min, max);
4710  }
4711  }
4712  }
4713 
4714  private void BlocksDestroyed(List<Vector3I> blockToDestroy)
4715  {
4716  foreach (var pos in blockToDestroy)
4717  {
4718  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
4719  if (block != null)
4720  {
4721  RemoveDestroyedBlockInternal(block);
4722  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4723  }
4724  }
4725  }
4726 
4727  private void BlocksWithIdDestroyedWithGenerator(List<MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId> blocksToRemove)
4728  {
4729  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(true, true);
4730 
4731  BlocksWithIdRemoved(blocksToRemove);
4732 
4733  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
4734  }
4735 
4736  private void BlocksWithIdDestroyedWithoutGenerator(List<MyCubeGrid.BlockPositionId> blocksToRemove)
4737  {
4738  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(false, true);
4739 
4740  BlocksWithIdRemoved(blocksToRemove);
4741 
4742  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled, true);
4743  }
4744 
4745  private void BlocksDeformed(List<Vector3I> blockToDestroy)
4746  {
4747  foreach (var pos in blockToDestroy)
4748  {
4749  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
4750  if (block != null)
4751  {
4752  ApplyDestructionDeformationInternal(block, false);
4753  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4754  }
4755  }
4756  }
4757 
4758  [Event,Reliable,Broadcast]
4759  private void BlockIntegrityChanged(Vector3I pos, ushort subBlockId, float buildIntegrity, float integrity, MyIntegrityChangeEnum integrityChangeType, long grinderOwner)
4760  {
4761  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = null;
4762  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
4763  if (block != null)
4764  compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4765  if (compoundBlock != null)
4766  block = compoundBlock.GetBlock(subBlockId);
4767  //Debug.Assert(block != null, "Attempting to change integrity of a non-existent block!");
4768 
4769  if (block != null)
4770  {
4771  block.SetIntegrity(buildIntegrity, integrity, integrityChangeType, grinderOwner);
4772  }
4773  }
4774 
4775  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
4776  private void BlockStockpileChanged(Vector3I pos, ushort subBlockId, List<MyStockpileItem> items)
4777  {
4778  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
4779 
4780  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = null;
4781  if (block != null)
4782  compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4783  if (compoundBlock != null)
4784  block = compoundBlock.GetBlock(subBlockId);
4785 
4786  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Attempting to change stockpile of a non-existent block!");
4787 
4788  if (block != null)
4789  {
4790  block.ChangeStockpile(items);
4791  }
4792  }
4793 
4794  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
4795  private void FractureComponentRepaired(Vector3I pos, ushort subBlockId, long toolOwner)
4796  {
4797  Debug.Assert(!Sync.IsServer);
4798 
4799  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = null;
4800  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
4801  if (block != null)
4802  compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4803 
4804  if (compoundBlock != null)
4805  block = compoundBlock.GetBlock(subBlockId);
4806 
4807  if (block != null && block.FatBlock != null)
4808  {
4809  block.RepairFracturedBlock(toolOwner);
4810  }
4811  }
4812 
4813  private void RemoveBlockByCubeBuilder(MySlimBlock block)
4814  {
4815  RemoveBlockInternal(block, true);
4816 
4817  if (block.FatBlock != null)
4818  {
4819  block.FatBlock.OnRemovedByCubeBuilder();
4820  }
4821  }
4822 
4826  private void RemoveBlockInternal(MySlimBlock block, bool close, bool markDirtyDisconnects = true)
4827  {
4828  if (!m_cubeBlocks.Contains(block))
4829  {
4830  Debug.Fail("Block being removed twice");
4831  return;
4832  }
4833 
4834  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS)
4835  {
4836  RemoveMultiBlockInfo(block);
4837  }
4838 
4839  RenderData.RemoveDecals(block.Position);
4840 
4841  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove terminal block");
4842  var terminalBlock = block.FatBlock as MyTerminalBlock;
4843  if (terminalBlock != null)
4844  {
4845  for (int i = 0; i < BlockGroups.Count; i++)
4846  {
4847  var group = BlockGroups[i];
4848  if (group.Blocks.Contains(terminalBlock))
4849  group.Blocks.Remove(terminalBlock);
4850  if (group.Blocks.Count == 0)
4851  {
4852  RemoveGroup(group);
4853  i--;
4854  }
4855  }
4856  }
4857  ProfilerShort.End();
4858 
4859  bool removed;
4860  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove cubes");
4861  Vector3I temp = block.Min;
4862  for (Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref block.Min, ref block.Max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out temp))
4863  {
4864  removed = RemoveCube(temp);
4865  Debug.Assert(removed, "Cube to remove was not found");
4866  }
4867  ProfilerShort.End();
4868 
4869  ProfilerShort.Begin("RemoveBlockEdges");
4870  RemoveBlockEdges(block);
4871  ProfilerShort.End();
4872 
4873  if (block.FatBlock != null)
4874  {
4875  if (BlocksCounters.ContainsKey(block.BlockDefinition.Id.TypeId))
4876  BlocksCounters[block.BlockDefinition.Id.TypeId]--;
4877  ProfilerShort.Begin("Unregister");
4878  block.FatBlock.IsBeingRemoved = true;
4879  GridSystems.UnregisterFromSystems(block.FatBlock);
4880  ProfilerShort.End();
4881 
4882  if (close)
4883  {
4884  ProfilerShort.Begin("Mark for close");
4885  block.FatBlock.Close();
4886  ProfilerShort.End();
4887  }
4888  else
4889  {
4890  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove child");
4891  Hierarchy.RemoveChild(block.FatBlock);
4892  ProfilerShort.End();
4893  }
4894 
4895  ProfilerShort.Begin("UnregisterForDraw");
4896  if (block.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDrawFromParent)
4897  m_blocksForDraw.Remove(block.FatBlock);
4898  ProfilerShort.End();
4899  }
4900 
4901  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove Neighbours");
4902  block.RemoveNeighbours();
4903  ProfilerShort.End();
4904 
4905  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove Ownership");
4906  block.RemoveAuthorship();
4907  if (OnAuthorshipChanged != null)
4908  OnAuthorshipChanged(this);
4909  ProfilerShort.End();
4910 
4911  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove");
4912  m_cubeBlocks.Remove(block);
4913  if (block.FatBlock != null)
4914  {
4915  if (block.FatBlock is MyReactor)
4916  NumberOfReactors--;
4917  m_fatBlocks.Remove(block.FatBlock);
4918  block.FatBlock.IsBeingRemoved = false;
4919  }
4920  ProfilerShort.End();
4921 
4922  if (markDirtyDisconnects)
4923  m_disconnectsDirty = true;
4924 
4925  Vector3I cube = block.Min;
4926  for (Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref block.Min, ref block.Max); it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out cube))
4927  Skeleton.MarkCubeRemoved(ref cube);
4928 
4929  ProfilerShort.Begin("OnBlockRemoved");
4930 
4931  if (block.FatBlock != null && block.FatBlock.IDModule != null)
4932  ChangeOwner(block.FatBlock, block.FatBlock.IDModule.Owner, 0);
4933 
4934  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections)
4935  {
4936  ProfilerShort.Begin("CheckRemovedBlockSmallToLargeConnection");
4937  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.RemoveBlockSmallToLargeConnection(block);
4938  ProfilerShort.End();
4939  }
4940 
4941  NotifyBlockRemoved(block);
4942 
4943  if (close)
4944  NotifyBlockClosed(block);
4945 
4946  ProfilerShort.End();
4947 
4948  m_boundsDirty = true;
4949  }
4950 
4951  public void RemoveBlock(MySlimBlock block, bool updatePhysics = false)
4952  {
4953  // Client cannot remove blocks, only server
4954  if (!Sync.IsServer)
4955  return;
4956 
4957  if (!m_cubeBlocks.Contains(block))
4958  {
4959  Debug.Fail("Block being removed twice");
4960  return;
4961  }
4962 
4963  EnqueueRemovedBlock(block.Min, m_generatorsEnabled);
4964  RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: true);
4965 
4966  if (updatePhysics)
4967  {
4968  this.Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
4969  }
4970  }
4971 
4972  public void RemoveBlockWithId(MySlimBlock block, bool updatePhysics = false)
4973  {
4974  var cb = GetCubeBlock(block.Min);
4975  if (cb == null)
4976  return;
4977 
4978  // Prepare block from compound
4979  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = cb.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
4980  ushort? compoundId = null;
4981  if (compoundBlock != null)
4982  {
4983  compoundId = compoundBlock.GetBlockId(block);
4984  Debug.Assert(compoundId != null, "Block not found in compound");
4985  if (compoundId == null)
4986  return;
4987  }
4988 
4989  RemoveBlockWithId(block.Min, compoundId, updatePhysics: updatePhysics);
4990  }
4991 
4992  public void RemoveBlockWithId(Vector3I position, ushort? compoundId, bool updatePhysics = false)
4993  {
4994  // Client cannot remove blocks, only server
4995  if (!Sync.IsServer)
4996  return;
4997 
4998  var block = GetCubeBlock(position);
4999  if (block == null)
5000  return;
5001 
5002  EnqueueRemovedBlockWithId(block.Min, compoundId, m_generatorsEnabled);
5003  if (compoundId != null)
5004  {
5005  Vector3I min = Vector3I.Zero, max = Vector3I.Zero;
5006  RemoveBlockInCompound(block.Min, compoundId.Value, ref min, ref max);
5007  }
5008  else
5009  {
5010  RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: true);
5011  }
5012 
5013  if (updatePhysics)
5014  {
5015  this.Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
5016  }
5017  }
5018 
5019  public void UpdateBlockNeighbours(MySlimBlock block)
5020  {
5021  if (!m_cubeBlocks.Contains(block))
5022  {
5023  Debug.Assert(false, "Grid does not contain the given block!");
5024  return;
5025  }
5026 
5027  block.RemoveNeighbours();
5028  block.AddNeighbours();
5029  m_disconnectsDirty = true;
5030  }
5031 
5035  public Vector3 GetClosestCorner(Vector3I gridPos, Vector3 position)
5036  {
5037  return gridPos * GridSize - Vector3.SignNonZero(gridPos * GridSize - position) * GridSizeHalf;
5038  }
5039 
5040  public void DetectDisconnectsAfterFrame()
5041  {
5042  m_disconnectsDirty = true;
5043  }
5044 
5045  // Test method to detect disconnects
5046  // OPTIMIZE: Create tree from cubes, tree node will be cube or cube cycle (cubes circularly connected cubes)
5047  // Branch detachment = disconnect
5048  // When cycle is broken, it will be expanded to branch/subtree
5049  private void DetectDisconnects()
5050  {
5051  Debug.Assert(m_disconnectsDirty, "Do not call unless needed to (after block was removed).");
5052  if (!MyFakes.DETECT_DISCONNECTS)
5053  return;
5054 
5055  if (m_cubes.Count == 0)
5056  return;
5057 
5058  if (!Sync.IsServer)
5059  return;
5060 
5061  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawRead.CustomTimers.Remove("Mount points");
5062  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawWrite.CustomTimers.Remove("Mount points");
5063 
5064  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawRead.CustomTimers.Remove("Disconnect");
5065  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawWrite.CustomTimers.Remove("Disconnect");
5066  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawRead.StartTimer("Disconnect");
5067  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawWrite.StartTimer("Disconnect");
5068 
5069  ProfilerShort.Begin("Detect disconnects");
5070  m_disconnectHelper.Disconnect(this);
5071  m_disconnectsDirty = false;
5072  ProfilerShort.End();
5073 
5074  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawRead.StopTimer("Disconnect");
5075  MyPerformanceCounter.PerCameraDrawWrite.StopTimer("Disconnect");
5076  }
5077 
5078  public bool CubeExists(Vector3I pos)
5079  {
5080  return m_cubes.ContainsKey(pos);
5081  }
5082 
5083  public void UpdateDirty()
5084  {
5085  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update dirty");
5086 
5087  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update parts");
5088  foreach (var pos in m_dirtyRegion.Cubes)
5089  {
5090  UpdateParts(pos);
5091  }
5092  ProfilerShort.End();
5093 
5094  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update edges");
5095  foreach (var pos in m_dirtyRegion.Cubes)
5096  {
5097  var block = GetCubeBlock(pos);
5098  //Don't add edges for projections (dithering < 0)
5099  if (block != null && block.ShowParts && MyFakes.ENABLE_EDGES)
5100  {
5101  if (block.Dithering >= 0f)
5102  {
5103  // Edges are filtered (to remove duplicates) in render data
5104  AddBlockEdges(block);
5105  }
5106  else
5107  {
5108  RemoveBlockEdges(block);
5109  }
5110 
5111  block.UpdateMaxDeformation();
5112  }
5113  if (block != null && block.FatBlock != null && block.FatBlock.Render != null)
5114  {
5115  if (block.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDrawFromParent)
5116  {
5117  m_blocksForDraw.Add(block.FatBlock);
5118  block.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDraw = false; //blocks shouldnt be drawn on their own at all?
5119  }
5120  }
5121  }
5122  ProfilerShort.End();
5123 
5124  ProfilerShort.Begin("Update groups");
5125  UpdateInstanceData();
5126  ProfilerShort.End();
5127 
5128  m_dirtyRegion.Clear();
5129 
5130  ProfilerShort.End();
5131  }
5132 
5133  public bool IsDirty()
5134  {
5135  return m_dirtyRegion.IsDirty;
5136  }
5137  public void UpdateInstanceData()
5138  {
5139  ProfilerShort.Begin("Rebuild dirty cells");
5140  Render.RebuildDirtyCells();
5141  //no changes to volume actually made
5142  //if they were it would be marked dirty
5143  //PositionComp.UpdateWorldVolume();
5144  ProfilerShort.End();
5145  }
5146 
5147  public bool TryGetCube(Vector3I position, out MyCube cube)
5148  {
5149  return m_cubes.TryGetValue(position, out cube);
5150  }
5151 
5160  private bool AddCube(MySlimBlock block, ref Vector3I pos, Matrix rotation, MyCubeBlockDefinition cubeBlockDefinition)
5161  {
5162  //Debug.Assert(false, "AddCube");
5163  MyCube c = new MyCube();
5164 
5165  c.Parts = MyCubeGrid.GetCubeParts(cubeBlockDefinition, pos, rotation, GridSize, GridScale);
5166  c.CubeBlock = block;
5167 
5168  if (!m_cubes.ContainsKey(pos))
5169  m_cubes.Add(pos, c);
5170  else
5171  return false; //whole block will be removed
5172 
5173  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(pos);
5174 
5175  return true;
5176  }
5177 
5178  private MyCube CreateCube(MySlimBlock block, Vector3I pos, Matrix rotation, MyCubeBlockDefinition cubeBlockDefinition)
5179  {
5180  MyCube c = new MyCube();
5181  c.Parts = MyCubeGrid.GetCubeParts(cubeBlockDefinition, pos, rotation, GridSize, GridScale);
