5182  c.CubeBlock = block;
5183  return c;
5184  }
5185 
5186  //Temp public for debugging
5187  public bool ChangeColor(MySlimBlock block, Vector3 newHSV)
5188  {
5189  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.ChangeColor");
5190  try
5191  {
5192  if (block.ColorMaskHSV == newHSV)
5193  return false;
5194  block.ColorMaskHSV = newHSV;
5195  block.UpdateVisual(false); // Don't trigger physics updates for color changes
5196  return true;
5197  }
5198  finally
5199  {
5200  ProfilerShort.End();
5201  }
5202  }
5203 
5204  private void UpdatePartInstanceData(MyCubePart part, Vector3I cubePos)
5205  {
5206  MyCube cube;
5207  m_cubes.TryGetValue(cubePos, out cube);
5208  MySlimBlock block = cube.CubeBlock as MySlimBlock;
5209  if (block != null)
5210  {
5211  part.InstanceData.SetColorMaskHSV(new Vector4(block.ColorMaskHSV, block.Dithering));
5212  }
5213  {
5214  Debug.Assert(part.Model.BoneMapping != null, String.Format("Bones not set for model '{0}', add BoneGridSize tag to XML and rebuild model", part.Model.AssetName));
5215 
5216  if (part.Model.BoneMapping != null)
5217  {
5218  var orientation = part.InstanceData.LocalMatrix.GetOrientation();
5219  bool enableSkinning = false;
5220 
5221  part.InstanceData.BoneRange = GridSize;
5222 
5223  for (int index = 0; index < Math.Min(part.Model.BoneMapping.Length, 9); index++)
5224  {
5225  // Bone offset, from 0,0,0 to 2,2,2 inclusive
5226  var boneOffset = part.Model.BoneMapping[index];
5227 
5228  // -1,-1,-1 to 1,1,1
5229  Vector3 centered = boneOffset * 1.0f - Vector3.One;
5230 
5231  var transformedOffset = Vector3I.Round(Vector3.Transform(centered * 1.0f, orientation) + Vector3.One);
5232  Vector3 bonePos = Skeleton.GetBone(cubePos, transformedOffset);
5233 
5234  var byteBone = Vector3UByte.Normalize(bonePos, GridSize);
5235 
5236  if (!Vector3UByte.IsMiddle(byteBone))
5237  enableSkinning = true;
5238 
5239  // We need to copy bone anyway, because even when this bone is zero, other bones may not be
5240  part.InstanceData[index] = byteBone;
5241  }
5242  part.InstanceData.EnableSkinning = enableSkinning;
5243  }
5244  }
5245  }
5246 
5247  private void UpdateParts(Vector3I pos)
5248  {
5249  MyCube cube;
5250  bool exists = m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out cube);
5251  if (exists && cube.CubeBlock.ShowParts) // Cube exists
5252  {
5253  var gridDefinition = cube.CubeBlock.BlockDefinition;
5254  MyTileDefinition[] tiles = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetCubeTiles(gridDefinition);
5255 
5256  Matrix orientation;
5257  cube.CubeBlock.Orientation.GetMatrix(out orientation);
5258 
5259  if (Skeleton.IsDeformed(pos, 0.004f * GridSize, this, false))
5260  {
5261  RemoveBlockEdges(cube.CubeBlock);
5262  }
5263 
5264  for (int i = 0; i < cube.Parts.Length; i++)
5265  {
5266  UpdatePartInstanceData(cube.Parts[i], pos);
5267 
5268  // When part is already present, it doesn't mind, hashset can handle that
5269  Render.RenderData.AddCubePart(cube.Parts[i]);
5270 
5271  var tile = tiles[i];
5272 
5273  if (tile.IsEmpty)
5274  continue;
5275 
5276  var normal = Vector3.TransformNormal(tile.Normal, orientation);
5277  var up = Vector3.TransformNormal(tile.Up, orientation);
5278 
5279  // Only axis aligned direction apply
5280  if (!Base6Directions.IsBaseDirection(ref normal))
5281  continue;
5282 
5283  // Find neighbour in direction of normal
5284  var neighbour = pos + Vector3I.Round(normal);
5285 
5286  MyCube neighbourCube;
5287  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(neighbour, out neighbourCube) && neighbourCube.CubeBlock.ShowParts)
5288  {
5289  Matrix neighbourOrientation;
5290  neighbourCube.CubeBlock.Orientation.GetMatrix(out neighbourOrientation);
5291 
5292  var neighbourDefinition = neighbourCube.CubeBlock.BlockDefinition;
5293  MyTileDefinition[] neighbourTiles = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetCubeTiles(neighbourDefinition);
5294 
5295  for (int j = 0; j < neighbourCube.Parts.Length; j++)
5296  {
5297  var neighbourTile = neighbourTiles[j];
5298  if (neighbourTile.IsEmpty)
5299  continue;
5300 
5301  var neighbourNormal = Vector3.TransformNormal(neighbourTile.Normal, neighbourOrientation);
5302 
5303  if ((normal + neighbourNormal).LengthSquared() < 0.001f)
5304  {
5305  // Different dithering = add tile, same dithering = remove tile
5306  if (neighbourCube.CubeBlock.Dithering != cube.CubeBlock.Dithering)
5307  {
5308  // Doesn't matter if already added, hashset handle that
5309  Render.RenderData.AddCubePart(neighbourCube.Parts[j]);
5310  }
5311  else
5312  {
5313  bool isAnyFull = false;
5314  if (neighbourTile.FullQuad && !tile.IsRounded)
5315  {
5316  Render.RenderData.RemoveCubePart(cube.Parts[i]);
5317  isAnyFull = true;
5318  }
5319  if (tile.FullQuad && !neighbourTile.IsRounded)
5320  {
5321  Render.RenderData.RemoveCubePart(neighbourCube.Parts[j]);
5322  isAnyFull = true;
5323  }
5324 
5325  if (!isAnyFull && (neighbourTile.Up * tile.Up).LengthSquared() > 0.001f)
5326  {
5327  var neighbourUp = Vector3.TransformNormal(neighbourTile.Up, neighbourOrientation);
5328  if ((neighbourUp - up).LengthSquared() < 0.001f)
5329  {
5330  if (!tile.IsRounded || neighbourTile.IsRounded)
5331  {
5332  Render.RenderData.RemoveCubePart(cube.Parts[i]);
5333  }
5334  if (tile.IsRounded || !neighbourTile.IsRounded)
5335  {
5336  Render.RenderData.RemoveCubePart(neighbourCube.Parts[j]);
5337  }
5338  }
5339  }
5340  }
5341  }
5342  }
5343  }
5344  }
5345 
5346  }
5347  else // Cubes was probably removed
5348  {
5349  if (exists)
5350  {
5351  foreach (var part in cube.Parts)
5352  {
5353  Render.RenderData.RemoveCubePart(part);
5354  }
5355  }
5356 
5357  // Foreach neighbour, add shared tile
5358  foreach (var dir in Base6Directions.Directions)
5359  {
5360  var neighbour = pos + Vector3I.Round(dir);
5361 
5362  MyCube neighbourCube;
5363  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(neighbour, out neighbourCube) && neighbourCube.CubeBlock.ShowParts)
5364  {
5365  Matrix neighbourOrientation;
5366  neighbourCube.CubeBlock.Orientation.GetMatrix(out neighbourOrientation);
5367 
5368  var neighbourDefinition = neighbourCube.CubeBlock.BlockDefinition;
5369  MyTileDefinition[] neighbourTiles = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetCubeTiles(neighbourDefinition);
5370 
5371  for (int j = 0; j < neighbourCube.Parts.Length; j++)
5372  {
5373  var neighbourTile = neighbourTiles[j];
5374  var neighbourNormal = Vector3.Normalize(Vector3.TransformNormal(neighbourTile.Normal, neighbourOrientation));
5375 
5376  if ((dir + neighbourNormal).LengthSquared() < 0.001f)
5377  {
5378  // Doesn't matter if already added, hashset handle that
5379  Render.RenderData.AddCubePart(neighbourCube.Parts[j]);
5380  }
5381  }
5382  }
5383  }
5384  }
5385  }
5386 
5387  private void RemoveRedundantParts()
5388  {
5389  foreach (var pair in m_cubes)
5390  {
5391  UpdateParts(pair.Key);
5392  }
5393  }
5394 
5395  private void BoundsInclude(MySlimBlock block)
5396  {
5397  //Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block cannot be null");
5398 
5399  if (block != null)
5400  {
5401  m_min = Vector3I.Min(m_min, block.Min);
5402  m_max = Vector3I.Max(m_max, block.Max);
5403  }
5404  }
5405 
5406  private void BoundsIncludeUpdateAABB(MySlimBlock block)
5407  {
5408  BoundsInclude(block);
5409  UpdateGridAABB();
5410  }
5411 
5412  private void RecalcBounds()
5413  {
5414  m_min = Vector3I.MaxValue;
5415  m_max = Vector3I.MinValue;
5416 
5417  if (m_cubes.Count > 0)
5418  {
5419  foreach (var c in m_cubes)
5420  {
5421  m_min = Vector3I.Min(m_min, c.Key);
5422  m_max = Vector3I.Max(m_max, c.Key);
5423  }
5424  }
5425 
5426  UpdateGridAABB();
5427  }
5428 
5429  private void UpdateGridAABB()
5430  {
5431  PositionComp.LocalAABB = new BoundingBox(m_min * GridSize - GridSizeHalfVector, m_max * GridSize + GridSizeHalfVector);
5432  }
5433 
5434  private void ResetSkeleton()
5435  {
5436  Skeleton = new MyGridSkeleton();
5437  }
5438 
5442  private bool MoveCornerBones(Vector3I cubePos, Vector3I offset, ref Vector3I minCube, ref Vector3I maxCube)
5443  {
5444  var absOffset = Vector3I.Abs(offset);
5445  var shift = Vector3I.Shift(absOffset);
5446  Vector3I a = offset * shift;
5447  Vector3I b = offset * Vector3I.Shift(shift);
5448  Vector3 clamp = GridSizeHalfVector;
5449 
5450  bool exists = m_cubes.ContainsKey(cubePos + offset);
5451  exists &= m_cubes.ContainsKey(cubePos + a);
5452  exists &= m_cubes.ContainsKey(cubePos + b);
5453 
5454  // Three in corner exists, do bone transform
5455  if (exists)
5456  {
5457  var normal = Vector3I.One - absOffset;
5458  var centerBone = Vector3I.One;
5459 
5460  var targetBone = centerBone + offset;
5461  var upper = targetBone + normal;
5462  var lower = targetBone - normal;
5463 
5464  Vector3 moveDirection = -offset * MyGridConstants.CORNER_BONE_MOVE_DISTANCE; // 1m per axis in direction
5465 
5466  // Performance update: Instead of moveDirection.Length() we have precomputed the lengths, as the moveDirection is always constant * GridSize because of the constraint that
5467  // offset always has to contain 2x 1, and 1x 0. Since offset length will thus always be the same, we can treat it as a constant, and save the square root performance call.
5468  if (m_precalculatedCornerBonesDisplacementDistance <= 0)
5469  m_precalculatedCornerBonesDisplacementDistance = moveDirection.Length();
5470  float displacementLength = m_precalculatedCornerBonesDisplacementDistance;
5471 
5472  // Now accomodate for grid size
5473  displacementLength *= GridSize;
5474  moveDirection *= GridSize;
5475 
5476  // The bones here exists
5477  MoveBone(ref cubePos, ref targetBone, ref moveDirection, ref displacementLength, ref clamp);
5478  MoveBone(ref cubePos, ref upper, ref moveDirection, ref displacementLength, ref clamp);
5479  MoveBone(ref cubePos, ref lower, ref moveDirection, ref displacementLength, ref clamp);
5480 
5481  minCube = Vector3I.Min(Vector3I.Min(cubePos, minCube), cubePos + offset - normal);
5482  maxCube = Vector3I.Max(Vector3I.Max(cubePos, maxCube), cubePos + offset + normal);
5483  }
5484  return exists;
5485  }
5486 
5487  public void GetExistingBones(Vector3I boneMin, Vector3I boneMax, Dictionary<Vector3I, MySlimBlock> resultSet, MyDamageInformation? damageInfo = null)
5488  {
5489  Vector3I cubeMin = Vector3I.Floor((boneMin - Vector3I.One) / (float)MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity);
5490  Vector3I cubeMax = Vector3I.Ceiling((boneMax - Vector3I.One) / (float)MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity);
5491  MyDamageInformation info = damageInfo.HasValue ? damageInfo.Value : default(MyDamageInformation);
5492  resultSet.Clear();
5493  Vector3I cube, boneBase;
5494  MyCube cubeInst;
5495  for (cube.X = cubeMin.X; cube.X <= cubeMax.X; cube.X++)
5496  for (cube.Y = cubeMin.Y; cube.Y <= cubeMax.Y; cube.Y++)
5497  for (cube.Z = cubeMin.Z; cube.Z <= cubeMax.Z; cube.Z++)
5498  {
5499  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(cube, out cubeInst) && cubeInst.CubeBlock.UsesDeformation)
5500  {
5501  if (cubeInst.CubeBlock.UseDamageSystem && damageInfo.HasValue)
5502  {
5503  info.Amount = 1;
5504  MyDamageSystem.Static.RaiseBeforeDamageApplied(cubeInst.CubeBlock, ref info);
5505  if (info.Amount == 0)
5506  continue;
5507  }
5508 
5509  //TODO:perf: in plane of armor this leads to lot of overrides on block edges
5510  //3*3 = 9 bones are shared with neighbor - overriden in next iteration
5511  boneBase = cube * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity;
5512  foreach (var offset in Skeleton.BoneOffsets)
5513  resultSet[boneBase + offset] = cubeInst.CubeBlock;
5514  }
5515  }
5516  }
5517 
5518  private void MoveBone(ref Vector3I cubePos, ref Vector3I boneOffset, ref Vector3 moveDirection, ref float displacementLength, ref Vector3 clamp)
5519  {
5520  m_totalBoneDisplacement += displacementLength;
5521  var pos = cubePos * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity + boneOffset;
5522  var boneValue = Skeleton[pos] + moveDirection;
5523  Skeleton[pos] = Vector3.Clamp(boneValue, -clamp, clamp);
5524  }
5525 
5526  private bool RemoveCube(Vector3I pos)
5527  {
5528  MyCube cube;
5529  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out cube))
5530  {
5531  foreach (var p in cube.Parts)
5532  {
5533  Render.RenderData.RemoveCubePart(p);
5534  }
5535  m_cubes.Remove(pos);
5536  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(pos);
5537 
5538  return true;
5539  }
5540  return false;
5541  }
5542 
5548  public MyCubeGrid DetectMerge(MySlimBlock block, MyCubeGrid ignore = null, List<MyEntity> nearEntities = null)
5549  {
5550  if (!this.IsStatic)
5551  return null;
5552 
5553  if (!Sync.IsServer)
5554  return null;
5555 
5556  if (block == null)
5557  return null;
5558 
5559  MyCubeGrid retval = null;
5560 
5561  ProfilerShort.Begin("Test merge");
5562 
5563  BoundingBoxD aabb = (BoundingBoxD)new BoundingBox(block.Min * GridSize - GridSizeHalf, block.Max * GridSize + GridSizeHalf);
5564  // Inflate by half cube, so it will intersect for sure when there's anything
5565  aabb.Inflate(GridSizeHalf);
5566  aabb = aabb.TransformFast(WorldMatrix);
5567  bool clearNearEntities = false;
5568  if (nearEntities == null)
5569  {
5570  clearNearEntities = true;
5571  nearEntities = MyEntities.GetEntitiesInAABB(ref aabb);
5572  }
5573  for (int i = 0; i < nearEntities.Count; i++)
5574  {
5575  Vector3I gridOffset;
5576 
5577  var grid = nearEntities[i] as MyCubeGrid;
5578  var mergingGrid = retval != null ? retval : this;
5579 
5580  if (grid != null && grid != this && grid.Physics != null && grid.Physics.Enabled && grid != ignore && grid.IsStatic && grid.GridSizeEnum == mergingGrid.GridSizeEnum
5581  && mergingGrid.IsMergePossible_Static(block, grid, out gridOffset))
5582  {
5583 
5584  MyCubeGrid mergeTo = mergingGrid;
5585  MyCubeGrid mergeFrom = grid;
5586 
5587  // Change the merge order if needed.
5588  if (grid.BlocksCount > mergingGrid.BlocksCount)
5589  {
5590  mergeTo = grid;
5591  mergeFrom = mergingGrid;
5592  }
5593 
5594  Vector3D gridPosition = mergeFrom.PositionComp.GetPosition();
5595  gridPosition = Vector3D.Transform(gridPosition, mergeTo.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
5596  Vector3I gridOffsetFoo = Vector3I.Round(gridPosition * GridSizeR);
5597 
5598  MyCubeGrid localMergedGrid = mergeTo.MergeGrid_Static(mergeFrom, gridOffsetFoo, block);
5599 
5600  if (localMergedGrid != null)
5601  retval = localMergedGrid;
5602  }
5603  }
5604 
5605  if (clearNearEntities)
5606  nearEntities.Clear(); // We don't want to hold references to objects and keep them alive!
5607 
5608  ProfilerShort.End();
5609 
5610  return retval;
5611  }
5612 
5614  private bool IsMergePossible_Static(MySlimBlock block, MyCubeGrid gridToMerge, out Vector3I gridOffset)
5615  {
5616  //Debug.Assert(this.WorldMatrix.Up == Vector3D.Up && this.WorldMatrix.Forward == Vector3D.Forward, "This grid must have identity rotation");
5617  //Debug.Assert(gridToMerge.WorldMatrix.Up == Vector3D.Up && gridToMerge.WorldMatrix.Forward == Vector3D.Forward, "Grid to merge must have identity rotation");
5618 
5619  Vector3D thisMergePos = this.PositionComp.GetPosition();
5620  thisMergePos = Vector3D.Transform(thisMergePos, gridToMerge.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
5621  gridOffset = -Vector3I.Round((thisMergePos) * GridSizeR);
5622 
5623  if (!IsOrientationsAligned(gridToMerge.WorldMatrix, this.WorldMatrix))
5624  return false;
5625 
5626  var transform = gridToMerge.CalculateMergeTransform(this, -gridOffset);
5627  Vector3I blockPosInSecondGrid;
5628  Vector3I.Transform(ref block.Position, ref transform, out blockPosInSecondGrid);
5629 
5630  MyBlockOrientation newOrientation = MatrixI.Transform(ref block.Orientation, ref transform);
5631  Quaternion blockOrientation;
5632  newOrientation.GetQuaternion(out blockOrientation);
5633 
5634  var mountPoints = block.BlockDefinition.GetBuildProgressModelMountPoints(block.BuildLevelRatio);
5635  return CheckConnectivity(gridToMerge, block.BlockDefinition, mountPoints, ref blockOrientation, ref blockPosInSecondGrid);
5636  }
5637 
5638  public MatrixI CalculateMergeTransform(MyCubeGrid gridToMerge, Vector3I gridOffset)
5639  {
5640  Vector3 fw = (Vector3)Vector3D.TransformNormal(gridToMerge.WorldMatrix.Forward, this.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
5641  Vector3 up = (Vector3)Vector3D.TransformNormal(gridToMerge.WorldMatrix.Up, this.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
5642  Base6Directions.Direction fwDir = Base6Directions.GetClosestDirection(fw);
5643  Base6Directions.Direction upDir = Base6Directions.GetClosestDirection(up);
5644  if (upDir == fwDir) upDir = Base6Directions.GetPerpendicular(fwDir);
5645  MatrixI transform = new MatrixI(ref gridOffset, fwDir, upDir);
5646  return transform;
5647  }
5648 
5649  public bool CanMergeCubes(MyCubeGrid gridToMerge, Vector3I gridOffset)
5650  {
5651  MatrixI transform = CalculateMergeTransform(gridToMerge, gridOffset);
5652  foreach (var cubesEntry in gridToMerge.m_cubes)
5653  {
5654  Vector3I position = Vector3I.Transform(cubesEntry.Key, transform);
5655  if (this.m_cubes.ContainsKey(position))
5656  {
5657  MySlimBlock localBlock = GetCubeBlock(position);
5658  if (localBlock != null && localBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
5659  {
5660  MyCompoundCubeBlock localCompoundBlock = localBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
5661 
5662  MySlimBlock blockInMergeGrid = gridToMerge.GetCubeBlock(cubesEntry.Key);
5663  if (blockInMergeGrid.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
5664  {
5665  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundInMergeGrid = blockInMergeGrid.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
5666 
5667  bool canMerge = true;
5668 
5669  foreach (var blockInCompund in compoundInMergeGrid.GetBlocks())
5670  {
5671  MyBlockOrientation newOrientation = MatrixI.Transform(ref blockInCompund.Orientation, ref transform);
5672 
5673  if (!localCompoundBlock.CanAddBlock(blockInCompund.BlockDefinition, newOrientation))
5674  {
5675  canMerge = false;
5676  break;
5677  }
5678  }
5679 
5680  if (canMerge)
5681  continue;
5682  }
5683  else
5684  {
5685  MyBlockOrientation newOrientation = MatrixI.Transform(ref blockInMergeGrid.Orientation, ref transform);
5686 
5687  if (localCompoundBlock.CanAddBlock(blockInMergeGrid.BlockDefinition, newOrientation))
5688  continue;
5689  }
5690  }
5691 
5692  return false;
5693  }
5694  }
5695 
5696  return true;
5697  }
5698 
5699  private MyCubeGrid MergeGrid_Static(MyCubeGrid gridToMerge, Vector3I gridOffset, MySlimBlock triggeringMergeBlock)
5700  {
5701  Debug.Assert(this.IsStatic && gridToMerge.IsStatic, "Grids to merge must be static");
5702 
5703  // We have to force replicate grids before merging them on client. Otherwise he won't have one of them and fails tragically.
5704  MyMultiplayer.ReplicateImmediatelly(gridToMerge, this);
5705  MyMultiplayer.ReplicateImmediatelly(this, gridToMerge);
5706 
5707  MatrixI transform = CalculateMergeTransform(gridToMerge, gridOffset);
5708 
5709  // Get transformed position of block that triggered merge.
5710  Vector3I mergingBlockPos = triggeringMergeBlock.Position;
5711  if (triggeringMergeBlock.CubeGrid != this)
5712  mergingBlockPos = Vector3I.Transform(mergingBlockPos, transform);
5713 
5714  MyMultiplayer.RaiseBlockingEvent(this, gridToMerge, x => x.MergeGrid_MergeClient, gridToMerge.EntityId, (SerializableVector3I)transform.Translation, transform.Forward, transform.Up, mergingBlockPos);
5715 
5716  MyCubeGrid newGrid = MergeGridInternal(gridToMerge, ref transform);
5717 
5718  newGrid.AdditionalModelGenerators.ForEach(g => g.BlockAddedToMergedGrid(triggeringMergeBlock));
5719 
5720  return newGrid;
5721  }
5722 
5731  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast, Blocking]
5732  void MergeGrid_MergeClient(long gridId, SerializableVector3I gridOffset, Base6Directions.Direction gridForward, Base6Directions.Direction gridUp, Vector3I mergingBlockPos)
5733  {
5734  MyCubeGrid grid = null;
5735  bool found = MyEntities.TryGetEntityById<MyCubeGrid>(gridId, out grid);
5736  Debug.Assert(found, "Grid not found ! please call Dusan");
5737  if (found)
5738  {
5739  MatrixI transform = new MatrixI(gridOffset, gridForward, gridUp);
5740  MyCubeGrid newGrid = MergeGridInternal(grid, ref transform);
5741 
5742  // Get block that triggered merge and regenerate Model Generators.
5743  MySlimBlock triggeringMergeBlock = newGrid.GetCubeBlock(mergingBlockPos);
5744  newGrid.AdditionalModelGenerators.ForEach(g => g.BlockAddedToMergedGrid(triggeringMergeBlock));
5745 
5746  }
5747  }
5748 
5749  public MyCubeGrid MergeGrid_MergeBlock(MyCubeGrid gridToMerge, Vector3I gridOffset)
5750  {
5751  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
5752 
5753  // Always merge smaller grid to larger
5754  if ((this.BlocksCount < gridToMerge.BlocksCount && !this.IsStatic) || (!this.IsStatic && gridToMerge.IsStatic))
5755  {
5756  return null;
5757  }
5758 
5759  MatrixI transform = CalculateMergeTransform(gridToMerge, gridOffset);
5760 
5761  MyMultiplayer.ReplicateImmediatelly(gridToMerge, this);
5762  MyMultiplayer.ReplicateImmediatelly(this, gridToMerge);
5763 
5764  MyMultiplayer.RaiseBlockingEvent(this, gridToMerge, x => x.MergeGrid_MergeBlockClient, gridToMerge.EntityId, (SerializableVector3I)transform.Translation, transform.Forward, transform.Up);
5765  return MergeGridInternal(gridToMerge, ref transform);
5766  }
5767 
5768  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast, Blocking]
5769  void MergeGrid_MergeBlockClient(long gridId, SerializableVector3I gridOffset, Base6Directions.Direction gridForward, Base6Directions.Direction gridUp)
5770  {
5771  MyCubeGrid grid = null;
5772  bool found = MyEntities.TryGetEntityById<MyCubeGrid>(gridId, out grid);
5773  Debug.Assert(found, "Grid not found ! please call Dusan");
5774  if (found)
5775  {
5776  MatrixI transform = new MatrixI(gridOffset, gridForward, gridUp);
5777  MergeGridInternal(grid, ref transform);
5778  }
5779  }
5780 
5781  MyCubeGrid MergeGridInternal(MyCubeGrid gridToMerge, ref MatrixI transform, bool disableBlockGenerators = true)
5782  {
5783  ProfilerShort.Begin("MergeGridInternal");
5784 
5785  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null)
5786  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.BeforeGridMerge_SmallToLargeGridConnectivity(this, gridToMerge);
5787 
5788  MoveBlocksAndClose(gridToMerge, this, transform, disableBlockGenerators: disableBlockGenerators);
5789 
5790  // Update AABB, physics, dirty blocks
5791  UpdateGridAABB();
5792 
5793  if (Physics != null)
5794  {
5795  // We need to update physics immediatelly because of landing gears
5796  UpdatePhysicsShape();
5797  }
5798 
5799  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null)
5800  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AfterGridMerge_SmallToLargeGridConnectivity(this);
5801 
5802  ProfilerShort.End();
5803  return this;
5804  }
5805 
5806  public void ChangeGridOwnership(long playerId, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode)
5807  {
5808  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer, "Changing grid ownership from the client");
5809  if (!Sync.IsServer) return;
5810 
5811  ChangeGridOwner(playerId, shareMode);
5812  }
5813 
5814  private static void MoveBlocks(MyCubeGrid from, MyCubeGrid to, List<MySlimBlock> cubeBlocks, int offset, int count)
5815  {
5816  ProfilerShort.Begin("MoveBlocks");
5817 
5818  from.EnableGenerators(false, true);
5819  to.EnableGenerators(false, true);
5820 
5821  try
5822  {
5823 
5824  m_tmpBlockGroups.Clear();
5825  foreach (var group in from.BlockGroups)
5826  {
5827  // CH: TODO: This is to catch a nullref. Remove when not needed
5828  if (group == null) MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("group in from.BlockGroups was null");
5829 
5830  m_tmpBlockGroups.Add(group.GetObjectBuilder());
5831  }
5832 
5833  ProfilerShort.Begin("RemoveBlockInternal");
5834  for (int i = offset; i < offset + count; i++)
5835  {
5836  var block = cubeBlocks[i];
5837  if (block == null) continue;
5838 
5839  if (block.FatBlock != null)
5840  from.Hierarchy.RemoveChild(block.FatBlock);
5841 
5842  from.RemoveBlockInternal(block, close: false, markDirtyDisconnects: false);
5843  }
5844  ProfilerShort.End();
5845 
5846  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddDirtyBlock");
5847  if (from.Physics != null)
5848  {
5849  for (int i = offset; i < offset + count; i++)
5850  {
5851  var block = cubeBlocks[i];
5852  if (block == null) continue;
5853 
5854  from.Physics.AddDirtyBlock(block);
5855  }
5856  /*from.UpdatePhysicsShape();
5857  from.RaisePhysicsChanged();*/
5858  }
5859  ProfilerShort.End();
5860 
5861  ProfilerShort.Begin("Add block & Copy skeleton");
5862  for (int i = offset; i < offset + count; i++)
5863  {
5864  var block = cubeBlocks[i];
5865  if (block == null) continue;
5866 
5867  // CH: TODO: This is to catch a nullref. Remove when not needed
5868  if (from.Skeleton == null) MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("from.Skeleton was null");
5869 
5870  to.AddBlockInternal(block);
5871  from.Skeleton.CopyTo(to.Skeleton, block.Position, block.Position);
5872  }
5873  ProfilerShort.End();
5874 
5875  ProfilerShort.Begin("Block groups");
5876  foreach (var groupBuilder in m_tmpBlockGroups)
5877  {
5878  var group = new MyBlockGroup(to);
5879 
5880  // CH: TODO: This is to catch a nullref. Remove when not needed
5881  if (group == null) MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("group was null");
5882  if (groupBuilder == null) MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("groupBuilder was null");
5883 
5884  group.Init(groupBuilder);
5885  to.AddGroup(group);
5886  }
5887  m_tmpBlockGroups.Clear();
5888 
5889  from.RemoveEmptyBlockGroups();
5890 
5891  ProfilerShort.End();
5892  }
5893  finally
5894  {
5895  from.EnableGenerators(true, true);
5896  to.EnableGenerators(true, true);
5897 
5898  ProfilerShort.End();
5899  }
5900  }
5901 
5902  private void RemoveEmptyBlockGroups()
5903  {
5904  for (int i = 0; i < BlockGroups.Count; i++)
5905  {
5906  var group = BlockGroups[i];
5907  if (group.Blocks.Count == 0)
5908  {
5909  RemoveGroup(group);
5910  i--;
5911  }
5912  }
5913  }
5914 
5919  static void MoveBlocksAndClose(MyCubeGrid from, MyCubeGrid to, MatrixI transform, bool disableBlockGenerators = true)
5920  {
5921  ProfilerShort.Begin("MoveBlocksAndClose");
5922  from.MarkedForClose = true;
5923 
5924  if (disableBlockGenerators)
5925  {
5926  from.EnableGenerators(false, true);
5927  to.EnableGenerators(false, true);
5928  }
5929 
5930  ProfilerShort.Begin("MoveGroups");
5931  while (from.BlockGroups.Count > 0)
5932  {
5933  var group = from.BlockGroups[0];
5934  to.AddGroup(group);
5935 
5936  // "from" group could have been reinstantiated by OnModifyGroupSuccess
5937  // side effects: we have to remove it by name
5938  from.RemoveGroupByName(group.Name.ToString());
5939  }
5940  ProfilerShort.End();
5941 
5942  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyEntities.Remove(grid)");
5943  MyEntities.Remove(from);
5944  ProfilerShort.End();
5945 
5946  // Unregister from systems (after removing all blocks from scene)
5947  ProfilerShort.Begin("UnregisterBlocks");
5948  from.UnregisterBlocksBeforeClose();
5949  ProfilerShort.End();
5950 
5951  // Remove from scene
5952  ProfilerShort.Begin("RemoveBlocksFromScene");
5953  foreach (var block in from.m_cubeBlocks)
5954  {
5955  if (block.FatBlock != null)
5956  from.Hierarchy.RemoveChild(block.FatBlock, false);
5957 
5958  ProfilerShort.Begin("Remove Neighbours");
5959  block.RemoveNeighbours();
5960  ProfilerShort.End();
5961  block.RemoveAuthorship();
5962  }
5963  ProfilerShort.End();
5964 
5965  ProfilerShort.Begin("ClosePhysics");
5966  if (from.Physics != null)
5967  {
5968  from.Physics.Close();
5969  from.Physics = null;
5970  from.RaisePhysicsChanged();
5971  }
5972  ProfilerShort.End();
5973 
5974  // Add blocks
5975  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddBlocks");
5976  foreach (var block in from.m_cubeBlocks)
5977  {
5978  ProfilerShort.Begin("TransformBlock");
5979  block.Transform(ref transform);
5980  ProfilerShort.End();
5981 
5982  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddBlockInternal");
5983  to.AddBlockInternal(block);
5984  ProfilerShort.End();
5985  }
5986  ProfilerShort.End();
5987 
5988  ProfilerShort.Begin("CopySkeleton");
5989  from.Skeleton.CopyTo(to.Skeleton, transform, to);
5990  ProfilerShort.End();
5991 
5992  if (disableBlockGenerators)
5993  {
5994  from.EnableGenerators(true, true);
5995  to.EnableGenerators(true, true);
5996  }
5997 
5998  ProfilerShort.Begin("ClearAndClose");
5999  from.m_blocksForDraw.Clear();
6000  from.m_cubeBlocks.Clear();
6001  from.m_fatBlocks.Clear();
6002  from.m_cubes.Clear();
6003  from.MarkedForClose = false; // TODO: CH, if MarkedForClose is set manually above, it must be reset manually here
6004  if (Sync.IsServer)
6005  from.Close();
6006  ProfilerShort.End();
6007 
6008  ProfilerShort.End();
6009  }
6010 
6014  private void AddBlockInternal(MySlimBlock block)
6015  {
6016  block.CubeGrid = this;
6017 
6018  // Try merge compound blocks together.
6019  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_COMPOUND_BLOCKS && block.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
6020  {
6021  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
6022  MySlimBlock existingSlimBlock = GetCubeBlock(block.Min);
6023  MyCompoundCubeBlock existingCompoundBlock = existingSlimBlock != null ? existingSlimBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock : null;
6024 
6025  if (existingCompoundBlock != null)
6026  {
6027  bool added = false;
6028 
6029  compoundBlock.UpdateWorldMatrix();
6030 
6031  Debug.Assert(m_tmpSlimBlocks.Count == 0);
6032 
6033  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Clear();
6034  foreach (var blockInCompound in compoundBlock.GetBlocks())
6035  {
6036  ushort id;
6037  if (existingCompoundBlock.Add(blockInCompound, out id))
6038  {
6039  BoundsInclude(blockInCompound);
6040 
6041  m_dirtyRegion.AddCube(blockInCompound.Min);
6042 
6043  Physics.AddDirtyBlock(existingSlimBlock);
6044 
6045  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Add(blockInCompound);
6046 
6047  added = true;
6048  }
6049  }
6050 
6051  foreach (var blockToRemove in m_tmpSlimBlocks)
6052  {
6053  compoundBlock.Remove(blockToRemove, merged: true);
6054  }
6055 
6056  if (added)
6057  {
6058  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections)
6059  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AddBlockSmallToLargeConnection(block);
6060 
6061  foreach (var blockAdded in m_tmpSlimBlocks)
6062  {
6063  NotifyBlockAdded(blockAdded);
6064  }
6065  }
6066 
6067  m_tmpSlimBlocks.Clear();
6068 
6069  return;
6070  }
6071  }
6072 
6073  m_cubeBlocks.Add(block);
6074  if (block.FatBlock != null)
6075  m_fatBlocks.Add(block.FatBlock);
6076 
6077  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddNeighbors");
6078  block.AddNeighbours();
6079  ProfilerShort.End();
6080 
6081  BoundsInclude(block);
6082  if (block.FatBlock != null)
6083  {
6084  ProfilerShort.Begin("FatBlock");
6085  block.FatBlock.UpdateWorldMatrix();
6086 
6087  // CH:TODO: This would actually be better than setting WorldMatrix to local matrix, but it causes inaccurate fat block
6088  // positions for some reasons. Find out why.
6089  //AddChildWithMatrix(block.FatBlock, ref local);
6090  Hierarchy.AddChild(block.FatBlock, false);
6091  GridSystems.RegisterInSystems(block.FatBlock);
6092 
6093  if (block.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDrawFromParent)
6094  {
6095  m_blocksForDraw.Add(block.FatBlock);
6096  block.FatBlock.Render.NeedsDraw = false; //blocks shouldnt be drawn on their own at all?
6097  }
6098 
6099  MyObjectBuilderType blockType = block.BlockDefinition.Id.TypeId;
6100  if (blockType != typeof(MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock))
6101  {
6102  if (!BlocksCounters.ContainsKey(blockType))
6103  BlocksCounters.Add(blockType, 0);
6104  BlocksCounters[blockType]++;
6105  }
6106  ProfilerShort.End();
6107  }
6108 
6109  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddCubes");
6110  MyBlockOrientation blockOrientation = block.Orientation;
6111  Matrix rotationMatrix;
6112  blockOrientation.GetMatrix(out rotationMatrix);
6113 
6114  bool blockAddSuccessfull = true;
6115  Vector3I temp = new Vector3I();
6116  for (temp.X = block.Min.X; temp.X <= block.Max.X; temp.X++)
6117  for (temp.Y = block.Min.Y; temp.Y <= block.Max.Y; temp.Y++)
6118  for (temp.Z = block.Min.Z; temp.Z <= block.Max.Z; temp.Z++)
6119  {
6120  blockAddSuccessfull &= AddCube(block, ref temp, rotationMatrix, block.BlockDefinition);
6121  }
6122 
6123  Debug.Assert(blockAddSuccessfull, "Cannot add block!");
6124  ProfilerShort.End();
6125 
6126  if (Physics != null)
6127  {
6128  ProfilerShort.Begin("Physics.AddBlock");
6129  Physics.AddBlock(block);
6130  ProfilerShort.End();
6131  }
6132 
6133  if (block.FatBlock != null)
6134  {
6135  ProfilerShort.Begin("Owner");
6136  ChangeOwner(block.FatBlock, 0, block.FatBlock.OwnerId);
6137  ProfilerShort.End();
6138  }
6139 
6140  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections && blockAddSuccessfull)
6141  {
6142  ProfilerShort.Begin("CheckAddedBlockSmallToLargeConnection");
6143  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AddBlockSmallToLargeConnection(block);
6144  ProfilerShort.End();
6145  }
6146 
6147  if (MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS)
6148  {
6149  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddMultiBlockInfo");
6150  AddMultiBlockInfo(block);
6151  ProfilerShort.End();
6152  }
6153 
6154  ProfilerShort.Begin("OnBlockAdded");
6155  NotifyBlockAdded(block);
6156  ProfilerShort.End();
6157 
6158  ProfilerShort.Begin("AddAuthorship");
6159  block.AddAuthorship();
6160  if (OnAuthorshipChanged != null)
6161  OnAuthorshipChanged(this);
6162  ProfilerShort.End();
6163  }
6164 
6165  private bool IsDamaged(Vector3I bonePos, float epsilon = 0.04f)
6166  {
6167  Vector3 bone;
6168  if(Skeleton.TryGetBone(ref bonePos, out bone))
6169  return !MyUtils.IsZero(ref bone, epsilon * GridSize);
6170  return false;
6171  }
6172 
6173  private void AddBlockEdges(MySlimBlock block)
6174  {
6175  var definition = block.BlockDefinition;
6176  if (definition.BlockTopology == MyBlockTopology.Cube && definition.CubeDefinition != null)
6177  {
6178  if (!definition.CubeDefinition.ShowEdges)
6179  return;
6180 
6181  Vector3 position = block.Position * GridSize;
6182  Matrix blockTransformMatrix;
6183  block.Orientation.GetMatrix(out blockTransformMatrix);
6184 
6185  blockTransformMatrix.Translation = position;
6186 
6187  var info = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetTopologyInfo(definition.CubeDefinition.CubeTopology);
6188 
6189  var baseBonePos = block.Position * MyGridSkeleton.BoneDensity + Vector3I.One;
6190  foreach (var edge in info.Edges)
6191  {
6192  Vector3 point0 = Vector3.TransformNormal(edge.Point0, block.Orientation);
6193  Vector3 point1 = Vector3.TransformNormal(edge.Point1, block.Orientation);
6194  Vector3 middle = (point0 + point1) * 0.5f;
6195 
6196  if (IsDamaged(baseBonePos + Vector3I.Round(point0)) ||
6197  IsDamaged(baseBonePos + Vector3I.Round(middle)) ||
6198  IsDamaged(baseBonePos + Vector3I.Round(point1)))
6199  continue;
6200 
6201  point0 = Vector3.Transform(edge.Point0 * GridSizeHalf, ref blockTransformMatrix);
6202  point1 = Vector3.Transform(edge.Point1 * GridSizeHalf, ref blockTransformMatrix);
6203 
6204  Vector3 normal0 = Vector3.TransformNormal(info.Tiles[edge.Side0].Normal, block.Orientation);
6205  Vector3 normal1 = Vector3.TransformNormal(info.Tiles[edge.Side1].Normal, block.Orientation);
6206 
6207  // Saturation and Value is offset, from -1 to 1, it must be normalized
6208  var hsvNormalized = block.ColorMaskHSV;
6209  hsvNormalized.Y = (hsvNormalized.Y + 1) * 0.5f;
6210  hsvNormalized.Z = (hsvNormalized.Z + 1) * 0.5f;
6211 
6212  Render.RenderData.AddEdgeInfo(ref point0, ref point1, ref normal0, ref normal1, new Color(hsvNormalized), block);
6213  }
6214  }
6215  }
6216 
6217  private void RemoveBlockEdges(MySlimBlock block)
6218  {
6219  var definition = block.BlockDefinition;
6220  if (definition.BlockTopology == MyBlockTopology.Cube && definition.CubeDefinition != null)
6221  {
6222  Vector3 position = block.Position * GridSize;
6223  Matrix blockTransformMatrix;
6224  block.Orientation.GetMatrix(out blockTransformMatrix);
6225  blockTransformMatrix.Translation = position;
6226 
6227  var info = MyCubeGridDefinitions.GetTopologyInfo(definition.CubeDefinition.CubeTopology);
6228  Vector3 point0, point1;
6229  foreach (var edge in info.Edges)
6230  {
6231  point0 = Vector3.Transform(edge.Point0 * GridSizeHalf, blockTransformMatrix);
6232  point1 = Vector3.Transform(edge.Point1 * GridSizeHalf, blockTransformMatrix);
6233 
6234  Render.RenderData.RemoveEdgeInfo(point0, point1, block);
6235  }
6236  }
6237  }
6238 
6239  private void DoLazyUpdates()
6240  {
6241  if (MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static != null && !m_smallToLargeConnectionsInitialized && m_enableSmallToLargeConnections)
6242  {
6243  // set flag before calling the method AddGridSmallToLargeConnection
6244  m_smallToLargeConnectionsInitialized = true;
6245  MyCubeGridSmallToLargeConnection.Static.AddGridSmallToLargeConnection(this);
6246  }
6247  m_smallToLargeConnectionsInitialized = true;
6248 
6249  ProfilerShort.Begin("Send dirty bones");
6250  if (!MyPerGameSettings.Destruction && BonesToSend.InputCount > 0 && m_bonesSendCounter++ > 10) // Only increment counter when there's something waiting
6251  {
6252  m_bonesSendCounter = 0;
6253  if (Sync.IsServer)
6254  {
6255  var segments = BonesToSend.FindSegments(MyVoxelSegmentationType.Simple);
6256  foreach (var seg in segments)
6257  {
6258  SendDirtyBones(seg.Min, seg.Max, Skeleton);
6259  }
6260  }
6261  BonesToSend.ClearInput();
6262  }
6263  ProfilerShort.End();
6264 
6265  if (m_blocksForDamageApplicationDirty)
6266  {
6267  // Copy content to temporary, because block can be destroyed in "block.ApplyAccumulatedDamage()" and then it is also removed
6268  // from m_blocksForDamageApplication (see MySlimBlock.OnDestroy).
6269  m_blocksForDamageApplicationCopy.AddHashset(m_blocksForDamageApplication);
6270  foreach (var block in m_blocksForDamageApplicationCopy)
6271  {
6272  if (block.AccumulatedDamage > 0f)
6273  {
6274  block.ApplyAccumulatedDamage();
6275  }
6276  }
6277  m_blocksForDamageApplication.Clear();
6278  m_blocksForDamageApplicationCopy.Clear();
6279  m_blocksForDamageApplicationDirty = false;
6280  }
6281 
6282  if (m_disconnectsDirty)
6283  {
6284  DetectDisconnects();
6285  }
6286 
6287  if (!MyPerGameSettings.Destruction)
6288  Skeleton.RemoveUnusedBones(this);
6289 
6290  if (m_ownershipManager.NeedRecalculateOwners)
6291  {
6292  m_ownershipManager.RecalculateOwners();
6293  m_ownershipManager.NeedRecalculateOwners = false;
6294 
6295  NotifyBlockOwnershipChange(this);
6296  }
6297  }
6298 
6299  internal void AddForDamageApplication(MySlimBlock block)
6300  {
6301  m_blocksForDamageApplication.Add(block);
6302  m_blocksForDamageApplicationDirty = true;
6303  }
6304 
6305  internal void RemoveFromDamageApplication(MySlimBlock block)
6306  {
6307  m_blocksForDamageApplication.Remove(block);
6308  m_blocksForDamageApplicationDirty = m_blocksForDamageApplication.Count > 0;
6309  }
6310 
6311  #region Ray casting, intersections and overlaps
6312 
6313  //For ModAPI, they dont have havok yet
6314  public bool GetLineIntersectionExactGrid(ref LineD line, ref Vector3I position, ref double distanceSquared)
6315  {
6316  return GetLineIntersectionExactGrid(ref line, ref position, ref distanceSquared, null);
6317  }
6318  public bool GetLineIntersectionExactGrid(ref LineD line, ref Vector3I position, ref double distanceSquared, MyPhysics.HitInfo? hitInfo = null)
6319  {
6320  RayCastCells(line.From, line.To, m_cacheRayCastCells, havokWorld: true);
6321  if (m_cacheRayCastCells.Count == 0)
6322  return false;
6323 
6324  if (hitInfo.HasValue)
6325  m_tmpHitList.Add(hitInfo.Value);
6326  else
6327  MyPhysics.CastRay(line.From, line.To, m_tmpHitList, MyPhysics.CollisionLayers.ObjectDetectionCollisionLayer);
6328 
6329  bool result = false;
6330  for (int i = 0; i < m_cacheRayCastCells.Count; i++)
6331  {
6332  Vector3I hit = m_cacheRayCastCells[i];
6333  MyCube cube;
6334  m_cubes.TryGetValue(hit, out cube);
6335  double distSq = double.MaxValue;
6336 
6337  if (cube == null || cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock == null || !cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.BlockDefinition.UseModelIntersection)
6338  {
6339  if (m_tmpHitList.Count > 0)
6340  {
6341  int j = 0;
6342  if (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity != null)
6343  while (j < m_tmpHitList.Count - 1 && m_tmpHitList[j].HkHitInfo.GetHitEntity() == MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.Entity)
6344  j++;
6345 
6346  if (j > 1 && m_tmpHitList[j].HkHitInfo.GetHitEntity() != this)
6347  continue;
6348  var bias = GridSizeHalfVector;
6349  var locPos = Vector3D.Transform(m_tmpHitList[j].Position, MatrixD.Invert(WorldMatrix));
6350  var blockPos = hit * GridSize;
6351  var dir = locPos - blockPos;
6352  var max = dir.Max() > Math.Abs(dir.Min()) ? dir.Max() : dir.Min();
6353  dir.X = dir.X == max ? max > 0 ? 1 : -1 : 0;
6354  dir.Y = dir.Y == max ? max > 0 ? 1 : -1 : 0;
6355  dir.Z = dir.Z == max ? max > 0 ? 1 : -1 : 0;
6356  locPos -= dir * 0.06f;
6357 
6358  if (Vector3D.Max(locPos, blockPos - bias) == locPos && Vector3D.Min(locPos, blockPos + bias) == locPos)
6359  {
6360  if (cube == null)
6361  {
6362  Vector3I nearest;
6363  FixTargetCube(out nearest, locPos * GridSizeR);
6364  if (!m_cubes.TryGetValue(nearest, out cube))
6365  continue;
6366  hit = nearest;
6367  }
6368 
6369  distSq = Vector3D.DistanceSquared(line.From, m_tmpHitList[j].Position);// Vector3.Transform(hit*GridSize, WorldMatrix));
6370  if (distSq < distanceSquared)
6371  {
6372  position = hit;
6373  distanceSquared = distSq;
6374  result = true;
6375  continue;
6376  }
6377  }
6378  }
6379  }
6380  else
6381  {
6382  VRage.Game.Models.MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? intersection;
6383  int cubePartIndex;
6384  GetBlockIntersection(cube, ref line, IntersectionFlags.ALL_TRIANGLES, out intersection, out cubePartIndex);
6385  if (intersection.HasValue)
6386  distSq = Vector3.DistanceSquared(line.From, intersection.Value.IntersectionPointInWorldSpace);
6387  }
6388  if (distSq < distanceSquared)
6389  {
6390  distanceSquared = distSq;
6391  position = hit;
6392  result = true;
6393  }
6394  }
6395 
6396  m_tmpHitList.Clear();
6397  return result;
6398  }
6399 
6400  private void GetBlockIntersection(MyCube cube, ref LineD line, IntersectionFlags flags, out MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? t, out int cubePartIndex)
6401  {
6402  if (cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock != null)
6403  {
6404  if (cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
6405  {
6406  MyCompoundCubeBlock compound = cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
6407  VRage.Game.Models.MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? closestHit = null;
6408  double closestDistance = double.MaxValue;
6409 
6410  foreach (var block in compound.GetBlocks())
6411  {
6412  //model block
6413  Matrix local;
6414  block.Orientation.GetMatrix(out local);
6415  Vector3 modelOffset;
6416  Vector3.TransformNormal(ref block.BlockDefinition.ModelOffset, ref local, out modelOffset);
6417 
6418  local.Translation = block.Position * GridSize + modelOffset;
6419  MatrixD invLocal = MatrixD.Invert(block.FatBlock.WorldMatrix);
6420 
6421  t = block.FatBlock.ModelCollision.GetTrianglePruningStructure().GetIntersectionWithLine(this, ref line, ref invLocal, flags);
6422 
6423  if (t == null && block.FatBlock.Subparts != null)
6424  {
6425  foreach (var subpart in block.FatBlock.Subparts)
6426  {
6427  invLocal = MatrixD.Invert(subpart.Value.WorldMatrix);
6428  t = subpart.Value.ModelCollision.GetTrianglePruningStructure().GetIntersectionWithLine(this, ref line, ref invLocal, flags);
6429  if (t != null)
6430  break;
6431  }
6432  }
6433 
6434  if (t != null)
6435  {
6436  MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx correctIntersection = t.Value;
6437 
6438  var hitPoint = Vector3D.Transform(t.Value.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace, block.FatBlock.WorldMatrix);
6439  var distance = Vector3D.Distance(hitPoint, line.From);
6440 
6441  if (distance < closestDistance)
6442  {
6443  closestDistance = distance;
6444  MatrixD? cubeWorldMatrix = block.FatBlock.WorldMatrix;
6445  TransformCubeToGrid(ref correctIntersection, ref local, ref cubeWorldMatrix);
6446  closestHit = correctIntersection;
6447  }
6448  }
6449  }
6450 
6451  t = closestHit;
6452  }
6453  else
6454  {
6455  //model block
6456  Matrix local;
6457  cube.CubeBlock.Orientation.GetMatrix(out local);
6458  Vector3 modelOffset;
6459  Vector3.TransformNormal(ref cube.CubeBlock.BlockDefinition.ModelOffset, ref local, out modelOffset);
6460 
6461  local.Translation = cube.CubeBlock.Position * GridSize + modelOffset;
6462  MatrixD invLocal = MatrixD.Invert(cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.WorldMatrix);
6463 
6464  t = cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.ModelCollision.GetTrianglePruningStructure().GetIntersectionWithLine(this, ref line, ref invLocal, flags);
6465 
6466  if (t == null && cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Subparts != null)
6467  {
6468  foreach (var subpart in cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Subparts)
6469  {
6470  invLocal = MatrixD.Invert(subpart.Value.WorldMatrix);
6471  t = subpart.Value.ModelCollision.GetTrianglePruningStructure().GetIntersectionWithLine(this, ref line, ref invLocal, flags);
6472  if (t != null)
6473  break;
6474  }
6475  }
6476 
6477  if (t != null)
6478  {
6479  MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx correctIntersection = t.Value;
6480  MatrixD? cubeWorldMatrix = cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock.WorldMatrix;
6481  TransformCubeToGrid(ref correctIntersection, ref local, ref cubeWorldMatrix);
6482  t = correctIntersection;
6483  }
6484  }
6485 
6486  cubePartIndex = -1;
6487  }
6488  else
6489  {
6490  //cube block
6491  VRage.Game.Models.MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx? closestHit = null;
6492  float closestDistance = float.MaxValue;
6493  Vector3? closestHitpoint = null;
6494  int closestCubePartIndex = -1;
6495 
6496  for (int it = 0; it < cube.Parts.Length; it++)
6497  {
6498  MyCubePart cubepart = cube.Parts[it];
6499 
6500  MatrixD world = cubepart.InstanceData.LocalMatrix * WorldMatrix;
6501  MatrixD invWorld = MatrixD.Invert(world);
6502 
6503  t = cubepart.Model.GetTrianglePruningStructure().GetIntersectionWithLine(this, ref line, ref invWorld, flags);
6504  if (t != null)
6505  {
6506  MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx correctIntersection = t.Value;
6507 
6508  var hitPoint = Vector3.Transform(t.Value.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace, world);
6509  float distance = Vector3.Distance(hitPoint, line.From);
6510 
6511  if (distance < closestDistance)
6512  {
6513  closestDistance = distance;
6514  Matrix localMatrix = cubepart.InstanceData.LocalMatrix;
6515  MatrixD? cubeWorldMatrix = null;
6516  TransformCubeToGrid(ref correctIntersection, ref localMatrix, ref cubeWorldMatrix);
6517  closestHitpoint = correctIntersection.IntersectionPointInWorldSpace;
6518  closestHit = correctIntersection;
6519  closestCubePartIndex = it;
6520  }
6521  }
6522  }
6523 
6524  t = closestHit;
6525  cubePartIndex = closestCubePartIndex;
6526  }
6527  }
6528 
6529  public static bool GetLineIntersection(ref LineD line, out MyCubeGrid grid, out Vector3I position, out double distanceSquared)
6530  {
6531  grid = default(MyCubeGrid);
6532  position = default(Vector3I);
6533  distanceSquared = float.MaxValue;
6534 
6535  MyEntities.OverlapAllLineSegment(ref line, m_lineOverlapList);
6536  foreach (var e in m_lineOverlapList)
6537  {
6538  MyCubeGrid testGrid = e.Element as MyCubeGrid;
6539  if (testGrid != null)
6540  {
6541  var castResult = testGrid.RayCastBlocks(line.From, line.To);
6542  if (castResult.HasValue)
6543  {
6544  Vector3 closestCorner = testGrid.GetClosestCorner(castResult.Value, line.From);
6545  float testDistSq = (float)Vector3D.DistanceSquared(line.From, Vector3D.Transform(closestCorner, testGrid.WorldMatrix));
6546  if (testDistSq < distanceSquared)
6547  {
6548  distanceSquared = testDistSq;
6549  grid = testGrid;
6550  position = castResult.Value;
6551  }
6552  }
6553  }
6554  }
6555 
6556  m_lineOverlapList.Clear();
6557  return grid != null;
6558  }
6559 
6560  public static bool GetLineIntersectionExact(ref LineD line, out MyCubeGrid grid, out Vector3I position, out double distanceSquared)
6561  {
6562  grid = default(MyCubeGrid);
6563  position = default(Vector3I);
6564  distanceSquared = float.MaxValue;
6565 
6566  double distance = double.MaxValue;
6567 
6568  MyEntities.OverlapAllLineSegment(ref line, m_lineOverlapList);
6569  foreach (var e in m_lineOverlapList)
6570  {
6571  MyCubeGrid testGrid = e.Element as MyCubeGrid;
6572  if (testGrid != null)
6573  {
6574  MySlimBlock slimBlock;
6575  double dst;
6576  Vector3D? intersectedObjectPos = testGrid.GetLineIntersectionExactAll(ref line, out dst, out slimBlock);
6577  if (intersectedObjectPos != null && dst < distance)
6578  {
6579  grid = testGrid;
6580  distance = dst;
6581  }
6582  }
6583  }
6584 
6585  m_lineOverlapList.Clear();
6586  return grid != null;
6587  }
6588 
6592  public Vector3D? GetLineIntersectionExactAll(ref LineD line, out double distance, out MySlimBlock intersectedBlock)
6593  {
6594  intersectedBlock = null;
6595  distance = float.MaxValue;
6596 
6597  Vector3I? cubePosRes = null;
6598 
6599  Vector3I cubePos = Vector3I.Zero;
6600  double cubeDst = double.MaxValue;
6601  if (GetLineIntersectionExactGrid(ref line, ref cubePos, ref cubeDst))
6602  {
6603  cubeDst = (float)Math.Sqrt(cubeDst);
6604  cubePosRes = cubePos;
6605  }
6606 
6607  if (cubePosRes != null)
6608  {
6609  distance = cubeDst;
6610 
6611  intersectedBlock = GetCubeBlock(cubePosRes.Value);
6612  if (intersectedBlock == null)
6613  return null;
6614 
6615  return cubePos;
6616  }
6617 
6618  return null;
6619  }
6620 
6621  public void GetBlocksInsideSphere(ref BoundingSphereD sphere, HashSet<MySlimBlock> blocks)
6622  {
6623  blocks.Clear();
6624  if (PositionComp == null)
6625  return;
6626  BoundingBoxD box = new BoundingBoxD(sphere.Center - new Vector3D(sphere.Radius), sphere.Center + new Vector3D(sphere.Radius));
6627 
6628  box = box.TransformFast(this.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
6629  Vector3D min = box.Min;
6630  Vector3D max = box.Max;
6631  Vector3I start = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(min.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Z * GridSizeR));
6632  Vector3I end = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(max.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Z * GridSizeR));
6633 
6634  Vector3I startIt = Vector3I.Min(start, end);
6635  Vector3I endIt = Vector3I.Max(start, end);
6636 
6637  var localSphere = new BoundingSphereD(box.Center, sphere.Radius);
6638  BoundingBoxD blockBox = new BoundingBoxD();
6639 
6640  if ((endIt - startIt).Volume() < m_cubes.Count)
6641  {
6642  Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref startIt, ref endIt);
6643  var pos = it.Current;
6644  MyCube cube;
6645  for (; it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out pos))
6646  {
6647  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos,out cube))
6648  {
6649  var block = cube.CubeBlock;
6650  blockBox.Min = block.Min*GridSize - GridSizeHalf;
6651  blockBox.Max = block.Max*GridSize + GridSizeHalf;
6652  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere))
6653  {
6654  blocks.Add(block);
6655  }
6656  }
6657  }
6658  }
6659  else
6660  {
6661  foreach (var value in m_cubes.Values)
6662  {
6663  var block = value.CubeBlock;
6664  blockBox.Min = block.Min*GridSize - GridSizeHalf;
6665  blockBox.Max = block.Max*GridSize + GridSizeHalf;
6666  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere))
6667  {
6668  blocks.Add(block);
6669  }
6670  }
6671  }
6672  }
6673 
6674  private void QuerySphere(BoundingSphereD sphere, List<MyEntity> blocks)
6675  {
6676  Debug.Assert(!Closed);
6677 
6678  if (PositionComp == null)
6679  return;
6680 
6681  // CH: Testing code to catch a crash:
6682  if (Closed) MyLog.Default.WriteLine("Grid was Closed in MyCubeGrid.QuerySphere!");
6683 
6684  if (sphere.Contains(PositionComp.WorldVolume) == ContainmentType.Contains)
6685  {
6686  foreach (var fb in m_fatBlocks)
6687  {
6688  Debug.Assert(m_cubeBlocks.Contains(fb.SlimBlock));
6689  // Assert commented since this will happen a lot in AI School, scenario 2, when the fixing bot is fixing
6690  //Debug.Assert(!fb.Closed);
6691  if(fb.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
6692  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
6693  blocks.Add(fb);
6694 
6695  foreach (var child in fb.Hierarchy.Children)
6696  {
6697  var entity = (MyEntity)child.Entity;
6698  if (entity != null)
6699  blocks.Add(entity);
6700  }
6701  }
6702  return;
6703  }
6704 
6705  BoundingBoxD box = new BoundingBoxD(sphere.Center - new Vector3D(sphere.Radius), sphere.Center + new Vector3D(sphere.Radius));
6706 
6707  box = box.TransformFast(this.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
6708  Vector3D min = box.Min;
6709  Vector3D max = box.Max;
6710  Vector3I start = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(min.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Z * GridSizeR));
6711  Vector3I end = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(max.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Z * GridSizeR));
6712 
6713  Vector3I startIt = Vector3I.Min(start, end);
6714  Vector3I endIt = Vector3I.Max(start, end);
6715  startIt = Vector3I.Max(startIt, Min);
6716  endIt = Vector3I.Min(endIt, Max);
6717  if (startIt.X > endIt.X || startIt.Y > endIt.Y || startIt.Z > endIt.Z)
6718  return;
6719 
6720  Vector3 halfGridSize = new Vector3(0.5f);
6721  BoundingBox blockBB = new BoundingBox();
6722  var localSphere = new BoundingSphere((Vector3)box.Center * GridSizeR, (float)sphere.Radius * GridSizeR);
6723  if ((endIt - startIt).Size > m_cubeBlocks.Count)
6724  {
6725  foreach (var fb in m_fatBlocks)
6726  {
6727  Debug.Assert(!fb.Closed);
6728  if (fb.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
6729  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
6730  blockBB.Min = fb.Min - halfGridSize;
6731  blockBB.Max = fb.Max + halfGridSize;
6732  if (localSphere.Intersects(blockBB))
6733  {
6734  blocks.Add(fb);
6735 
6736  foreach (var child in fb.Hierarchy.Children)
6737  {
6738  var entity = (MyEntity)child.Entity;
6739  if (entity != null)
6740  blocks.Add(entity);
6741  }
6742  }
6743  }
6744  return;
6745  }
6746 
6747  MyCube block;
6748  if (m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks == null)
6749  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks = new HashSet<MyEntity>();
6750 
6751  // CH: Testing code to catch a crash:
6752  if (m_cubes == null) MyLog.Default.WriteLine("m_cubes null in MyCubeGrid.QuerySphere!");
6753 
6754  Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref startIt, ref endIt);
6755  var pos = it.Current;
6756  for (; it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out pos))
6757  {
6758  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out block) && block.CubeBlock.FatBlock != null)
6759  {
6760  Debug.Assert(!block.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Closed);
6761  if (block.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
6762  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
6763  if (m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Contains(block.CubeBlock.FatBlock))
6764  continue;
6765 
6766  blockBB.Min = block.CubeBlock.Min - halfGridSize;
6767  blockBB.Max = block.CubeBlock.Max + halfGridSize;
6768  if (localSphere.Intersects(blockBB))
6769  {
6770  blocks.Add(block.CubeBlock.FatBlock);
6771  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Add(block.CubeBlock.FatBlock);
6772 
6773  foreach (var child in block.CubeBlock.FatBlock.Hierarchy.Children)
6774  {
6775  var entity = (MyEntity)child.Entity;
6776  if (entity != null)
6777  {
6778  blocks.Add(entity);
6779  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Add(entity);
6780  }
6781  }
6782  }
6783  }
6784  }
6785  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Clear();
6786  }
6787 
6791  private void TransformCubeToGrid(ref MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx triangle, ref Matrix cubeLocalMatrix, ref MatrixD? cubeWorldMatrix)
6792  {
6793  if (cubeWorldMatrix == null)
6794  {
6795  MatrixD gridWorldMatrix = WorldMatrix;
6796  triangle.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace = Vector3.Transform(triangle.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace, ref cubeLocalMatrix);
6797  triangle.IntersectionPointInWorldSpace = Vector3.Transform(triangle.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace, gridWorldMatrix);
6798  triangle.NormalInObjectSpace = Vector3.TransformNormal(triangle.NormalInObjectSpace, ref cubeLocalMatrix);
6799  triangle.NormalInWorldSpace = Vector3.TransformNormal(triangle.NormalInObjectSpace, gridWorldMatrix);
6800  }
6801  else
6802  {
6803  Vector3 intersectionLocal = triangle.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace;
6804  Vector3 normalLocal = triangle.NormalInObjectSpace;
6805 
6806  triangle.IntersectionPointInObjectSpace = Vector3.Transform(intersectionLocal, ref cubeLocalMatrix);
6807  triangle.IntersectionPointInWorldSpace = Vector3.Transform(intersectionLocal, cubeWorldMatrix.Value);
6808  triangle.NormalInObjectSpace = Vector3.TransformNormal(normalLocal, ref cubeLocalMatrix);
6809  triangle.NormalInWorldSpace = Vector3.TransformNormal(normalLocal, cubeWorldMatrix.Value);
6810  }
6811 
6812  triangle.Triangle.InputTriangle.Transform(ref cubeLocalMatrix);
6813  }
6814 
6815  private void QueryLine(LineD line, List<MyLineSegmentOverlapResult<MyEntity>> blocks)
6816  {
6817  MyLineSegmentOverlapResult<MyEntity> overlap = new MyLineSegmentOverlapResult<MyEntity>();
6818  BoundingBoxD bb = new BoundingBoxD();
6819  MatrixD invWorld = PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv;//MatrixD.Invert(WorldMatrix);
6820  Vector3D localStart, localEnd;
6821  Vector3D.Transform(ref line.From, ref invWorld, out localStart);
6822  Vector3D.Transform(ref line.To, ref invWorld, out localEnd);
6823 
6824  RayD lineLoc = new RayD(localStart, Vector3D.Normalize(localEnd - localStart));
6825  MyCube cube;
6826  RayCastCells(line.From, line.To, m_cacheRayCastCells);
6827  foreach (var pos in m_cacheRayCastCells)
6828  {
6829  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out cube) && cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock != null)
6830  {
6831  var block = cube.CubeBlock.FatBlock;
6832  overlap.Element = block;
6833  bb.Min = block.Min * GridSize - GridSizeHalfVector;
6834  bb.Max = block.Max * GridSize + GridSizeHalfVector;
6835  var intersect = lineLoc.Intersects(bb);
6836  if (!intersect.HasValue)
6837  continue;
6838  overlap.Distance = intersect.Value;
6839  blocks.Add(overlap);
6840  }
6841  }
6842  }
6843 
6844  [ThreadStatic]
6845  private static HashSet<MyEntity> m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks;
6846 
6847  private void QueryAABB(BoundingBoxD box, List<MyEntity> blocks)
6848  {
6849  if (blocks == null)
6850  {
6851  Debug.Fail("null blocks ! probably dead entity ?");
6852  return;
6853  }
6854 
6855  if (PositionComp == null)
6856  {
6857  return;
6858  }
6859 
6860  if (box.Contains(PositionComp.WorldAABB) == ContainmentType.Contains)
6861  {
6862  foreach (var fb in m_fatBlocks)
6863  {
6864  Debug.Assert(m_cubeBlocks.Contains(fb.SlimBlock));
6865  Debug.Assert(!fb.Closed,m_fatBlocks.Count+", "+m_cubeBlocks.Count);
6866  if (fb.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
6867  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
6868 
6869  blocks.Add(fb);
6870  if (fb.Hierarchy != null && fb.Hierarchy.Children != null)
6871  {
6872  foreach (var child in fb.Hierarchy.Children)
6873  {
6874  if (child.Container != null)
6875  {
6876  blocks.Add((MyEntity)child.Container.Entity);
6877  }
6878  else
6879  {
6880  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Child block hasn't container set!");
6881  }
6882  }
6883  }
6884  else
6885  {
6886  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Fatblock missing hieararchy component!");
6887  }
6888  }
6889  return;
6890  }
6891  var obb = MyOrientedBoundingBoxD.Create(box, PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
6892  obb.Center *= GridSizeR;
6893  obb.HalfExtent *= GridSizeR;
6894  box = box.TransformFast(this.PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv);
6895  Vector3D min = box.Min;
6896  Vector3D max = box.Max;
6897  Vector3I start = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(min.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Z * GridSizeR));
6898  Vector3I end = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(max.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Z * GridSizeR));
6899 
6900  Vector3I startIt = Vector3I.Min(start, end);
6901  Vector3I endIt = Vector3I.Max(start, end);
6902 
6903  startIt = Vector3I.Max(startIt, Min);
6904  endIt = Vector3I.Min(endIt, Max);
6905  if (startIt.X > endIt.X || startIt.Y > endIt.Y || startIt.Z > endIt.Z)
6906  return;
6907  Vector3 halfGridSize = new Vector3(0.5f);
6908  BoundingBoxD blockBB = new BoundingBoxD();
6909 
6910  if ((endIt - startIt).Size > m_cubeBlocks.Count)
6911  {
6912  foreach (var fb in m_fatBlocks)
6913  {
6914  Debug.Assert(m_cubeBlocks.Contains(fb.SlimBlock));
6915  Debug.Assert(!fb.Closed);
6916  if (fb.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
6917  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
6918 
6919  blockBB.Min = fb.Min - halfGridSize;
6920  blockBB.Max = fb.Max + halfGridSize;
6921  if (obb.Intersects(ref blockBB))
6922  {
6923  blocks.Add(fb);
6924  if (fb.Hierarchy != null && fb.Hierarchy.Children != null)
6925  {
6926  foreach (var child in fb.Hierarchy.Children)
6927  {
6928  if (child.Container != null)
6929  {
6930  blocks.Add((MyEntity)child.Container.Entity);
6931  }
6932  else
6933  {
6934  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Child block hasn't container set!");
6935  }
6936  }
6937  }
6938  else
6939  {
6940  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Fatblock is missing hierarchy component!");
6941  }
6942  }
6943  }
6944  return;
6945  }
6946 
6947  MyCube block;
6948  Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref startIt, ref endIt);
6949  var pos = it.Current;
6950  if (m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks == null) m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks = new HashSet<MyEntity>();
6951  for (; it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out pos))
6952  {
6953  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(m_cubes != null, "m_cubes on MyCubeGrid are null!");
6954  if (m_cubes != null && m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out block) && block.CubeBlock.FatBlock != null)
6955  {
6956  var fatBlock = block.CubeBlock.FatBlock;
6957  if (m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Contains(fatBlock))
6958  continue;
6959  blockBB.Min = block.CubeBlock.Min - halfGridSize;
6960  blockBB.Max = block.CubeBlock.Max + halfGridSize;
6961  if (obb.Intersects(ref blockBB))
6962  {
6963  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Add(fatBlock);
6964  blocks.Add(fatBlock);
6965  if (fatBlock.Hierarchy != null && fatBlock.Hierarchy.Children != null)
6966  {
6967  foreach (var child in fatBlock.Hierarchy.Children)
6968  {
6969  if (child.Container != null)
6970  {
6971  blocks.Add((MyEntity)child.Container.Entity);
6972  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Add(fatBlock);
6973  }
6974  else
6975  {
6976  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("child block hasn't container set!");
6977  }
6978  }
6979  }
6980  else
6981  {
6982  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Fatblock is missing hierarchy component!");
6983  }
6984  }
6985  }
6986  }
6987  m_tmpQueryCubeBlocks.Clear();
6988  }
6989 
6990  [ThreadStatic]
6991  private static HashSet<MySlimBlock> m_tmpQuerySlimBlocks;
6992 
6993  public void GetBlocksIntersectingOBB(BoundingBoxD box, MatrixD boxTransform, List<MySlimBlock> blocks)
6994  {
6995  if (blocks == null)
6996  {
6997  Debug.Fail("null blocks ! probably dead entity ?");
6998  return;
6999  }
7000 
7001  if (PositionComp == null)
7002  {
7003  return;
7004  }
7005 
7006  var obbWorld = MyOrientedBoundingBoxD.Create(box, boxTransform);
7007  var gridWorldAabb = PositionComp.WorldAABB;
7008  if (obbWorld.Contains(ref gridWorldAabb) == ContainmentType.Contains)
7009  {
7010  foreach (var slimBlock in GetBlocks())
7011  {
7012  if (slimBlock.FatBlock != null)
7013  {
7014  Debug.Assert(!slimBlock.FatBlock.Closed);
7015  if (slimBlock.FatBlock.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
7016  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
7017  }
7018 
7019  blocks.Add(slimBlock);
7020  }
7021 
7022  return;
7023  }
7024 
7025  var compositeTransform = boxTransform * PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv;
7026  var obb = MyOrientedBoundingBoxD.Create(box, compositeTransform);
7027  obb.Center *= GridSizeR;
7028  obb.HalfExtent *= GridSizeR;
7029  box = box.TransformFast(compositeTransform);
7030  Vector3D min = box.Min;
7031  Vector3D max = box.Max;
7032  Vector3I start = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(min.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(min.Z * GridSizeR));
7033  Vector3I end = new Vector3I((int)Math.Round(max.X * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Y * GridSizeR), (int)Math.Round(max.Z * GridSizeR));
7034 
7035  Vector3I startIt = Vector3I.Min(start, end);
7036  Vector3I endIt = Vector3I.Max(start, end);
7037 
7038  startIt = Vector3I.Max(startIt, Min);
7039  endIt = Vector3I.Min(endIt, Max);
7040  if (startIt.X > endIt.X || startIt.Y > endIt.Y || startIt.Z > endIt.Z)
7041  return;
7042  Vector3 halfGridSize = new Vector3(0.5f);
7043  BoundingBoxD blockBB = new BoundingBoxD();
7044 
7045  if ((endIt - startIt).Size > m_cubeBlocks.Count)
7046  {
7047  foreach (var slimBlock in GetBlocks())
7048  {
7049  Debug.Assert(!slimBlock.FatBlock.Closed);
7050  if (slimBlock.FatBlock.Closed) //TODO:investigate why there is closed block in the grid/m_fatblock list
7051  continue; //it is possible to have marked for close block there but not closed
7052 
7053  blockBB.Min = slimBlock.Min - halfGridSize;
7054  blockBB.Max = slimBlock.Max + halfGridSize;
7055  if (obb.Intersects(ref blockBB))
7056  {
7057  blocks.Add(slimBlock);
7058  }
7059  }
7060  return;
7061  }
7062 
7063  MyCube block;
7064  if (m_tmpQuerySlimBlocks == null)
7065  m_tmpQuerySlimBlocks = new HashSet<MySlimBlock>();
7066  Vector3I_RangeIterator it = new Vector3I_RangeIterator(ref startIt, ref endIt);
7067  var pos = it.Current;
7068  for (; it.IsValid(); it.GetNext(out pos))
7069  {
7070  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(m_cubes != null, "m_cubes on MyCubeGrid are null!");
7071  if (m_cubes != null && m_cubes.TryGetValue(pos, out block) && block.CubeBlock != null)
7072  {
7073  var slimBlock = block.CubeBlock;
7074  if (m_tmpQuerySlimBlocks.Contains(slimBlock))
7075  continue;
7076  blockBB.Min = slimBlock.Min - halfGridSize;
7077  blockBB.Max = slimBlock.Max + halfGridSize;
7078  if (obb.Intersects(ref blockBB))
7079  {
7080  m_tmpQuerySlimBlocks.Add(slimBlock);
7081  blocks.Add(slimBlock);
7082  }
7083  }
7084  }
7085  m_tmpQuerySlimBlocks.Clear();
7086  }
7087 
7100  public void GetBlocksInsideSpheres(
7101  ref BoundingSphereD sphere1,
7102  ref BoundingSphereD sphere2,
7103  ref BoundingSphereD sphere3,
7104  HashSet<MySlimBlock> blocks1,
7105  HashSet<MySlimBlock> blocks2,
7106  HashSet<MySlimBlock> blocks3,
7107  bool respectDeformationRatio, float detectionBlockHalfSize, ref MatrixD invWorldGrid)
7108  {
7109  blocks1.Clear();
7110  blocks2.Clear();
7111  blocks3.Clear();
7112 
7113  m_processedBlocks.Clear();
7114 
7115  Vector3D center;
7116  Vector3D.Transform(ref sphere3.Center, ref invWorldGrid, out center);
7117 
7118 
7119  Vector3I startIt = Vector3I.Round((center - sphere3.Radius) * GridSizeR);
7120  Vector3I endIt = Vector3I.Round((center + sphere3.Radius) * GridSizeR);
7121 
7122  var halfSize = new Vector3(detectionBlockHalfSize);
7123  var localSphere1 = new BoundingSphereD(center, sphere1.Radius);
7124  var localSphere2 = new BoundingSphereD(center, sphere2.Radius);
7125  var localSphere3 = new BoundingSphereD(center, sphere3.Radius);
7126 
7127  int cellsToCheck = (endIt.X - startIt.X) * (endIt.Y - startIt.Y) * (endIt.Z - startIt.Z);
7128  if (cellsToCheck < m_cubes.Count)
7129  {
7130  Vector3I cubePos = new Vector3I();
7131  MyCube cube;
7132  for (cubePos.X = startIt.X; cubePos.X <= endIt.X; cubePos.X++)
7133  {
7134  for (cubePos.Y = startIt.Y; cubePos.Y <= endIt.Y; cubePos.Y++)
7135  {
7136  for (cubePos.Z = startIt.Z; cubePos.Z <= endIt.Z; cubePos.Z++)
7137  {
7138  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(cubePos, out cube))
7139  {
7140  var block = cube.CubeBlock;
7141 
7142  if (block.FatBlock != null && m_processedBlocks.Contains(block.FatBlock))
7143  {
7144  continue;
7145  }
7146 
7147  m_processedBlocks.Add(block.FatBlock);
7148 
7149  if (respectDeformationRatio)
7150  {
7151  localSphere1.Radius = sphere1.Radius * block.DeformationRatio;
7152  localSphere2.Radius = sphere2.Radius * block.DeformationRatio;
7153  localSphere3.Radius = sphere3.Radius * block.DeformationRatio;
7154  }
7155 
7156  BoundingBox blockBox;
7157 
7158  if (block.FatBlock != null)
7159  {
7160  blockBox = new BoundingBox(block.Min * GridSize - GridSizeHalf, block.Max * GridSize + GridSizeHalf);
7161  }
7162  else
7163  {
7164  blockBox = new BoundingBox(block.Position * GridSize - halfSize, block.Position * GridSize + halfSize);
7165  }
7166 
7167  //If biggest sphere fails no need to check the rest
7168  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere3))
7169  {
7170  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere2))
7171  {
7172  if(blockBox.Intersects(localSphere1))
7173  blocks1.Add(block);
7174  else
7175  blocks2.Add(block);
7176  }
7177  else
7178  blocks3.Add(block);
7179  }
7180  }
7181  }
7182  }
7183  }
7184  }
7185  else
7186  {
7187  foreach (var cube in m_cubes.Values)
7188  {
7189  var block = cube.CubeBlock;
7190  if (block.FatBlock != null && m_processedBlocks.Contains(block.FatBlock))
7191  {
7192  continue;
7193  }
7194 
7195  m_processedBlocks.Add(block.FatBlock);
7196 
7197  if (respectDeformationRatio)
7198  {
7199  localSphere1.Radius = sphere1.Radius * block.DeformationRatio;
7200  localSphere2.Radius = sphere2.Radius * block.DeformationRatio;
7201  localSphere3.Radius = sphere3.Radius * block.DeformationRatio;
7202  }
7203 
7204  BoundingBox blockBox;
7205 
7206  if (block.FatBlock != null)
7207  {
7208  blockBox = new BoundingBox(block.Min * GridSize - GridSizeHalf, block.Max * GridSize + GridSizeHalf);
7209  }
7210  else
7211  {
7212  blockBox = new BoundingBox(block.Position * GridSize - halfSize, block.Position * GridSize + halfSize);
7213  }
7214 
7215  //If biggest sphere fails no need to check the rest
7216  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere3))
7217  {
7218  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere2))
7219  {
7220  if (blockBox.Intersects(localSphere1))
7221  blocks1.Add(block);
7222  else
7223  blocks2.Add(block);
7224  }
7225  else
7226  blocks3.Add(block);
7227  }
7228  }
7229  }
7230 
7231  m_processedBlocks.Clear();
7232  }
7233 
7237  internal HashSet<MyCube> RayCastBlocksAll(Vector3 worldStart, Vector3 worldEnd)
7238  {
7239  RayCastCells(worldStart, worldEnd, m_cacheRayCastCells);
7240  HashSet<MyCube> result = new HashSet<MyCube>();
7241  foreach (var i in m_cacheRayCastCells)
7242  {
7243  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(i))
7244  {
7245  result.Add(m_cubes[i]);
7246  }
7247  }
7248  return result;
7249  }
7250 
7254  internal List<MyCube> RayCastBlocksAllOrdered(Vector3 worldStart, Vector3 worldEnd)
7255  {
7256  RayCastCells(worldStart, worldEnd, m_cacheRayCastCells);
7257  List<MyCube> result = new List<MyCube>();
7258  foreach (var i in m_cacheRayCastCells)
7259  {
7260  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(i) && !result.Contains(m_cubes[i]))
7261  {
7262  result.Add(m_cubes[i]);
7263  }
7264  }
7265  return result;
7266  }
7267 
7271  public Vector3I? RayCastBlocks(Vector3D worldStart, Vector3D worldEnd)
7272  {
7273  RayCastCells(worldStart, worldEnd, m_cacheRayCastCells);
7274  foreach (var i in m_cacheRayCastCells)
7275  {
7276  if (m_cubes.ContainsKey(i))
7277  {
7278  return i;
7279  }
7280  }
7281  return null;
7282  }
7283 
7287  public void RayCastCells(Vector3D worldStart, Vector3D worldEnd, List<Vector3I> outHitPositions, Vector3I? gridSizeInflate = null, bool havokWorld = false,
7288  bool clearOutHitPositions = true)
7289  {
7290  MatrixD invWorld = PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv;//MatrixD.Invert(WorldMatrix);
7291  Vector3D localStart, localEnd;
7292  Vector3D.Transform(ref worldStart, ref invWorld, out localStart);
7293  Vector3D.Transform(ref worldEnd, ref invWorld, out localEnd);
7294 
7295  //We need move the line, because MyGridIntersection calculates the center of the box in the corner
7296  var offset = GridSizeHalfVector;
7297  localStart += offset;
7298  localEnd += offset;
7299 
7300  var min = Min - Vector3I.One;
7301  var max = Max + Vector3I.One;
7302  if (gridSizeInflate.HasValue)
7303  {
7304  min -= gridSizeInflate.Value;
7305  max += gridSizeInflate.Value;
7306  }
7307 
7308  if (clearOutHitPositions)
7309  outHitPositions.Clear();
7310 
7311  if (havokWorld)
7312  MyGridIntersection.CalculateHavok(outHitPositions, GridSize, localStart, localEnd, min, max);
7313  else
7314  MyGridIntersection.Calculate(outHitPositions, GridSize, localStart, localEnd, min, max);
7315  }
7316 
7320  public static void RayCastStaticCells(Vector3D worldStart, Vector3D worldEnd, List<Vector3I> outHitPositions, float gridSize, Vector3I? gridSizeInflate = null, bool havokWorld = false)
7321  {
7322  Vector3D localStart = worldStart;
7323  Vector3D localEnd = worldEnd;
7324 
7325  //We need move the line, because MyGridIntersection calculates the center of the box in the corner
7326  var offset = new Vector3D(gridSize * 0.5f);
7327  localStart += offset;
7328  localEnd += offset;
7329 
7330  var min = -Vector3I.One;
7331  var max = Vector3I.One;
7332  if (gridSizeInflate.HasValue)
7333  {
7334  min -= gridSizeInflate.Value;
7335  max += gridSizeInflate.Value;
7336  }
7337 
7338  outHitPositions.Clear();
7339  if (havokWorld)
7340  MyGridIntersection.CalculateHavok(outHitPositions, gridSize, localStart, localEnd, min, max);
7341  else
7342  MyGridIntersection.Calculate(outHitPositions, gridSize, localStart, localEnd, min, max);
7343  }
7344

7358  // for (tmp.X = minI.X; tmp.X <= maxI.X; ++tmp.X)

7362  // outOverlappedBlocks.Add(block);
7363  // }
7364  //}

7370  [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, Pack = 1)]

7375  public uint ColorMaskHSV;
7376  public Vector3I PosInGrid; // Could be Vector3S, we'll save another 6B

7432  private enum NeighborOffsetIndex
7433  {
7434  XUP = 0,
7435  XDOWN = 1,
7436  YUP = 2,
7437  YDOWN = 3,
7438  ZUP = 4,
7439  ZDOWN = 5,
7440  XUP_YUP = 6,
7441  XUP_YDOWN = 7,
7442  XDOWN_YUP = 8,
7443  XDOWN_YDOWN = 9,
7444  YUP_ZUP = 10,
7445  YUP_ZDOWN = 11,
7446  YDOWN_ZUP = 12,
7447  YDOWN_ZDOWN = 13,
7448  XUP_ZUP = 14,
7449  XUP_ZDOWN = 15,
7450  XDOWN_ZUP = 16,
7451  XDOWN_ZDOWN = 17,
7452  XUP_YUP_ZUP = 18,
7453  XUP_YUP_ZDOWN = 19,
7454  XUP_YDOWN_ZUP = 20,
7455  XUP_YDOWN_ZDOWN = 21,
7456  XDOWN_YUP_ZUP = 22,
7457  XDOWN_YUP_ZDOWN = 23,
7458  XDOWN_YDOWN_ZUP = 24,
7459  XDOWN_YDOWN_ZDOWN = 25
7460  }

7463  {

7473 
7479  public class BlockTypeCounter
7480  {
7481  private Dictionary<MyDefinitionId, int> m_countById = new Dictionary<MyDefinitionId, int>(MyDefinitionId.Comparer);
7482 
7483  internal int GetNextNumber(MyDefinitionId blockType)
7484  {
7485  int idCounter = 0;
7486  m_countById.TryGetValue(blockType, out idCounter);
7487  ++idCounter;
7488  m_countById[blockType] = idCounter;
7489  return idCounter;
7490  }
7491  }

7494 
7495  void IMyGridConnectivityTest.GetConnectedBlocks(Vector3I minI, Vector3I maxI, Dictionary<Vector3I, ConnectivityResult> outOverlappedCubeBlocks)
7496  {
7497  Debug.Assert(outOverlappedCubeBlocks != null);
7498 
7499  var tmp = new Vector3I();
7500 
7501  for (tmp.Z = minI.Z; tmp.Z <= maxI.Z; ++tmp.Z)
7502  for (tmp.Y = minI.Y; tmp.Y <= maxI.Y; ++tmp.Y)
7503  for (tmp.X = minI.X; tmp.X <= maxI.X; ++tmp.X)
7504  {
7505  var block = GetCubeBlock(tmp);
7506  if (block != null)
7507  outOverlappedCubeBlocks[block.Position] = new ConnectivityResult() { Definition = block.BlockDefinition, FatBlock = block.FatBlock, Orientation = block.Orientation, Position = block.Position };
7508  }
7509 
7510 
7511  }
7512 
7513  private string MakeCustomName()
7514  {
7515  StringBuilder output = new StringBuilder();
7516  int mod = 10000;
7517  long prefix = MyMath.Mod(EntityId, mod);
7518 
7519  string name = null;
7520  if (IsStatic)
7521  {
7522  //name = MyTexts.GetString(MySpaceTexts.CustomShipName_Platform);
7523  name = MyTexts.GetString(MyCommonTexts.DetailStaticGrid);
7524  }
7525  else
7526  {
7527  switch (GridSizeEnum)
7528  {
7529  //case Common.ObjectBuilders.MyCubeSize.Small: name = MyTexts.GetString(MySpaceTexts.CustomShipName_SmallShip); break;
7530  case MyCubeSize.Small: name = MyTexts.GetString(MyCommonTexts.DetailSmallGrid); break;
7531  //case Common.ObjectBuilders.MyCubeSize.Large: name = MyTexts.GetString(MySpaceTexts.CustomShipName_LargeShip); break;
7532  case MyCubeSize.Large: name = MyTexts.GetString(MyCommonTexts.DetailLargeGrid); break;
7533  }
7534  }
7535  output.Append(name ?? "Grid").Append(" ").Append(prefix.ToString());
7536  return output.ToString();
7537  }
7538

7540  {
7541  if (!MyFakes.ENABLE_TERMINAL_PROPERTIES)
7542  return;
7543 
7544  m_ownershipManager.ChangeBlockOwnership(block, oldOwner, newOwner);
7545 
7546  }

7548  public void RecalculateOwners()
7549  {
7550  if (!MyFakes.ENABLE_TERMINAL_PROPERTIES)
7551  return;
7552 
7553  m_ownershipManager.RecalculateOwners();
7554  }

7557  {
7558  if (!MyFakes.ENABLE_TERMINAL_PROPERTIES)
7559  return;
7560 
7561  m_ownershipManager.UpdateOnFunctionalChange(ownerId, isFunctional);
7562  }
