7564  class MyCubeGridPosition : MyPositionComponent
7565  {
7566  MyCubeGrid m_grid;
7567 
7568  public override void OnAddedToContainer()
7569  {
7570  base.OnAddedToContainer();
7571  m_grid = Container.Entity as MyCubeGrid;
7572  }
7573 
7574  protected override void OnWorldPositionChanged(object source, bool updateChildren)
7575  {
7576  m_grid.m_worldPositionChanged = true;
7577  base.OnWorldPositionChanged(source, updateChildren);
7578  }
7579 
7580  }
7581 
7582  public MyFracturedBlock CreateFracturedBlock(MyObjectBuilder_FracturedBlock fracturedBlockBuilder, Vector3I position)
7583  {
7584  Debug.Assert(!MyFakes.ENABLE_FRACTURE_COMPONENT);
7585  ProfilerShort.Begin("CreateFractureBlockBuilder");
7586  var defId = new MyDefinitionId(typeof(MyObjectBuilder_FracturedBlock), "FracturedBlockLarge");
7587  var def = Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(defId);
7588  var bPos = position;
7589  MyCube oldBlock;
7590  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(bPos, out oldBlock))
7591  RemoveBlockInternal(oldBlock.CubeBlock, close: true);
7592  fracturedBlockBuilder.CreatingFracturedBlock = true;
7593 
7594  var sb = AddBlock(fracturedBlockBuilder, false); //BuildBlock(def, Vector3.Zero, bPos, Quaternion.Identity, 0, 0, null);
7595  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(sb != null, "Error created fractured block!");
7596  if (sb != null)
7597  {
7598  var fb = sb.FatBlock as MyFracturedBlock;
7599 
7600 
7601  fb.Render.UpdateRenderObject(true);
7602  ProfilerShort.End();
7603  UpdateBlockNeighbours(fb.SlimBlock);
7604 
7605  return fb;
7606  }
7607 
7608  return null;
7609  }
7610 
7611  private MyFracturedBlock CreateFracturedBlock(MyFracturedBlock.Info info)// Havok.HkdBreakableShape shape, Vector3I pos)
7612  {
7613  Debug.Assert(!MyFakes.ENABLE_FRACTURE_COMPONENT);
7614  ProfilerShort.Begin("CreateFractureBlock");
7615  var defId = new MyDefinitionId(typeof(MyObjectBuilder_FracturedBlock), "FracturedBlockLarge");
7616  var def = Sandbox.Definitions.MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinition(defId);
7617  var bPos = info.Position;// m_grid.WorldToGridInteger(worldMatrix.Translation);
7618  MyCube oldBlock;
7619  if (m_cubes.TryGetValue(bPos, out oldBlock))
7620  RemoveBlock(oldBlock.CubeBlock, false);
7621 
7622  var blockObjectBuilder = MyCubeGrid.CreateBlockObjectBuilder(def, bPos, new MyBlockOrientation(ref Quaternion.Identity), 0, 0, true);
7623  blockObjectBuilder.ColorMaskHSV = Vector3.Zero;
7624  (blockObjectBuilder as MyObjectBuilder_FracturedBlock).CreatingFracturedBlock = true;
7625 
7626  var sb = AddBlock(blockObjectBuilder, false); //BuildBlock(def, Vector3.Zero, bPos, Quaternion.Identity, 0, 0, null);
7627  if (sb == null)
7628  {
7629  Debug.Fail("Fracture block not added");
7630  info.Shape.RemoveReference();
7631  ProfilerShort.End();
7632  return null;
7633  }
7634  var fb = sb.FatBlock as MyFracturedBlock;
7635  fb.OriginalBlocks = info.OriginalBlocks;
7636  fb.Orientations = info.Orientations;
7637  Debug.Assert(info.MultiBlocks == null || info.MultiBlocks.Count == fb.OriginalBlocks.Count);
7638  fb.MultiBlocks = info.MultiBlocks;
7639 
7640  ProfilerShort.Begin("SetRenderData");
7641  fb.SetDataFromHavok(info.Shape, info.Compound);
7642  ProfilerShort.End();
7643 
7644  fb.Render.UpdateRenderObject(true);
7645  ProfilerShort.End();
7646  UpdateBlockNeighbours(fb.SlimBlock);
7647 
7648  if (Sync.IsServer)
7649  {
7650  MySyncDestructions.CreateFracturedBlock((MyObjectBuilder_FracturedBlock)fb.GetObjectBuilderCubeBlock(), this.EntityId, bPos);
7651  }
7652 
7653  return fb;
7654  }
7655 
7656  bool m_generatorsEnabled = true;
7657  public bool EnableGenerators(bool enable, bool fromServer = false)
7658  {
7659  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer || fromServer, "Cannot change this on client");
7660 
7661  bool oldEnabled = m_generatorsEnabled;
7662 
7663  if (Sync.IsServer || fromServer)
7664  {
7665  Debug.Assert(Render is MyRenderComponentCubeGrid, "Invalid Render - cannot access grid generators");
7666  if (!(Render is MyRenderComponentCubeGrid))
7667  {
7668  m_generatorsEnabled = false;
7669  return false;
7670  }
7671 
7672  if (m_generatorsEnabled != enable)
7673  {
7674  AdditionalModelGenerators.ForEach(g => g.EnableGenerator(enable));
7675  m_generatorsEnabled = enable;
7676 
7677  //if (Sync.IsServer)
7678  // MySyncDestructions.EnableGenerators(this, enable);
7679  }
7680  }
7681 
7682  return oldEnabled;
7683  }
7684 
7685  // Returns generating block (not compound block, but block inside) from generated one. Can return also MyFracturedBlock!
7686  public MySlimBlock GetGeneratingBlock(MySlimBlock generatedBlock)
7687  {
7688  if (generatedBlock == null || !generatedBlock.BlockDefinition.IsGeneratedBlock)
7689  return null;
7690 
7691  foreach (var generator in AdditionalModelGenerators)
7692  {
7693  var generatingBlock = generator.GetGeneratingBlock(generatedBlock);
7694  if (generatingBlock != null)
7695  return generatingBlock;
7696  }
7697 
7698  return null;
7699  }
7700 
7701  private static readonly Vector3I[] m_tmpBlockSurroundingOffsets = new Vector3I[]
7702  {
7703  new Vector3I(0, 0, 0),
7704  new Vector3I(1, 0, 0),
7705  new Vector3I(-1, 0, 0),
7706  new Vector3I(0, 0, 1),
7707  new Vector3I(0, 0, -1),
7708  new Vector3I(1, 0, 1),
7709  new Vector3I(-1, 0, 1),
7710  new Vector3I(1, 0, -1),
7711  new Vector3I(-1, 0, -1),
7712 
7713  new Vector3I(0, 1, 0),
7714  new Vector3I(1, 1, 0),
7715  new Vector3I(-1, 1, 0),
7716  new Vector3I(0, 1, 1),
7717  new Vector3I(0, 1, -1),
7718  new Vector3I(1, 1, 1),
7719  new Vector3I(-1, 1, 1),
7720  new Vector3I(1, 1, -1),
7721  new Vector3I(-1, 1, -1),
7722 
7723  new Vector3I(0, -1, 0),
7724  new Vector3I(1, -1, 0),
7725  new Vector3I(-1, -1, 0),
7726  new Vector3I(0, -1, 1),
7727  new Vector3I(0, -1, -1),
7728  new Vector3I(1, -1, 1),
7729  new Vector3I(-1, -1, 1),
7730  new Vector3I(1, -1, -1),
7731  new Vector3I(-1, -1, -1),
7732  };
7733 
7737  public void GetGeneratedBlocks(MySlimBlock generatingBlock, List<MySlimBlock> outGeneratedBlocks)
7738  {
7739  ProfilerShort.Begin("MyCubeGrid.GetGeneratedBlocks");
7740  Debug.Assert(!(generatingBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock));
7741 
7742  outGeneratedBlocks.Clear();
7743 
7744  if (generatingBlock == null || (generatingBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock))
7745  {
7746  ProfilerShort.End();
7747  return;
7748  }
7749 
7750  if (generatingBlock.BlockDefinition.IsGeneratedBlock || generatingBlock.BlockDefinition.GeneratedBlockDefinitions == null
7751  || generatingBlock.BlockDefinition.GeneratedBlockDefinitions.Length == 0)
7752  {
7753  ProfilerShort.End();
7754  return;
7755  }
7756 
7757  foreach (var offset in m_tmpBlockSurroundingOffsets)
7758  {
7759  var surroundingBlock = generatingBlock.CubeGrid.GetCubeBlock(generatingBlock.Position + offset);
7760  if (surroundingBlock == null || surroundingBlock == generatingBlock)
7761  continue;
7762 
7763  if (surroundingBlock.FatBlock is MyCompoundCubeBlock)
7764  {
7765  var compoundBlock = surroundingBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
7766 
7767  foreach (var blockInCompound in compoundBlock.GetBlocks())
7768  {
7769  if (blockInCompound == generatingBlock || !blockInCompound.BlockDefinition.IsGeneratedBlock)
7770  continue;
7771 
7772  foreach (var generator in AdditionalModelGenerators)
7773  {
7774  var localGeneratingBlock = generator.GetGeneratingBlock(blockInCompound);
7775  if (generatingBlock != localGeneratingBlock)
7776  continue;
7777 
7778  outGeneratedBlocks.Add(blockInCompound);
7779  }
7780 
7781  }
7782  }
7783  else
7784  {
7785  if (!surroundingBlock.BlockDefinition.IsGeneratedBlock)
7786  continue;
7787 
7788  foreach (var generator in AdditionalModelGenerators)
7789  {
7790  var localGeneratingBlock = generator.GetGeneratingBlock(surroundingBlock);
7791  if (generatingBlock != localGeneratingBlock)
7792  continue;
7793 
7794  outGeneratedBlocks.Add(surroundingBlock);
7795  }
7796  }
7797  }
7798  ProfilerShort.End();
7799  }
7800 
7801  public void OnIntegrityChanged(MySlimBlock block)
7802  {
7803  NotifyBlockIntegrityChanged(block);
7804  }
7805 
7806  public void PasteBlocksToGrid(List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> gridsToMerge, long inventoryEntityId, bool multiBlock, bool instantBuild)
7807  {
7808  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.PasteBlocksToGridServer_Implementation, gridsToMerge, inventoryEntityId, multiBlock, instantBuild);
7809  }
7810 
7811  [Event, Reliable, Server]
7812  private void PasteBlocksToGridServer_Implementation(List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> gridsToMerge, long inventoryEntityId, bool multiBlock, bool instantBuild)
7813  {
7814  if (!MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked && !MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value))
7815  {
7816  MyEventContext.ValidationFailed();
7817  return;
7818  }
7819  bool isAdmin = (MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value));
7820 
7821  MyEntities.RemapObjectBuilderCollection(gridsToMerge);
7822  MatrixI mergeTransform = PasteBlocksServer(gridsToMerge);
7823 
7824  if ((isAdmin && instantBuild) == false)
7825  {
7826  MyEntity entity;
7827  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(inventoryEntityId, out entity) && entity != null)
7828  {
7829  MyInventoryBase buildInventory = MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBuilderInventory(entity);
7830  if (buildInventory != null)
7831  {
7832  if (multiBlock)
7833  {
7834  MyMultiBlockClipboard.TakeMaterialsFromBuilder(gridsToMerge, entity);
7835  }
7836  else
7837  {
7838  MyGridClipboard.CalculateItemRequirements(gridsToMerge, m_buildComponents);
7839  foreach (var item in m_buildComponents.TotalMaterials)
7840  {
7841  buildInventory.RemoveItemsOfType(item.Value, item.Key);
7842  }
7843  }
7844  }
7845  }
7846  }
7847 
7848  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.PasteBlocksToGridClient_Implementation, gridsToMerge[0], mergeTransform);
7849  }
7850 
7851  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
7852  private void PasteBlocksToGridClient_Implementation(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid gridToMerge, MatrixI mergeTransform)
7853  {
7854  PasteBlocksClient(gridToMerge, mergeTransform);
7855  }
7856 
7857  public void UpdateOxygenAmount(float[] oxygenAmount)
7858  {
7859  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
7860  Debug.Assert(MySession.Static.Settings.EnableOxygen);
7861  Debug.Assert(MySession.Static.Settings.EnableOxygenPressurization);
7862  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.UpdateOxygenAmount_Implementation, oxygenAmount);
7863  }
7864 
7865  // TODO: Make unreliable!
7866  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
7867  private void UpdateOxygenAmount_Implementation(float[] oxygenAmount)
7868  {
7869  Debug.Assert(MySession.Static.Settings.EnableOxygen);
7870  Debug.Assert(MySession.Static.Settings.EnableOxygenPressurization);
7871  if (GridSystems != null && GridSystems.GasSystem != null)
7872  {
7873  GridSystems.GasSystem.UpdateOxygenAmount(oxygenAmount);
7874  }
7875  }
7876 
7877  private void PasteBlocksClient(MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid gridToMerge, MatrixI mergeTransform)
7878  {
7879  var pastedGrid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilder(gridToMerge) as MyCubeGrid;
7880  pastedGrid.SentFromServer = true;
7881  MyEntities.Add(pastedGrid);
7882  MySession.Static.TotalBlocksCreated += (uint)pastedGrid.BlocksCount;
7883  MergeGridInternal(pastedGrid, ref mergeTransform);
7884  }
7885 
7886  private MatrixI PasteBlocksServer(List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> gridsToMerge)
7887  {
7888  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
7889  MyCubeGrid firstEntity = null;
7890  foreach (var gridbuilder in gridsToMerge)
7891  {
7892  var pastedGrid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilder(gridbuilder) as MyCubeGrid;
7893  if (firstEntity == null)
7894  firstEntity = pastedGrid;
7895  MyEntities.Add(pastedGrid);
7896  MySession.Static.TotalBlocksCreated += (uint)pastedGrid.BlocksCount;
7897  }
7898 
7899  MatrixI mergingTransform = CalculateMergeTransform(firstEntity,
7900  WorldToGridInteger(firstEntity.PositionComp.GetPosition()));
7901  MergeGridInternal(firstEntity, ref mergingTransform, false);
7902  return mergingTransform;
7903  }
7904 
7905  public static bool CanPasteGrid()
7906  {
7907  return MySession.Static.IsCopyPastingEnabled;
7908  }
7909 
7913  public MyCubeGrid GetBiggestGridInGroup()
7914  {
7915  MyCubeGrid biggestGridInGroup = this;
7916  double maxVolume = 0;
7917  foreach (var grid in MyCubeGridGroups.Static.Physical.GetGroup(this).Nodes)
7918  {
7919  var volume = grid.NodeData.PositionComp.WorldAABB.Size.Volume;
7920  if (volume > maxVolume)
7921  {
7922  maxVolume = volume;
7923  biggestGridInGroup = grid.NodeData;
7924  }
7925  }
7926  return biggestGridInGroup;
7927  }
7928 
7929  public void ConvertFracturedBlocksToComponents()
7930  {
7931  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
7932 
7933  var fracturedBlocks = new List<MyFracturedBlock>();
7934  foreach (var block in m_cubeBlocks)
7935  {
7936  MyFracturedBlock fb = block.FatBlock as MyFracturedBlock;
7937  if (fb != null)
7938  fracturedBlocks.Add(fb);
7939  }
7940 
7941  bool oldEnabled = EnableGenerators(false);
7942  try
7943  {
7944  foreach (var fb in fracturedBlocks)
7945  {
7946  var convertedBuilder = fb.ConvertToOriginalBlocksWithFractureComponent();
7947 
7948  RemoveBlockInternal(fb.SlimBlock, true, markDirtyDisconnects: false);
7949 
7950  if (convertedBuilder != null)
7951  AddBlock(convertedBuilder, false);
7952  }
7953  }
7954  finally
7955  {
7956  EnableGenerators(oldEnabled);
7957  }
7958  }
7959 
7960  public void PrepareMultiBlockInfos()
7961  {
7962  Debug.Assert(MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS);
7963  foreach (var block in GetBlocks())
7964  AddMultiBlockInfo(block);
7965  }
7966 
7967  internal void AddMultiBlockInfo(MySlimBlock block)
7968  {
7969  Debug.Assert(MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS);
7970 
7971  var compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
7972  if (compoundBlock != null)
7973  {
7974  foreach (var blockInCompound in compoundBlock.GetBlocks())
7975  if (blockInCompound.IsMultiBlockPart)
7976  AddMultiBlockInfo(blockInCompound);
7977 
7978  return;
7979  }
7980 
7981  Debug.Assert(compoundBlock == null);
7982 
7983  if (!block.IsMultiBlockPart)
7984  return;
7985 
7986  if (m_multiBlockInfos == null)
7987  m_multiBlockInfos = new Dictionary<int, MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo>();
7988 
7989  MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo mbInfo;
7990  if (!m_multiBlockInfos.TryGetValue(block.MultiBlockId, out mbInfo))
7991  {
7992  mbInfo = new MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo();
7993  mbInfo.MultiBlockId = block.MultiBlockId;
7994  mbInfo.MultiBlockDefinition = block.MultiBlockDefinition;
7995  mbInfo.MainBlockDefinition = MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetCubeBlockDefinitionForMultiBlock(block.MultiBlockDefinition.Id.SubtypeName);
7996  Debug.Assert(mbInfo.MainBlockDefinition != null);
7997 
7998  m_multiBlockInfos.Add(block.MultiBlockId, mbInfo);
7999  }
8000 
8001  mbInfo.Blocks.Add(block);
8002  }
8003 
8004  internal void RemoveMultiBlockInfo(MySlimBlock block)
8005  {
8006  Debug.Assert(MyFakes.ENABLE_MULTIBLOCK_PART_IDS);
8007 
8008  if (m_multiBlockInfos == null)
8009  return;
8010 
8011  var compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
8012  if (compoundBlock != null)
8013  {
8014  foreach (var blockInCompound in compoundBlock.GetBlocks())
8015  if (blockInCompound.IsMultiBlockPart)
8016  RemoveMultiBlockInfo(blockInCompound);
8017 
8018  return;
8019  }
8020 
8021  Debug.Assert(compoundBlock == null);
8022 
8023  if (!block.IsMultiBlockPart)
8024  return;
8025 
8026  MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo mbInfo;
8027  if (m_multiBlockInfos.TryGetValue(block.MultiBlockId, out mbInfo))
8028  {
8029  if (mbInfo.Blocks.Remove(block))
8030  {
8031  if (mbInfo.Blocks.Count == 0)
8032  {
8033  if (m_multiBlockInfos.Remove(block.MultiBlockId))
8034  {
8035  if (m_multiBlockInfos.Count == 0)
8036  m_multiBlockInfos = null;
8037  }
8038  }
8039  }
8040  }
8041  }
8042 
8043  public MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo GetMultiBlockInfo(int multiBlockId)
8044  {
8045  if (m_multiBlockInfos != null)
8046  {
8047  MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo info;
8048  if (m_multiBlockInfos.TryGetValue(multiBlockId, out info))
8049  return info;
8050  }
8051 
8052  return null;
8053  }
8054 
8058  public void GetBlocksInMultiBlock(int multiBlockId, HashSet<Tuple<MySlimBlock, ushort?>> outMultiBlocks)
8059  {
8060  Debug.Assert(multiBlockId != 0);
8061  if (multiBlockId == 0)
8062  return;
8063 
8064  var multiBlockInfo = GetMultiBlockInfo(multiBlockId);
8065  if (multiBlockInfo != null)
8066  {
8067  foreach (var multiBlockPart in multiBlockInfo.Blocks)
8068  {
8069  var existingBlock = GetCubeBlock(multiBlockPart.Position);
8070  var compoundBlock = existingBlock.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
8071 
8072  if (compoundBlock != null)
8073  {
8074  ushort? blockInCompoundId = compoundBlock.GetBlockId(multiBlockPart);
8075  Debug.Assert(blockInCompoundId != null);
8076  outMultiBlocks.Add(new Tuple<MySlimBlock, ushort?>(existingBlock, blockInCompoundId));
8077  }
8078  else
8079  {
8080  outMultiBlocks.Add(new Tuple<MySlimBlock, ushort?>(existingBlock, null));
8081  }
8082  }
8083  }
8084  }
8085 
8086  public bool CanAddMultiBlocks(MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo multiBlockInfo, ref MatrixI transform, List<int> multiBlockIndices)
8087  {
8088  MatrixI outBlockRotation;
8089  foreach (var index in multiBlockIndices)
8090  {
8091  Debug.Assert(index < multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions.Length);
8092  if (index < multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions.Length)
8093  {
8094  var blockDefInfo = multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions[index];
8095  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDef;
8096  if (!MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(blockDefInfo.Id, out blockDef) || blockDef == null)
8097  return false;
8098 
8099  var position = Vector3I.Transform(blockDefInfo.Min, ref transform);
8100 
8101  var blockDefRotation = new MatrixI(blockDefInfo.Forward, blockDefInfo.Up);
8102  MatrixI.Multiply(ref blockDefRotation, ref transform, out outBlockRotation);
8103  var blockOrientation = outBlockRotation.GetBlockOrientation();
8104 
8105  if (!CanPlaceBlock(position, position, blockOrientation, blockDef, ignoreMultiblockId: multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockId, ignoreFracturedPieces: true))
8106  return false;
8107  }
8108  }
8109 
8110  return true;
8111  }
8112 
8116  public bool BuildMultiBlocks(MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo multiBlockInfo, ref MatrixI transform, List<int> multiBlockIndices, long builderEntityId)
8117  {
8118  List<MyBlockLocation> locations = new List<MyBlockLocation>();
8119  List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock> blockBuilders = new List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock>();
8120 
8121  MatrixI outBlockRotation;
8122  foreach (var index in multiBlockIndices)
8123  {
8124  Debug.Assert(index < multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions.Length);
8125  if (index < multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions.Length)
8126  {
8127  var blockDefInfo = multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.BlockDefinitions[index];
8128  MyCubeBlockDefinition blockDef;
8129  if (!MyDefinitionManager.Static.TryGetCubeBlockDefinition(blockDefInfo.Id, out blockDef) || blockDef == null)
8130  return false;
8131 
8132  var position = Vector3I.Transform(blockDefInfo.Min, ref transform);
8133 
8134  var blockDefRotation = new MatrixI(blockDefInfo.Forward, blockDefInfo.Up);
8135  MatrixI.Multiply(ref blockDefRotation, ref transform, out outBlockRotation);
8136  var blockOrientation = outBlockRotation.GetBlockOrientation();
8137 
8138  if (!CanPlaceBlock(position, position, blockOrientation, blockDef, ignoreMultiblockId: multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockId))
8139  return false;
8140 
8141  MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock blockBuilder = MyObjectBuilderSerializer.CreateNewObject(blockDefInfo.Id) as MyObjectBuilder_CubeBlock;
8142  blockBuilder.Orientation = Base6Directions.GetOrientation(blockOrientation.Forward, blockOrientation.Up);
8143  blockBuilder.Min = position;
8144  blockBuilder.ColorMaskHSV = MyPlayer.SelectedColor;
8145  blockBuilder.MultiBlockId = multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockId;
8146  blockBuilder.MultiBlockIndex = index;
8147  blockBuilder.MultiBlockDefinition = multiBlockInfo.MultiBlockDefinition.Id;
8148 
8149  blockBuilders.Add(blockBuilder);
8150 
8151  MyBlockLocation location = new MyBlockLocation();
8152  location.Min = position;
8153  location.Max = position;
8154  location.CenterPos = position;
8155  location.Orientation = new MyBlockOrientation(blockOrientation.Forward, blockOrientation.Up);
8156  location.BlockDefinition = blockDefInfo.Id;
8157  location.EntityId = MyEntityIdentifier.AllocateId();
8158  location.Owner = builderEntityId;
8159 
8160  locations.Add(location);
8161  }
8162  }
8163 
8164  Debug.Assert(locations.Count == blockBuilders.Count);
8165 
8166  if (MySession.Static.SurvivalMode)
8167  {
8168  MyEntity toolOwner = MyEntities.GetEntityById(builderEntityId);
8169  if (toolOwner == null)
8170  return false;
8171 
8172  HashSet<MyBlockLocation> setLocations = new HashSet<MyBlockLocation>(locations);
8173  MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBlocksPlacementMaterials(setLocations, this);
8174  if (!MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.HasBuildingMaterials(toolOwner))
8175  return false;
8176  }
8177 
8178  for (int i = 0; i < locations.Count && i < blockBuilders.Count; ++i)
8179  {
8180  var location = locations[i];
8181  var blockBuilder = blockBuilders[i];
8182 
8183  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BuildBlockRequest, MyPlayer.SelectedColor.PackHSVToUint(), location, blockBuilder, builderEntityId,false,MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId);
8184  }
8185 
8186  return true;
8187  }
8188 
8189  private bool GetMissingBlocksMultiBlock(int multiblockId, out MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo multiBlockInfo, out MatrixI transform, List<int> multiBlockIndices)
8190  {
8191  transform = default(MatrixI);
8192  multiBlockInfo = GetMultiBlockInfo(multiblockId);
8193  Debug.Assert(multiBlockInfo != null);
8194  if (multiBlockInfo == null)
8195  return false;
8196 
8197  return multiBlockInfo.GetMissingBlocks(out transform, multiBlockIndices);
8198  }
8199 
8200  public bool CanAddMissingBlocksInMultiBlock(int multiBlockId)
8201  {
8202  try
8203  {
8204  MatrixI transform;
8205  MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo multiBlockInfo;
8206  if (!GetMissingBlocksMultiBlock(multiBlockId, out multiBlockInfo, out transform, m_tmpMultiBlockIndices))
8207  return false;
8208 
8209  return CanAddMultiBlocks(multiBlockInfo, ref transform, m_tmpMultiBlockIndices);
8210  }
8211  finally
8212  {
8213  m_tmpMultiBlockIndices.Clear();
8214  }
8215  }
8216 
8217  public void AddMissingBlocksInMultiBlock(int multiBlockId, long toolOwnerId)
8218  {
8219  Debug.Assert(Sync.IsServer);
8220 
8221  try
8222  {
8223  MatrixI transform;
8224  MyCubeGridMultiBlockInfo multiBlockInfo;
8225  if (!GetMissingBlocksMultiBlock(multiBlockId, out multiBlockInfo, out transform, m_tmpMultiBlockIndices))
8226  return;
8227 
8228  BuildMultiBlocks(multiBlockInfo, ref transform, m_tmpMultiBlockIndices, toolOwnerId);
8229  }
8230  finally
8231  {
8232  m_tmpMultiBlockIndices.Clear();
8233  }
8234  }
8235 
8240  public bool CanAddOtherBlockInMultiBlock(Vector3I min, Vector3I max, MyBlockOrientation orientation, MyCubeBlockDefinition definition, int? ignoreMultiblockId)
8241  {
8242  if (m_multiBlockInfos == null)
8243  return true;
8244 
8245  foreach (var entry in m_multiBlockInfos)
8246  {
8247  if (ignoreMultiblockId == null || ignoreMultiblockId.Value != entry.Key)
8248  {
8249  var mbInfo = entry.Value;
8250  if (!mbInfo.CanAddBlock(ref min, ref max, orientation, definition))
8251  return false;
8252  }
8253  }
8254 
8255  return true;
8256  }
8257 
8258  public static bool IsGridInCompleteState(MyCubeGrid grid)
8259  {
8260  foreach (var block in grid.CubeBlocks)
8261  {
8262  if (!block.IsFullIntegrity || block.BuildLevelRatio != 1.0f)
8263  return false;
8264  }
8265 
8266  return true;
8267  }
8268 
8269  public bool WillRemoveBlockSplitGrid( MySlimBlock testBlock )
8270  {
8271  return m_disconnectHelper.TryDisconnect( testBlock );
8272  }
8273 
8275  public MySlimBlock GetTargetedBlock(Vector3D position)
8276  {
8277  Vector3I blockPos;
8278  FixTargetCube(out blockPos, Vector3D.Transform(position, PositionComp.WorldMatrixNormalizedInv) * GridSizeR);
8279  return GetCubeBlock(blockPos);
8280  }
8281 
8282  #region Multiplayer
8283  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8284  public static void TryCreateGrid_Implementation(MyCubeSize cubeSize, bool isStatic, MyPositionAndOrientation position, long inventoryEntityId, bool instantBuild)
8285  {
8286  string prefabName;
8287  bool isAdmin = (MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value));
8288 
8289  MyDefinitionManager.Static.GetBaseBlockPrefabName(cubeSize, isStatic, MySession.Static.CreativeMode || (instantBuild && isAdmin), out prefabName);
8290 
8291  if (prefabName == null)
8292  return;
8293  var gridBuilders = MyPrefabManager.Static.GetGridPrefab(prefabName);
8294  Debug.Assert(gridBuilders != null && gridBuilders.Length > 0);
8295  if (gridBuilders == null || gridBuilders.Length == 0)
8296  return;
8297 
8298  foreach (var gridBuilder in gridBuilders)
8299  {
8300  gridBuilder.PositionAndOrientation = position;
8301  }
8302 
8303  MyEntities.RemapObjectBuilderCollection(gridBuilders);
8304 
8305  if ((instantBuild && isAdmin) == false)
8306  {
8307  MyEntity inventoryOwner;
8308  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(inventoryEntityId, out inventoryOwner) && inventoryOwner != null)
8309  {
8310  MyInventoryBase buildInventory = MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBuilderInventory(inventoryOwner);
8311  if (buildInventory != null)
8312  {
8313  MyGridClipboard.CalculateItemRequirements(gridBuilders, m_buildComponents);
8314  foreach (var item in m_buildComponents.TotalMaterials)
8315  {
8316  buildInventory.RemoveItemsOfType(item.Value, item.Key);
8317  }
8318  }
8319  }
8320  else if (isAdmin == false && MySession.Static.CreativeMode == false && MyFinalBuildConstants.IS_OFFICIAL)
8321  {
8322  return;
8323  }
8324  }
8325 
8326  List<MyCubeGrid> results = new List<MyCubeGrid>();
8327 
8328  foreach (var entity in gridBuilders)
8329  {
8330  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("CreateCompressedMsg: Type: " + entity.GetType().Name.ToString() + " Name: " + entity.Name + " EntityID: " + entity.EntityId.ToString("X8"));
8331 
8332  // This does not work, because EntityCreation is not supported on separate thread
8333  //MyEntities.CreateAsync(entity, false, (e) => results.Add((MyCubeGrid)e));
8334 
8335  MyCubeGrid grid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilder(entity) as MyCubeGrid;
8336  results.Add(grid);
8337 
8338  if (instantBuild && isAdmin)
8339  {
8340  ChangeOwnership(inventoryEntityId, grid);
8341  }
8342 
8343  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("Status: Exists(" + MyEntities.EntityExists(entity.EntityId) + ") InScene(" + ((entity.PersistentFlags & MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene) == MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene) + ")");
8344  }
8345 
8346  AfterPaste(results, Vector3.Zero, false);
8347  }
8348 
8352  public void SendGridCloseRequest()
8353  {
8354  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => OnGridClosedRequest, EntityId);
8355  }
8356 
8357  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8358  static void OnGridClosedRequest(long entityId)
8359  {
8360  if (!MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked && !MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value))
8361  {
8362  MyEventContext.ValidationFailed();
8363  return;
8364  }
8365  MyEntity entity;
8366  MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(entityId, out entity);
8367  if (entity == null)
8368  return;
8369 
8370  foreach (var block in (entity as MyCubeGrid).GetBlocks())
8371  {
8372  block.RemoveAuthorship();
8373  var cockpit = block.FatBlock as MyCockpit;
8374  if (cockpit != null && cockpit.Pilot != null)
8375  cockpit.Use();
8376  }
8377 
8378  // Test right to closing entity (e.g. is creative mode?)
8379  if (!entity.MarkedForClose)
8380  entity.Close(); // close only on server, server uses replication to propagate it to clients
8381  }
8382 
8383  private class PasteGridData : ParallelTasks.WorkData
8384  {
8385  List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> m_entities;
8386  bool m_detectDisconnects;
8387  long m_inventoryEntityId;
8388  Vector3 m_objectVelocity;
8389  bool m_multiBlock;
8390  bool m_instantBuild;
8391  List<MyCubeGrid> m_results;
8392  bool m_canPlaceGrid;
8393  List<IMyEntity> m_resultIDs;
8394  bool m_removeScripts;
8395  //GK: Added minimum event info, because at parallel task completion (OnPasteCompleted) we no longer have MyEventContext.Current
8396  public readonly EndpointId SenderEndpointId;
8397  public readonly bool IsLocallyInvoked;
8398 
8399  public PasteGridData(List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> entities, bool detectDisconnects, long inventoryEntityId, Vector3 objectVelocity, bool multiBlock,
8400  bool instantBuild, bool shouldRemoveScripts, EndpointId senderEndpointId, bool isLocallyInvoked)
8401  {
8402  m_entities = new List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid>(entities);
8403  m_detectDisconnects = detectDisconnects;
8404  m_inventoryEntityId = inventoryEntityId;
8405  m_objectVelocity = objectVelocity;
8406  m_multiBlock = multiBlock;
8407  m_instantBuild = instantBuild;
8408  SenderEndpointId = senderEndpointId;
8409  IsLocallyInvoked = isLocallyInvoked;
8410  m_removeScripts = shouldRemoveScripts;
8411  }
8412 
8413  public void TryPasteGrid()
8414  {
8415  bool isAdmin = (MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked || MySession.Static.HasPlayerCreativeRights(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value));
8416 
8417  bool validBattlePaste = false;
8418 
8419  if (MySession.Static.SurvivalMode && !validBattlePaste && !isAdmin)
8420  {
8421  return;
8422  }
8423 
8424  //Fix for when the player wants to paste a ship with the same object builder multiple times. Should be done in a less performance heavy way if possible
8425  for (int i = 0; i < m_entities.Count; i++)
8426  {
8427  m_entities[i] = (MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid)m_entities[i].Clone();
8428  }
8429 
8430  MyEntities.RemapObjectBuilderCollection(m_entities);
8431 
8432  if (m_removeScripts)
8433  {
8434  foreach (var grid in m_entities)
8435  {
8436  foreach (var block in grid.CubeBlocks)
8437  {
8438  var programmable = block as MyObjectBuilder_MyProgrammableBlock;
8439  if (programmable == null)
8440  continue;
8441 
8442  programmable.Program = null;
8443  }
8444  }
8445  }
8446 
8447  if ((m_instantBuild && isAdmin) == false)
8448  {
8449  MyEntity inventoryOwner;
8450  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(m_inventoryEntityId, out inventoryOwner) && inventoryOwner != null)
8451  {
8452  // TODO: If there's not enough materials, it should return false!
8453  if (m_multiBlock)
8454  {
8455  MyMultiBlockClipboard.TakeMaterialsFromBuilder(m_entities, inventoryOwner);
8456  }
8457  else
8458  {
8459  MyInventoryBase buildInventory = MyCubeBuilder.BuildComponent.GetBuilderInventory(inventoryOwner);
8460  if (buildInventory != null)
8461  {
8462  MyGridClipboard.CalculateItemRequirements(m_entities, m_buildComponents);
8463  foreach (var item in m_buildComponents.TotalMaterials)
8464  {
8465  buildInventory.RemoveItemsOfType(item.Value, item.Key);
8466  }
8467  }
8468  }
8469  }
8470  }
8471 
8472  m_results = new List<MyCubeGrid>();
8473 
8474  MyEntityIdentifier.LazyInitPerThreadStorage(2048);
8475 
8476  m_canPlaceGrid = true;
8477  foreach (var entity in m_entities)
8478  {
8479  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("CreateCompressedMsg: Type: " + entity.GetType().Name.ToString() + " Name: " + entity.Name + " EntityID: " + entity.EntityId.ToString("X8"));
8480  MyCubeGrid grid = MyEntities.CreateFromObjectBuilder(entity, false) as MyCubeGrid;
8481  m_results.Add(grid);
8482 
8483  m_canPlaceGrid &= TestPastedGridPlacement(grid);
8484  if (m_canPlaceGrid == false)
8485  {
8486  break;
8487  }
8488 
8489  if (m_instantBuild && isAdmin)
8490  {
8491  ChangeOwnership(m_inventoryEntityId, grid);
8492  }
8493 
8494  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("Status: Exists(" + MyEntities.EntityExists(entity.EntityId) + ") InScene(" + ((entity.PersistentFlags & MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene) == MyPersistentEntityFlags2.InScene) + ")");
8495  }
8496 
8497  m_resultIDs = new List<VRage.ModAPI.IMyEntity>();
8498  MyEntityIdentifier.GetPerThreadEntities(m_resultIDs);
8499  MyEntityIdentifier.ClearPerThreadEntities();
8500  }
8501 
8502  private bool TestPastedGridPlacement(MyCubeGrid grid)
8503  {
8504  var settings = MyClipboardComponent.ClipboardDefinition.PastingSettings.GetGridPlacementSettings(grid.GridSizeEnum, grid.IsStatic);
8505  return TestPlacementArea(grid, grid.IsStatic, ref settings, (BoundingBoxD)grid.PositionComp.LocalAABB, !grid.IsStatic);
8506  }
8507 
8508  public void Callback()
8509  {
8510  if (!IsLocallyInvoked)
8511  {
8512  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => MyCubeGrid.SendHudNotificationAfterPaste, SenderEndpointId);
8513  }
8514  else if (!MySandboxGame.IsDedicated)
8515  {
8516  MyHud.PopRotatingWheelVisible();
8517  }
8518  if (m_canPlaceGrid && m_results.Count > 0)
8519  {
8520  foreach (var entity in m_resultIDs)
8521  {
8522  VRage.ModAPI.IMyEntity foundEntity;
8523  MyEntityIdentifier.TryGetEntity(entity.EntityId, out foundEntity);
8524  if (foundEntity == null)
8525  MyEntityIdentifier.AddEntityWithId(entity);
8526  else
8527  Debug.Fail("Two threads added the same entity");
8528  }
8529 
8530  foreach (var grid in m_results)
8531  {
8532  m_canPlaceGrid &= TestPastedGridPlacement(grid);
8533  }
8534  if (m_canPlaceGrid)
8535  AfterPaste(m_results, m_objectVelocity, m_detectDisconnects);
8536  }
8537  else
8538  {
8539  foreach (var grid in m_results)
8540  {
8541  grid.Close();
8542  }
8543 
8544  if (!IsLocallyInvoked)
8545  {
8546  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => MyCubeGrid.ShowPasteFailedOperation, SenderEndpointId);
8547  }
8548  }
8549  }
8550  }
8551 
8552  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8553  public static void TryPasteGrid_Implementation(List<MyObjectBuilder_CubeGrid> entities, bool detectDisconnects, long inventoryEntityId, Vector3 objectVelocity, bool multiBlock,
8554  bool instantBuild)
8555  {
8556  if (!MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked && !MySession.Static.IsCopyPastingEnabledForUser(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value)) //GK: Check the correct user that is the one of the current event context
8557  {
8558  MyEventContext.ValidationFailed();
8559  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => MyCubeGrid.SendHudNotificationAfterPaste, MyEventContext.Current.Sender);
8560  return;
8561  }
8562  bool shouldRemoveScripts = !MySession.Static.IsUserScripter(MyEventContext.Current.Sender.Value);
8563  PasteGridData workData = new PasteGridData(entities, detectDisconnects, inventoryEntityId, objectVelocity, multiBlock, instantBuild, shouldRemoveScripts, MyEventContext.Current.Sender, MyEventContext.Current.IsLocallyInvoked);
8564  Parallel.Start(TryPasteGrid_ImplementationInternal, OnPasteCompleted, workData);
8565  }
8566 
8567  static void TryPasteGrid_ImplementationInternal(WorkData workData)
8568  {
8569  PasteGridData pasteData = workData as PasteGridData;
8570  if (pasteData == null)
8571  {
8572  workData.FlagAsFailed();
8573  return;
8574  }
8575 
8576  pasteData.TryPasteGrid();
8577  }
8578 
8579  static void OnPasteCompleted(WorkData workData)
8580  {
8581  PasteGridData pasteData = workData as PasteGridData;
8582  if (pasteData == null)
8583  {
8584  workData.FlagAsFailed();
8585  return;
8586  }
8587 
8588  pasteData.Callback();
8589  }
8590 
8591  [Event, Reliable, Client]
8592  public static void ShowPasteFailedOperation()
8593  {
8594  MyHud.Notifications.Add(MyNotificationSingletons.PasteFailed);
8595  }
8596 
8597  [Event, Reliable, Client]
8598  public static void SendHudNotificationAfterPaste()
8599  {
8600  MyHud.PopRotatingWheelVisible();
8601  }
8602 
8603  private static void ChangeOwnership(long inventoryEntityId, MyCubeGrid grid)
8604  {
8605  MyEntity inventoryOwner;
8606  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(inventoryEntityId, out inventoryOwner) && inventoryOwner != null)
8607  {
8608  MyCharacter character = inventoryOwner as MyCharacter;
8609  if (character != null)
8610  {
8611  grid.ChangeGridOwner(character.ControllerInfo.Controller.Player.Identity.IdentityId, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum.Faction);
8612  }
8613  }
8614  }
8615 
8616  static void AfterPaste(List<MyCubeGrid> grids, Vector3 objectVelocity, bool detectDisconnects)
8617  {
8618  foreach (var pastedGrid in grids)
8619  {
8620  if (pastedGrid.IsStatic)
8621  {
8622  pastedGrid.TestDynamic = MyCubeGrid.MyTestDynamicReason.GridCopied;
8623  }
8624 
8625  MyEntities.Add(pastedGrid);
8626 
8627  if (pastedGrid.Physics != null)
8628  {
8629  if (!pastedGrid.IsStatic)
8630  {
8631  pastedGrid.Physics.LinearVelocity = objectVelocity;
8632  }
8633 
8634  if (!pastedGrid.IsStatic && MySession.Static.ControlledEntity != null && MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.Entity.Physics != null)
8635  {
8636  if (MySession.Static.ControlledEntity != null)
8637  pastedGrid.Physics.AngularVelocity = MySession.Static.ControlledEntity.Entity.Physics.AngularVelocity;
8638  }
8639  }
8640  else
8641  Debug.Fail("Pasted grid without physics!");
8642 
8643  if (detectDisconnects)
8644  {
8645  pastedGrid.DetectDisconnectsAfterFrame();
8646  }
8647  MySession.Static.TotalBlocksCreated += (uint)pastedGrid.BlocksCount;
8648 
8649  if (pastedGrid.IsStatic)
8650  {
8651  foreach (var block in pastedGrid.CubeBlocks)
8652  {
8653  if (pastedGrid.DetectMerge(block) != null)
8654  break;
8655  }
8656  }
8657  pastedGrid.IsReadyForReplication = true;
8658  }
8659 
8660  MatrixD worldMatrix = grids[0].PositionComp.WorldMatrix;
8661  // grid[0] because we need only first grid for this
8662  bool result = MyCoordinateSystem.Static.IsLocalCoordSysExist(ref worldMatrix, grids[0].GridSize);
8663  if (grids[0].GridSizeEnum == MyCubeSize.Large)
8664  {
8665  if (result)
8666  {
8667  MyCoordinateSystem.Static.RegisterCubeGrid(grids[0]);
8668  }
8669  else
8670  {
8671  MyCoordinateSystem.Static.CreateCoordSys(grids[0], MyClipboardComponent.ClipboardDefinition.PastingSettings.StaticGridAlignToCenter, true);
8672  }
8673  }
8674  }
8675 
8676  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
8677  public void RequestConvertToDynamic()
8678  {
8679  if (IsStatic)
8680  {
8681  this.ConvertToDynamic();
8682  }
8683  }
8684 
8685  public void RecalculateGravity()
8686  {
8687  m_gravity = MyGravityProviderSystem.CalculateNaturalGravityInPoint(PositionComp.GetPosition());
8688  if (MyPerGameSettings.Game == GameEnum.VRS_GAME)
8689  m_gravity += MyGravityProviderSystem.CalculateArtificialGravityInPoint(PositionComp.GetPosition());
8690  }
8691 
8692  public void ActivatePhysics()
8693  {
8694  if (Physics != null && Physics.Enabled)
8695  {
8696  Physics.RigidBody.Activate();
8697  if (Physics.RigidBody2 != null)
8698  {
8699  Physics.RigidBody2.Activate();
8700  }
8701  }
8702  }
8703 
8704  void SendDirtyBones(Vector3I minBone, Vector3I maxBone, MyGridSkeleton skeleton)
8705  {
8706  m_boneByteList.Clear();
8707  skeleton.SerializePart(minBone, maxBone, GridSize, m_boneByteList);
8708 
8709  if (m_boneByteList.Count > 0)
8710  {
8711  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnBonesReceived, minBone, maxBone, m_boneByteList);
8712  }
8713  }
8714 
8715  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
8716  void OnBonesReceived(Vector3I minBone, Vector3I maxBone, List<byte> boneByteList)
8717  {
8718  Skeleton.DeserializePart(minBone, maxBone, GridSize, boneByteList);
8719 
8720  Vector3I minCube = Vector3I.Zero;
8721  Vector3I maxCube = Vector3I.Zero;
8722 
8723  // To hit incident cubes
8724  Vector3I min = minBone;// -Vector3I.One;
8725  Vector3I max = maxBone;// +Vector3I.One;
8726 
8727  Skeleton.Wrap(ref minCube, ref min);
8728  Skeleton.Wrap(ref maxCube, ref max);
8729 
8730  minCube -= Vector3I.One;
8731  maxCube += Vector3I.One;
8732 
8733  Vector3I pos;
8734  for (pos.X = minCube.X; pos.X <= maxCube.X; pos.X++)
8735  {
8736  for (pos.Y = minCube.Y; pos.Y <= maxCube.Y; pos.Y++)
8737  {
8738  for (pos.Z = minCube.Z; pos.Z <= maxCube.Z; pos.Z++)
8739  {
8740  SetCubeDirty(pos);
8741  }
8742  }
8743  }
8744 
8745  }
8746 
8747  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
8748  void OnBonesMultiplied(Vector3I blockLocation, float multiplier)
8749  {
8750  var block = GetCubeBlock(blockLocation);
8751 
8752  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block was null in OnBonesMultiplied handler!");
8753  if (block == null) return;
8754 
8755  MultiplyBlockSkeleton(block, multiplier);
8756  }
8757 
8758  public void SendReflectorState(MyMultipleEnabledEnum value)
8759  {
8760  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.RelfectorStateRecived, value);
8761  }
8762 
8763  [Event, Reliable, Server, Broadcast]
8764  void RelfectorStateRecived(MyMultipleEnabledEnum value)
8765  {
8766  GridSystems.ReflectorLightSystem.ReflectorStateChanged(value);
8767  }
8768 
8769  public void SendIntegrityChanged(MySlimBlock mySlimBlock, MyIntegrityChangeEnum integrityChangeType, long toolOwner)
8770  {
8771  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BlockIntegrityChanged,mySlimBlock.Position,GetSubBlockId(mySlimBlock), mySlimBlock.BuildIntegrity,mySlimBlock.Integrity, integrityChangeType, toolOwner);
8772  }
8773 
8774  public void SendStockpileChanged(MySlimBlock mySlimBlock, List<MyStockpileItem> list)
8775  {
8776  if (list.Count > 0)
8777  {
8778  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.BlockStockpileChanged, mySlimBlock.Position, GetSubBlockId(mySlimBlock), list);
8779  }
8780  }
8781 
8782  public void SendFractureComponentRepaired(MySlimBlock mySlimBlock, long toolOwner)
8783  {
8784  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.FractureComponentRepaired, mySlimBlock.Position, GetSubBlockId(mySlimBlock), toolOwner);
8785  }
8786 
8787  ushort GetSubBlockId(MySlimBlock slimBlock)
8788  {
8789  var block = slimBlock.CubeGrid.GetCubeBlock(slimBlock.Position);
8790  MyCompoundCubeBlock compoundBlock = null;
8791  if (block != null)
8792  compoundBlock = block.FatBlock as MyCompoundCubeBlock;
8793  if (compoundBlock != null)
8794  {
8795  var subBlockId = compoundBlock.GetBlockId(slimBlock);
8796  return subBlockId ?? 0;
8797  }
8798 
8799  return 0;
8800  }
8801 
8802  public void RequestFillStockpile(Vector3I blockPosition, MyInventory fromInventory)
8803  {
8804  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnStockpileFillRequest, blockPosition, fromInventory.Owner.EntityId, fromInventory.InventoryIdx);
8805  }
8806 
8807  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8808  void OnStockpileFillRequest(Vector3I blockPosition, long ownerEntityId, byte inventoryIndex)
8809  {
8810  var block = GetCubeBlock(blockPosition);
8811  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Could not find block whose stockpile fill was requested");
8812  if (block == null) return;
8813 
8814  MyEntity ownerEntity = null;
8815  if (!MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(ownerEntityId, out ownerEntity))
8816  {
8817  Debug.Assert(false, "Stockpile fill inventory owner entity was null");
8818  return;
8819  }
8820 
8821  var owner = (ownerEntity != null && ownerEntity.HasInventory) ? ownerEntity : null;
8822  Debug.Assert(owner != null, "Stockpile fill inventory owner was not an inventory owner");
8823 
8824  var inventory = owner.GetInventory(inventoryIndex);
8825  Debug.Assert(inventory != null, "Stockpile fill inventory owner did not have the given inventory");
8826 
8827  block.MoveItemsToConstructionStockpile(inventory as MyInventoryBase);
8828  }
8829 
8830  public void RequestSetToConstruction(Vector3I blockPosition, MyInventory fromInventory)
8831  {
8832  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnSetToConstructionRequest, blockPosition, fromInventory.Owner.EntityId, fromInventory.InventoryIdx, MySession.Static.LocalPlayerId);
8833  }
8834 
8835  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8836  private void OnSetToConstructionRequest(Vector3I blockPosition,long ownerEntityId, byte inventoryIndex,long requestingPlayer)
8837  {
8838  var block = GetCubeBlock(blockPosition);
8839  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Could not find block to set to construction site");
8840  if (block == null) return;
8841 
8842  block.SetToConstructionSite();
8843 
8844  MyEntity ownerEntity = null;
8845  if (!MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(ownerEntityId, out ownerEntity))
8846  {
8847  Debug.Assert(false, "Set to construction site inventory owner entity was null");
8848  return;
8849  }
8850 
8851  var owner = (ownerEntity != null && ownerEntity.HasInventory) ? ownerEntity : null;
8852  Debug.Assert(owner != null, "Set to construction site inventory owner was not an inventory owner");
8853 
8854  var inventory = owner.GetInventory(inventoryIndex) as MyInventoryBase;
8855  Debug.Assert(inventory != null, "Set to construction site inventory owner did not have the given inventory");
8856 
8857  block.MoveItemsToConstructionStockpile(inventory);
8858  block.IncreaseMountLevel(MyWelder.WELDER_AMOUNT_PER_SECOND * VRage.Game.MyEngineConstants.UPDATE_STEP_SIZE_IN_SECONDS, requestingPlayer);
8859  }
8860 
8861  public void ChangePowerProducerState(MyMultipleEnabledEnum enabledState, long playerId)
8862  {
8863  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnPowerProducerStateRequest, enabledState, playerId); ;
8864  }
8865 
8866  public void SendPowerDistributorState(MyMultipleEnabledEnum enabledState, long playerId)
8867  {
8868  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnPowerProducerStateRequest, enabledState, playerId);
8869  }
8870 
8871  [Event, Reliable, Server,Broadcast]
8872  private void OnPowerProducerStateRequest(MyMultipleEnabledEnum enabledState, long playerId)
8873  {
8874  this.GridSystems.SyncObject_PowerProducerStateChanged(enabledState, playerId);
8875 
8876  }
8877 
8878  [Event, Reliable, Server, BroadcastExcept]
8879  private void OnZeroThrustReceived()
8880  {
8881  var thrustComp = Components.Get<MyEntityThrustComponent>();
8882  if (thrustComp != null)
8883  {
8884  thrustComp.ControlThrust = Vector3.Zero;
8885  }
8886  }
8887 
8888  public void RequestConversionToShip()
8889  {
8890  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnConvertedToShipRequest);
8891  }
8892 
8893  public void RequestConversionToStation()
8894  {
8895  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnConvertedToStationRequest);
8896  }
8897 
8898  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8899  public void OnConvertedToShipRequest()
8900  {
8901  if(IsStatic == false)
8902  {
8903  return;
8904  }
8905  ConvertToDynamic();
8906  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.ConvertToDynamic);
8907  }
8908 
8909  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8910  public void OnConvertedToStationRequest()
8911  {
8912  if (IsStatic)
8913  {
8914  return;
8915  }
8916  ConvertToStatic();
8917  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.ConvertToStatic);
8918  }
8919 
8920  public void ChangeOwnerRequest(MyCubeGrid grid, MyCubeBlock block, long playerId, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode)
8921  {
8922  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnChangeOwnerRequest,block.EntityId,playerId,shareMode);
8923  }
8924 
8925  [Event, Reliable, Server]
8926  void OnChangeOwnerRequest(long blockId, long owner, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode)
8927  {
8928  MyCubeBlock block = null;
8929 
8930  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById<MyCubeBlock>(blockId, out block))
8931  {
8932  var ownerComp = block.Components.Get<MyEntityOwnershipComponent>();
8933  if (Sync.IsServer && block.IDModule != null && ((block.IDModule.Owner == 0) || block.IDModule.Owner == owner || (owner == 0)))
8934  {
8935  OnChangeOwner(blockId, owner, shareMode);
8936  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnChangeOwner, blockId, owner, shareMode);
8937  }
8938  else if (Sync.IsServer && ownerComp != null && (ownerComp.OwnerId == 0 || ownerComp.OwnerId == owner || owner == 0))
8939  {
8940  OnChangeOwner(blockId, owner, shareMode);
8941  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnChangeOwner, blockId, owner, shareMode);
8942  }
8943  else
8944  {
8945  bool shouldHaveOwnership = block.BlockDefinition.ContainsComputer();
8946  if (block.UseObjectsComponent != null)
8947  shouldHaveOwnership = shouldHaveOwnership || block.UseObjectsComponent.GetDetectors("ownership").Count > 0;
8948  if (shouldHaveOwnership)
8949  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Invalid ownership change request!");
8950  }
8951  }
8952  }
8953 
8954  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
8955  void OnChangeOwner(long blockId, long owner, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode)
8956  {
8957  MyCubeBlock block = null;
8958  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById<MyCubeBlock>(blockId, out block))
8959  {
8960  block.ChangeOwner(owner, shareMode);
8961  }
8962  }
8963 
8964  void HandBrakeChanged()
8965  {
8966  GridSystems.WheelSystem.HandBrake = m_handBrakeSync;
8967  }
8968 
8969  public void SetHandbrakeRequest(bool v)
8970  {
8971  m_handBrakeSync.Value = v;
8972  }
8973 
8974  public void ChangeGridOwner(long playerId, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode)
8975  {
8976  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnChangeGridOwner, playerId, shareMode);
8977  OnChangeGridOwner(playerId, shareMode);
8978  }
8979 
8980  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
8981  void OnChangeGridOwner(long playerId, MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode)
8982  {
8983  foreach (var block in GetBlocks())
8984  {
8985  if (block.FatBlock != null && block.BlockDefinition.RatioEnoughForOwnership(block.BuildLevelRatio))
8986  {
8987  block.FatBlock.ChangeOwner(playerId, shareMode);
8988  }
8989  }
8990  }
8991 
8992  public void AnnounceRemoveSplit(List<MySlimBlock> blocks)
8993  {
8994  m_tmpPositionListSend.Clear();
8995  foreach (var block in blocks)
8996  {
8997  m_tmpPositionListSend.Add(block.Position);
8998  }
8999  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnRemoveSplit, m_tmpPositionListSend);
9000  }
9001 
9002  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
9003  void OnRemoveSplit(List<Vector3I> removedBlocks)
9004  {
9005  m_tmpPositionListReceive.Clear();
9006  foreach (var position in removedBlocks)
9007  {
9008  var block = GetCubeBlock(position);
9009  Debug.Assert(block != null, "Block was null when trying to remove a grid split. Desync?");
9010  if (block == null)
9011  {
9012  MySandboxGame.Log.WriteLine("Block was null when trying to remove a grid split. Desync?");
9013  continue;
9014  }
9015 
9016  m_tmpBlockListReceive.Add(block);
9017  }
9018 
9019  MyCubeGrid.RemoveSplit(this, m_tmpBlockListReceive, 0, m_tmpBlockListReceive.Count, sync: false);
9020  }
9021 
9022  public void ChangeDisplayNameRequest(String displayName)
9023  {
9024  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnChangeDisplayNameRequest, displayName);
9025  }
9026 
9027  [Event, Reliable, Server,Broadcast]
9028  void OnChangeDisplayNameRequest(String displayName)
9029  {
9030  DisplayName = displayName;
9031  }
9032 
9033  public void ModifyGroup(MyBlockGroup group)
9034  {
9035  m_tmpBlockIdList.Clear();
9036  foreach (var block in group.Blocks)
9037  {
9038  m_tmpBlockIdList.Add(block.EntityId);
9039  }
9040  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnModifyGroupSuccess, group.Name.ToString(), m_tmpBlockIdList);
9041  }
9042 
9043  [Event, Reliable, Server, BroadcastExcept]
9044  void OnModifyGroupSuccess(String name,List<long> blocks)
9045  {
9046  if (blocks == null || blocks.Count == 0)
9047  {
9048  foreach (var group in BlockGroups)
9049  {
9050  if (group.Name.ToString().Equals(name))
9051  {
9052  RemoveGroup(group);
9053  break;
9054  }
9055  }
9056  }
9057  else
9058  {
9059  MyBlockGroup group = new MyBlockGroup(this);
9060  group.Name.Clear().Append(name);
9061  foreach (var blockId in blocks)
9062  {
9063  MyTerminalBlock block = null;
9064  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById(blockId, out block))
9065  group.Blocks.Add(block);
9066  }
9067  AddGroup(group);
9068  }
9069  }
9070 
9071  public void RazeBlockInCompoundBlock(List<Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>> locationsAndIds)
9072  {
9073  ConvertToLocationIdentityList(locationsAndIds, m_tmpLocationsAndIdsSend);
9074  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlockRequest, m_tmpLocationsAndIdsSend);
9075  }
9076 
9077  [Event, Reliable, Server]
9078  private void OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlockRequest(List<LocationIdentity> locationsAndIds)
9079  {
9080  OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlock(locationsAndIds);
9081 
9082  if (m_tmpLocationsAndIdsReceive.Count > 0)
9083  {
9084  // Broadcast to clients, use result collection
9085  ConvertToLocationIdentityList(m_tmpLocationsAndIdsReceive, m_tmpLocationsAndIdsSend);
9086  MyMultiplayer.RaiseEvent(this, x => x.OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlockSuccess, m_tmpLocationsAndIdsSend);
9087  }
9088  }
9089 
9090  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
9091  private void OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlockSuccess(List<LocationIdentity> locationsAndIds)
9092  {
9093  OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlock(locationsAndIds);
9094  }
9095 
9096  private void OnRazeBlockInCompoundBlock(List<LocationIdentity> locationsAndIds)
9097  {
9098  m_tmpLocationsAndIdsReceive.Clear();
9099  RazeBlockInCompoundBlockSuccess(locationsAndIds, m_tmpLocationsAndIdsReceive);
9100  }
9101 
9102  private static void ConvertToLocationIdentityList(List<Tuple<Vector3I, ushort>> locationsAndIdsFrom, List<LocationIdentity> locationsAndIdsTo)
9103  {
9104  locationsAndIdsTo.Clear();
9105  locationsAndIdsTo.Capacity = locationsAndIdsFrom.Count;
9106  foreach (var tuple in locationsAndIdsFrom)
9107  locationsAndIdsTo.Add(new LocationIdentity() { Location = tuple.Item1, Id = tuple.Item2 });
9108  }
9109 
9110  public static void ChangeOwnersRequest(MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode, List<MySingleOwnershipRequest> requests, long requestingPlayer)
9111  {
9112  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert((int)shareMode >= 0);
9113 
9114  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => MyCubeGrid.OnChangeOwnersRequest, shareMode, requests, requestingPlayer);
9115  }
9116 
9117  [Event, Reliable, Server]
9118  private static void OnChangeOwnersRequest(MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode, List<MySingleOwnershipRequest> requests, long requestingPlayer)
9119  {
9120  MyCubeBlock block = null;
9121  int c = 0;
9122 
9123  MyIdentity identity = MySession.Static.Players.TryGetIdentity(requestingPlayer);
9124  MyPlayer player = identity != null ? MyPlayer.GetPlayerFromCharacter(identity.Character) : null;
9125  if (identity != null && identity.Character != null && player != null && MySession.Static.IsUserSpaceMaster(player.Client.SteamUserId))
9126  c = requests.Count;
9127 
9128  while (c < requests.Count)
9129  {
9130  var request = requests[c];
9131  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById<MyCubeBlock>(request.BlockId, out block))
9132  {
9133  var ownerComp = block.Components.Get<MyEntityOwnershipComponent>();
9134  if (Sync.IsServer && block.IDModule != null && ((block.IDModule.Owner == 0) || block.IDModule.Owner == requestingPlayer || (request.Owner == 0)))
9135  {
9136  c++;
9137  }
9138  else if (Sync.IsServer && ownerComp != null && (ownerComp.OwnerId == 0 || ownerComp.OwnerId == requestingPlayer || request.Owner == 0))
9139  {
9140  c++;
9141  }
9142  else
9143  {
9144  System.Diagnostics.Debug.Fail("Invalid ownership change request!");
9145  requests.RemoveAtFast(c);
9146  }
9147  }
9148  else
9149  {
9150  c++;
9151  }
9152  }
9153 
9154  if (requests.Count > 0)
9155  {
9156  OnChangeOwnersSuccess(shareMode, requests);
9157  MyMultiplayer.RaiseStaticEvent(s => MyCubeGrid.OnChangeOwnersSuccess, shareMode, requests);
9158  }
9159  }
9160 
9161  [Event, Reliable, Broadcast]
9162  private static void OnChangeOwnersSuccess(MyOwnershipShareModeEnum shareMode, List<MySingleOwnershipRequest> requests)
9163  {
9164  foreach (var request in requests)
9165  {
9166  MyCubeBlock block = null;
9167  if (MyEntities.TryGetEntityById<MyCubeBlock>(request.BlockId, out block))
9168  {
9169  block.ChangeOwner(request.Owner, shareMode);
9170  }
9171  }
9172  }
9173 
9174  [ProtoContract]
9175  public struct MySingleOwnershipRequest
9176  {
9177  [ProtoMember]
9178  public long BlockId;
9179 
9180  [ProtoMember]
9181  public long Owner; //PlayerId
9182  }
9183 
9184  [ProtoContract]
9185  public struct LocationIdentity
9186  {
9187  [ProtoMember]
9188  public Vector3I Location;
9189 
9190  [ProtoMember]
9191  public ushort Id;
9192  }
9193 
9194  #endregion
9195 
9196  public override void SerializeControls(BitStream stream)
9197  {
9198  MyShipController shipController = null;
9199  if (!IsStatic)
9200  {
9201  shipController = GridSystems.ControlSystem.GetShipController();
9202  }
9203 
9204  if (shipController != null)
9205  {
9206  stream.WriteBool(true);
9207  var netState = shipController.GetNetState();
9208  netState.Serialize(stream);
9209  }
9210  else stream.WriteBool(false);
9211  }
9212 
9213  private MyGridNetState m_lastNetState;
9214  public override void DeserializeControls(BitStream stream, bool outOfOrder)
9215  {
9216  var valid = stream.ReadBool();
9217  if (valid)
9218  {
9219  var netState = new MyGridNetState(stream);
9220  if (!outOfOrder)
9221  m_lastNetState = netState;
9222 
9223  var shipController = GridSystems.ControlSystem.GetShipController();
9224  if (shipController != null && !shipController.ControllerInfo.IsLocallyControlled())
9225  shipController.SetNetState(m_lastNetState);
9226  }
9227  else m_lastNetState.Valid = false;
9228  }
9229 
9230  public override void ApplyLastControls()
9231  {
9232  if (m_lastNetState.Valid)
9233  {
9234  var shipController = GridSystems.ControlSystem.GetShipController();
9235  if (shipController != null && !shipController.ControllerInfo.IsLocallyControlled())
9236  shipController.SetNetState(m_lastNetState);
9237  }
9238  }
9239 
9240  #region VisualScripting
9241 
9242  private List<long> m_targetingList = new List<long>();
9243  private bool m_targetingListIsWhitelist = false;
9244  private bool m_usesTargetingList = false;
9245  public bool UsesTargetingList { get { return m_usesTargetingList; } }
9246 
9247  public void TargetingAddId(long id)
9248  {
9249  if (!m_targetingList.Contains(id))
9250  m_targetingList.Add(id);
9251  m_usesTargetingList = m_targetingList.Count > 0 || m_targetingListIsWhitelist;
9252  }
9253 
9254  public void TargetingRemoveId(long id)
9255  {
9256  if (m_targetingList.Contains(id))
9257  m_targetingList.Remove(id);
9258  m_usesTargetingList = m_targetingList.Count > 0 || m_targetingListIsWhitelist;
9259  }
9260 
9261  public void TargetingSetWhitelist(bool whitelist)
9262  {
9263  m_targetingListIsWhitelist = whitelist;
9264  m_usesTargetingList = m_targetingList.Count > 0 || m_targetingListIsWhitelist;
9265  }
9266 
9267  public bool TargetingCanAttackGrid(long id)
9268  {
9269  if (m_targetingListIsWhitelist)
9270  return m_targetingList.Contains(id);
9271  else
9272  return !m_targetingList.Contains(id);
9273  }
9274 
9275  #endregion
9276  }
9277

9280  public MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx Triangle;
9281  public Vector3I Position;
9282  public int CubePartIndex = -1;
9283 
9284  public void Reset()
9285  {
9286  Triangle = new MyIntersectionResultLineTriangleEx();
9287  Position = new Vector3I();
9288  CubePartIndex = -1;
9289  }
9290  }
9291 }
